atk-s0512a:28: Saha saṃvaṇṇanaṃ yasmā, dharate satthu sāsanaṃ;
atk-s0512a:30: Tasmā taṃ avalambitvā, ogāhitvā ca sabbaso;
atk-s0512a:38_0: Tattha cariyāpiṭakanti kenaṭṭhena cariyāpiṭakaṃ? Atītāsu jātīsu satthu cariyānubhāvappakāsinī
atk-s0512a:38_1: pariyattīti katvā, pariyattiattho hi ayaṃ piṭakasaddo, “mā piṭakasampadānenā”tiādīsu
atk-s0512a:38_2: viya. Atha vā yasmā sā pariyatti tasseva satthu purimajātīsu cariyānaṃ ānubhāvappakāsanena
atk-s0512a:38_3: bhājanabhūtā, tasmāpi “cariyāpiṭaka”nti vuccati, bhājanatthopi hi piṭakasaddo niddiṭṭho
atk-s0512a:38_4: “atha puriso āgaccheyya, kudālapiṭakaṃ ādāyā”tiādīsu viya. Taṃ panetaṃ cariyāpiṭakaṃ
atk-s0512a:38_5: vinayapiṭakaṃ, suttantapiṭakaṃ, abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpannaṃ.
atk-s0512a:38_6: Dīghanikāyo, majjhimanikāyo, saṃyuttanikāyo, aṅguttaranikāyo, khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu
atk-s0512a:38_7: nikāyesu khuddakanikāyapariyāpannaṃ. Suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthā, udānaṃ,
atk-s0512a:38_8: itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallanti navasu sāsanaṅgesu gāthāsaṅgahaṃ.
atk-s0512a:40: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
atk-s0512a:41_0: Evaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭiññātesu caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassesu katipayadhammakkhandhasaṅgahaṃ.
atk-s0512a:41_1: Vaggato akittivaggo, hatthināgavaggo, yudhañjayavaggoti vaggattayasaṅgahaṃ. Cariyato
atk-s0512a:41_2: akittivagge dasa, hatthināgavagge dasa, yudhañjayavagge pañcadasāti pañcatiṃsacariyāsaṅgahaṃ.
atk-s0512a:41_3: Tīsu vaggesu akittivaggo ādi, cariyāsu akitticariyā. Tassāpi –
atk-s0512a:43: Etthantare yaṃ caritaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ bodhipācana”nti. –
atk-s0512a:44: Ayaṃ gāthā ādi. Tassa ito pabhuti anukkamena atthasaṃvaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-s0512a:47_0: Sā panāyaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇanā yasmā dūrenidānaṃ, avidūrenidānaṃ, santikenidānanti imāni
atk-s0512a:47_1: tīṇi nidānāni dassetvā vuccamānā suṇantehi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya suṭṭhu viññātā nāma
atk-s0512a:47_2: hoti. Tasmā tesaṃ nidānānaṃ ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:48_0: Dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūlasmiñhi katābhinīhārassa mahābodhisattassa yāva tusitabhavane
atk-s0512a:48_1: nibbatti, tāva pavatto kathāmaggo dūrenidānaṃ nāma. Tusitabhavanato paṭṭhāya yāva
atk-s0512a:48_2: bodhimaṇḍe sabbaññutaññāṇappatti, tāva pavatto kathāmaggo avidūrenidānaṃ nāma. Mahābodhimaṇḍato
atk-s0512a:48_3: pana paṭṭhāya yāva paccuppannavatthu, tāva pavatto kathāmaggo santikenidānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0512a:48_4: Imesu tīsu nidānesu yasmā dūrenidānaavidūrenidānāni sabbasādhāraṇāni, tasmā tāni
atk-s0512a:48_5: jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthāritanayeneva vitthārato veditabbāni. Santikenidāne pana
atk-s0512a:48_6: atthi visesoti tiṇṇampi nidānānaṃ ayamādito paṭṭhāya saṅkhepakathā.
atk-s0512a:49_0: Dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato pādamūle katābhinīhāro bodhisattabhūto lokanātho attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ
atk-s0512a:49_1: samattiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā, sabbaññutaññāṇasambhāraṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā, tusitabhavane
atk-s0512a:49_2: nibbatto buddhabhāvāya uppattikālaṃ āgamayamāno, tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto
atk-s0512a:49_3: sakyarājakule paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā anantena parihārena mahantena sirisobhaggena vaḍḍhamāno
atk-s0512a:49_4: anukkamena yobbanaṃ patvā ekūnatiṃse vayasmiṃ katamahābhinikkhamano, chabbassāni
atk-s0512a:49_5: mahāpadhānaṃ padahitvā, vesākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ bodhirukkhamūle nisinno sūriye anatthaṅgamiteyeva
atk-s0512a:49_6: mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā purimayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā, majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ
atk-s0512a:49_7: visodhetvā, pacchimayāme diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ khepetvā, anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhimabhisambujjhi.
atk-s0512a:50_0: Tato tattheva sattasattāhe vītināmetvā, āsāḷhipuṇṇamāyaṃ bārāṇasiṃ gantvā isipatane
atk-s0512a:50_1: migadāye aññāsikoṇḍaññappamukhā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo dhammāmataṃ pāyento, dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0512a:50_2: pavattetvā, yasādike veneyye arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā, te sabbeva saṭṭhi arahante lokānuggahāya
atk-s0512a:50_3: vissajjetvā, uruvelaṃ gacchanto kappāsikavanasaṇḍe tiṃsa bhaddavaggiye sotāpattiphalādīsu
atk-s0512a:50_4: patiṭṭhāpetvā, uruvelaṃ gantvā aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni dassetvā uruvelakassapādayo
atk-s0512a:50_5: sahassajaṭilaparivāre tebhātikajaṭile vinetvā, tehi parivuto rājagahanagarūpacāre
atk-s0512a:50_6: laṭṭhivanuyyāne nisinno bimbisārappamukhe dvādasanahute brāhmaṇagahapatike sāsane
atk-s0512a:51_0: Athevaṃ bhagavati veḷuvane viharante sāriputtamoggallānesu aggasāvakaṭṭhāne ṭhapitesu
atk-s0512a:51_1: sāvakasannipāte jāte, suddhodanamahārājā “putto kira me chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ
atk-s0512a:51_2: caritvā paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ nissāya veḷuvane
atk-s0512a:51_3: viharatī”ti sutvā dasapurisasahassaparivāre, anukkamena dasa amacce pesesi “puttaṃ
atk-s0512a:51_4: me idhānetvā dassethā”ti. Tesu rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanāya arahatte patiṭṭhitesu
atk-s0512a:51_5: kāḷudāyittherena rañño adhippāye ārocite bhagavā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto rājagahato
atk-s0512a:51_6: nikkhamitvā saṭṭhiyojanaṃ kapilavatthuṃ dvīhi māsehi sampāpuṇi. Sakyarājāno “amhākaṃ
atk-s0512a:51_7: ñātiseṭṭhaṃ passissāmā”ti sannipatitvā nigrodhārāmaṃ bhagavato ca bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0512a:51_8: ca vasanayoggaṃ kāretvā, gandhapupphādihatthā paccuggamanaṃ katvā, satthāraṃ nigrodhārāmaṃ
atk-s0512a:51_9: pavesesuṃ. Tatra bhagavā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0512a:51_10: Sākiyā mānatthaddhā satthu paṇipātaṃ nākaṃsu. Bhagavā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā mānaṃ
atk-s0512a:51_11: bhañjitvā te dhammadesanāya bhājane kātuṃ abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0512a:51_12: vuṭṭhāya ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā tesaṃ sīse pādapaṃsuṃ okiramāno viya, kaṇḍambarukkhamūle
atk-s0512a:51_13: katapāṭihāriyasadisaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi. Rājā taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā “ayaṃ loke
atk-s0512a:51_14: aggapuggalo”ti vandi. Raññā pana vandite te ṭhātuṃ nāma na sakkonti, sabbepi sākiyā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0512a:52_0: Tadā kira bhagavā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ karonto lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriyampi akāsi – yasmiṃ
atk-s0512a:52_1: vattamāne manussā manussaloke yathāṭhitā yathānisinnāva cātumahārājikato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0512a:52_2: yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā sabbe deve tattha tattha attano bhavane kīḷante dibbānubhāvena
atk-s0512a:52_3: jotante mahatiṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavante santāni samāpattisukhāni anubhavante aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0512a:52_4: dhammaṃ sākacchante ca buddhānubhāvena attano maṃsacakkhunāva passanti. Tathā heṭṭhāpathaviyaṃ
atk-s0512a:52_5: aṭṭhasu mahānirayesu, soḷasasu ca ussadanirayesu, lokantaraniraye cāti tattha tattha
atk-s0512a:52_6: mahādukkhaṃ anubhavamāne satte passanti. Dasasahassilokadhātuyaṃ devā mahaccadevānubhāvena
atk-s0512a:52_7: tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā acchariyabbhutacittajātā pañjalikā namassamānā payirupāsanti,
atk-s0512a:52_8: buddhaguṇapaṭisaṃyuttā gāthāyo udāharantā thomenti apphoṭenti hasanti pītisomanassaṃ
atk-s0512a:53: “Bhummā mahārājikā tāvatiṃsā, yāmā ca devā tusitā ca nimmitā;
atk-s0512a:54: Paranimmitā yepi ca brahmakāyikā, ānanditā vipulamakaṃsu ghosa”nti.
atk-s0512a:55_0: Tadā hi dasabalo “atulaṃ attano buddhabalaṃ dassessāmī”ti mahākaruṇāya samussāhito
atk-s0512a:55_1: ākāse dasasahassacakkavāḷasamāgame caṅkamaṃ māpetvā, dvādasayojanavitthate sabbaratanamaye
atk-s0512a:55_2: caṅkame ṭhito yathāvuttaṃ devamanussanayanavihaṅgānaṃ ekanipātabhūtamacchariyaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:55_3: buddhānaṃ samādhiñāṇānubhāvadīpanaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā, puna tasmiṃ caṅkame caṅkamanto
atk-s0512a:55_4: veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ acinteyyānubhāvāya anopamāya buddhalīḷāya dhammaṃ desesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:56: “Na hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ kīdisako naruttamo;
atk-s0512a:57: Iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca kīdisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa kīdisaṃ.
atk-s0512a:58: “Na hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ edisako naruttamo;
atk-s0512a:59: Iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca edisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa edisaṃ.
atk-s0512a:62_0: Evaṃ tathāgate attano buddhānubhāvadīpanaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā dhammaṃ desente āyasmā
atk-s0512a:62_1: dhammasenāpati sāriputto rājagahe gijjhakūṭapabbate ṭhito dibbacakkhunā passitvā,
atk-s0512a:62_3: buddhānubhāvaṃ lokassa pākaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti sañjātaparivitakko attano parivārabhūtānaṃ
atk-s0512a:62_4: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ tamatthaṃ ārocetvā iddhiyā ākāsena tāvadeva āgantvā saparivāro
atk-s0512a:62_6: sirasi paggayha tathāgatassa mahābhinīhāraṃ pāramiparipūraṇañca pucchi. Bhagavā taṃ
atk-s0512a:62_8: attano buddhānubhāvaṃ paridīpayanto buddhavaṃsaṃ desesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:66: Kamhi kāle tayā dhīra, patthitā bodhimuttamā.
atk-s0512a:73_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā buddhavaṃse desite āyasmā dhammasenāpati “aho buddhānaṃ hetusampadā,
atk-s0512a:73_1: aho samudāgamasampatti, aho mahābhinīhārasamijjhanā, dukkaraṃ vata bhagavatā kataṃ
atk-s0512a:73_2: ettakaṃ kālaṃ evaṃ pāramiyo pūrentena, evaṃvidhassa bodhisambhārasambharaṇassa anucchavikameva
atk-s0512a:73_3: cetaṃ phalaṃ, yadidaṃ sabbaññutā balesu ca vasībhāvo evaṃmahiddhikatā evaṃmahānubhāvatā”ti
atk-s0512a:73_4: buddhaguṇārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesesi. So anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato sīlaṃ samādhi paññā
atk-s0512a:73_5: vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ hiriottappaṃ saddhāvīriyaṃ satisampajaññaṃ sīlavisuddhi
atk-s0512a:73_6: diṭṭhivisuddhi samathavipassanā tīṇi kusalamūlāni tīṇi sucaritāni tayo sammāvitakkā
atk-s0512a:73_7: tisso anavajjasaññāyo tisso dhātuyo cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cattāro sammappadhānā cattāro
atk-s0512a:73_8: iddhipādā cattāro ariyamaggā cattāri ariyaphalāni catasso paṭisambhidā catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni
atk-s0512a:73_9: cattāro ariyavaṃsā cattāri vesārajjañāṇāni pañca padhāniyaṅgāni pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi
atk-s0512a:73_10: pañcindriyāni pañca balāni pañca nissaraṇiyā dhātuyo pañca vimuttāyatanañāṇāni pañca
atk-s0512a:73_11: vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā cha sāraṇīyā dhammā cha anussatiṭṭhānāni cha gāravā cha
atk-s0512a:73_12: nissaraṇiyā dhātuyo cha satatavihārā cha anuttariyāni cha nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā cha
atk-s0512a:73_13: abhiññā cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni satta aparihāniyā dhammā satta ariyadhanāni satta bojjhaṅgā
atk-s0512a:73_14: satta sappurisadhammā satta niddasavatthūni satta saññā satta dakkhiṇeyyapuggaladesanā
atk-s0512a:73_15: satta khīṇāsavabaladesanā aṭṭha paññāpaṭilābhahetudesanā aṭṭha sammattāni aṭṭha lokadhammātikkamā
atk-s0512a:73_16: aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni aṭṭha akkhaṇadesanā aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakkā aṭṭha abhibhāyatanadesanā
atk-s0512a:73_17: aṭṭha vimokkhā nava yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā nava pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni nava
atk-s0512a:73_18: sattāvāsadesanā nava āghātappaṭivinayā nava paññā nava nānattadesanā nava anupubbavihārā
atk-s0512a:73_19: dasa nāthakaraṇā dhammā dasa kasiṇāyatanāni dasa kusalakammapathā dasa sammattāni
atk-s0512a:73_20: dasa ariyavāsā dasa asekkhā dhammā dasa ratanāni dasa tathāgatabalāni ekādasa mettānisaṃsā
atk-s0512a:73_21: dvādasa dhammacakkākārā terasa dhutaṅgaguṇā cuddasa buddhañāṇāni pañcadasa vimuttiparipācanīyā
atk-s0512a:73_22: dhammā soḷasavidhā ānāpānassatī soḷasa aparampariyā dhammā aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā
atk-s0512a:73_23: ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni paññāsa udayabbayañāṇāni
atk-s0512a:73_26: anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādike acinteyyānubhāve buddhaguṇe
atk-s0512a:73_27: dhammanvayato anugacchanto anussaranto neva antaṃ, na pamāṇaṃ passi. Thero hi attanopi
atk-s0512a:73_28: nāma guṇānaṃ antaṃ vā pamāṇaṃ vā āvajjento na passati, so bhagavato guṇānaṃ pamāṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:73_29: kiṃ passissati? Yassa yassa hi paññā mahatī ñāṇaṃ visadaṃ, so so buddhaguṇe mahantato
atk-s0512a:73_30: saddahati, iti thero bhagavato guṇānaṃ pamāṇaṃ vā paricchedaṃ vā apassanto “mādisassa
atk-s0512a:73_31: nāma sāvakapāramiñāṇe ṭhitassa buddhaguṇā ñāṇena paricchindituṃ na sakkā, pageva
atk-s0512a:73_32: itaresaṃ. Aho acinteyyā aparimeyyabhedā mahānubhāvā sabbaññuguṇā, kevalaṃ panete
atk-s0512a:73_33: ekassa buddhañāṇasseva sabbaso gocarā, nāññesaṃ. Kathetuṃ pana sammāsambuddhehipi
atk-s0512a:74: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
atk-s0512a:75: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
atk-s0512a:76_0: Evaṃ buddhānaṃ guṇamahantataṃ nissāya uppannabalavapītisomanasso puna cintesi – “evarūpānaṃ
atk-s0512a:76_1: nāma buddhaguṇānaṃ hetubhūtā buddhakārakā dhammā pāramiyo aho mahānubhāvā. Katamāsu
atk-s0512a:76_2: nu kho jātīsu pāramitā paripācitā, kathaṃ vā paripākaṃ gatā, handāhaṃ imamatthaṃ
atk-s0512a:76_3: pucchanto evampi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya buddhānubhāvaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa
atk-s0512a:76_4: pākaṭataraṃ karissāmī”ti. So evaṃ cintetvā bhagavantaṃ imaṃ pañhaṃ apucchi – “katamāsu
atk-s0512a:76_5: nu kho, bhante, jātīsu ime buddhakārakā dhammā paripācitā, kathaṃ vā paripākaṃ gatā”ti?
atk-s0512a:76_6: Athassa bhagavā tasmiṃ ratanacaṅkame tisandhipallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā yugandharapabbate
atk-s0512a:76_7: bālasūriyo viya virocamāno nisinno “sāriputta, mayhaṃ buddhakārakā dhammā samādānato
atk-s0512a:76_8: paṭṭhāya nirantaraṃ sakkaccakāritāya vīriyūpatthambhena ca sabbesu kappesu bhavato
atk-s0512a:76_9: bhavaṃ jātito jātiṃ paripaccantāyeva ahesuṃ, imasmiṃ pana bhaddakappe imāsu jātīsu
atk-s0512a:76_10: te paripakkā jātā”ti dassento “kappe ca satasahasse”tiādinā cariyāpiṭakaṃ buddhāpadāniyanti
atk-s0512a:76_11: dutiyābhidhānaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ abhāsi. Apare pana “ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto devātidevo
atk-s0512a:76_12: devabrahmādīhi pūjiyamāno nigrodhārāme otaritvā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0512a:76_13: nisinno bhagavā vuttanayeneva āyasmatā sāriputtena pucchito cariyāpiṭakaṃ desesī”ti
atk-s0512a:76_14: vadanti. Ettāvatā dūrenidānaavidūrenidānāni saṅkhepato dassetvā cariyāpiṭakassa santikenidānaṃ
atk-s0512a:76_15: vitthārato niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ. Dūrenidānaṃ pana asaṅkhyeyyavibhāvanāyaṃ āvi bhavissatīti.
atk-s0512a:77_1: hoti. Tatrāyaṃ kappa-saddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca vitakkavidhānapaṭibhāgapaññattikālaparamāyusamaṇavohārasamantabhāvābhisaddahana-
atk-s0512a:77_3: dissati. Tathā hesa “nekkhammasaṅkappo abyāpādasaṅkappo”tiādīsu vitakke āgato. “Cīvare
atk-s0512a:77_4: vikappaṃ āpajjeyyā”tiādīsu vidhāne, adhikavidhānaṃ āpajjeyyāti attho. “Satthukappena
atk-s0512a:77_5: vata kira, bho, sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā”tiādīsu paṭibhāge. Satthusadisenāti
atk-s0512a:77_6: ayañhi tattha attho. “Idhāyasmā, kappo”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ. “Yena sudaṃ niccakappaṃ
atk-s0512a:77_7: viharāmī”tiādīsu kāle. “Ākaṅkhamāno, ānanda, tathāgato kappaṃ vā tiṭṭheyya kappāvasesaṃ
atk-s0512a:77_8: vā”tiādīsu paramāyumhi. Āyukappo hi idha kappoti adhippeto. “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave,
atk-s0512a:77_9: pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”ntiādīsu samaṇavohāre. “Kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ
atk-s0512a:77_10: obhāsetvā”tiādīsu samantabhāve. “Saddhā saddahanā okappanā abhippasādo”tiādīsu abhisaddahane,
atk-s0512a:77_11: saddhāyanti attho. “Alaṅkato kappitakesamassū”tiādīsu chedane. “Evameva ito dinnaṃ,
atk-s0512a:77_12: petānaṃ upakappatī”tiādīsu viniyoge. “Kappakatena akappakataṃ saṃsibbitaṃ hotī”tiādīsu
atk-s0512a:77_13: vinayakiriyāyaṃ. “Atthi kappo nipajjituṃ, handāhaṃ nipajjāmī”tiādīsu lese. “Āpāyiko
atk-s0512a:77_14: nerayiko kappaṭṭho saṅghabhedako…pe… kappaṃ nirayamhi paccatī”ti ca ādīsu antarakappe.
atk-s0512a:78: “Na kappayanti na purekkharonti, dhammāpi tesaṃ na paṭicchitāse;
atk-s0512a:79: Na brāhmaṇo sīlavatena neyyo, pāraṅgato na pacceti tādī”ti. –
atk-s0512a:80_0: Ādīsu taṇhādiṭṭhīsu. Tathā hi vuttaṃ niddese “kappāti uddānato dve kappā taṇhākappo
atk-s0512a:80_2: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, kappassa asaṅkhyeyyānī”tiādīsu mahākappe. Idhāpi mahākappeyeva daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0512a:81_0: Tatrāyaṃ padasiddhi – kappīyatīti kappo, ettakāni vassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatānīti
atk-s0512a:81_1: vā ettakāni vassasahassānīti vā ettakāni vassasatasahassānīti vā saṃvaccharavasena
atk-s0512a:81_2: gaṇetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā kevalaṃ sāsaparāsiupamādīhi kappetabbo parikappetabbaparimāṇoti
atk-s0512a:82_0: “Kīva dīgho nu kho, bhante, kappoti? Dīgho kho, bhikkhu, kappo, so na sukaro saṅkhātuṃ
atk-s0512a:82_1: ‘ettakāni vassānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni vassasatānī’ti vā ‘ettakāni vassasahassānī’ti vā
atk-s0512a:82_2: ‘ettakāni vassasatasahassānī’ti vā. Sakkā pana, bhante, upamaṃ kātunti? ‘Sakkā, bhikkhū’ti
atk-s0512a:82_3: bhagavā avoca. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, yojanaṃ āyāmena yojanaṃ vitthārena yojanaṃ ubbedhena
atk-s0512a:82_4: mahāsāsaparāsi. Tato vassasatassa vassasahassassa accayena ekamekaṃ sāsapaṃ uddhareyya,
atk-s0512a:82_5: khippataraṃ kho so, bhikkhu, mahāsāsaparāsi iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ
atk-s0512a:82_6: gaccheyya, na tveva kappo, evaṃ dīgho kho, bhikkhu, kappo”ti.
atk-s0512a:83: Svāyaṃ mahākappo saṃvaṭṭādivasena catuasaṅkhyeyyakappasaṅgaho. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0512a:84: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, kappassa asaṅkhyeyyāni. Katamāni cattāri? Saṃvaṭṭo, saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī, vivaṭṭo, vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī”ti.
atk-s0512a:85_0: Tattha tayo saṃvaṭṭā – tejosaṃvaṭṭo, āposaṃvaṭṭo, vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti. Tisso saṃvaṭṭasīmā
atk-s0512a:85_1: – ābhassarā, subhakiṇhā, vehapphalāti. Yadā hi kappo tejena saṃvaṭṭati, ābhassarato
atk-s0512a:85_2: heṭṭhā agginā ḍayhati. Yadā āpena saṃvaṭṭati, subhakiṇhato heṭṭhā udakena vilīyati.
atk-s0512a:85_3: Yadā vāyunā saṃvaṭṭati, vehapphalato heṭṭhā vātena viddhaṃsati. Vitthārato pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ
atk-s0512a:85_4: vinassati, yaṃ buddhānaṃ āṇākkhettanti vuccati. Tesu tīsu saṃvaṭṭesu yathākkamaṃ
atk-s0512a:85_5: kappavināsakamahāmeghato yāva jālāya vā udakassa vā vātassa vā upacchedo idaṃ ekaṃ
atk-s0512a:85_6: asaṅkhyeyyaṃ saṃvaṭṭo nāma. Kappavināsakajālādipacchedato yāva koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaparipūrako
atk-s0512a:85_7: sampattimahāmegho uṭṭhahati, idaṃ dutiyaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī nāma.
atk-s0512a:86_0: Sampattimahāmeghato yāva candimasūriyapātubhāvo, idaṃ tatiyaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ vivaṭṭo
atk-s0512a:86_1: nāma. Candimasūriyapātubhāvato yāva puna kappavināsakamahāmegho, idaṃ catutthaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
atk-s0512a:86_2: vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī nāma. Imesu catusaṭṭhiantarakappasaṅgahaṃ vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyī. Tena samānakālaparicchedā
atk-s0512a:86_3: vivaṭṭādayo veditabbā. “Vīsatiantarakappasaṅgaha”nti eke. Iti imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0512a:86_4: eko mahākappo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “svāyaṃ mahākappo saṃvaṭṭādivasena catuasaṅkhyeyyakappasaṅgaho”ti.
atk-s0512a:87_0: Kappeti ca accantasaṃyogavasena upayogabahuvacanaṃ. Satasahasseti kappasaddasambandhena
atk-s0512a:87_1: cāyaṃ pulliṅganiddeso, idhāpi accantasaṃyogavaseneva bahuvacanaṃ. Samānādhikaraṇañhetaṃ
atk-s0512a:87_2: padadvayaṃ. Caturo ca asaṅkhiyeti etthāpi eseva nayo. Kassa pana asaṅkhiyeti aññassa
atk-s0512a:87_3: avuttattā kappassa ca vuttattā pakaraṇato kappānanti ayamattho viññāyateva. Na hi
atk-s0512a:87_4: vuttaṃ vajjetvā avuttassa kassaci gahaṇaṃ yuttanti. Ca-saddo sampiṇḍanattho, mahākappānaṃ
atk-s0512a:87_5: caturo asaṅkhyeyye satasahasse ca mahākappeti ayañhettha attho. Asaṅkhiyeti ettha
atk-s0512a:87_6: saṅkhātuṃ na sakkāti asaṅkhiyā, gaṇanaṃ atikkantāti attho. “Asaṅkhyeyyanti eko gaṇanaviseso”ti
atk-s0512a:87_7: eke. Te hi ekato paṭṭhāya mahābalakkhapariyosānāni ekūnasaṭṭhiṭṭhānāni vajjetvā dasamahābalakkhāni
atk-s0512a:87_8: asaṅkhyeyyaṃ nāma, saṭṭhimaṭṭhānantaranti vadanti. Taṃ na yujjati, saṅkhyāṭhānantaraṃ
atk-s0512a:87_9: nāma gaṇanaviseso, tassa asaṅkhyeyyabhāvābhāvato ekaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ asaṅkhyeyyañcāti
atk-s0512a:87_10: viruddhametaṃ. Nanu ca asaṅkhyabhāvena asaṅkhyeyyattepi tassa catubbidhabhāvo na
atk-s0512a:87_11: yujjatīti? No na yujjati. Catūsu ṭhānesu asaṅkhyeyyabhāvassa icchitattā. Tatrāyamādito
atk-s0512a:88_0: Atīte kira ekasmiṃ kappe taṇhaṅkaro medhaṅkaro saraṇaṅkaro dīpaṅkaroti cattāro sammāsambuddhā
atk-s0512a:88_1: anukkamena loke uppajjiṃsu. Tesu dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato kāle amaravatī nāma nagaraṃ
atk-s0512a:88_2: ahosi. Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca,
atk-s0512a:88_3: saṃsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena, abhirūpo
atk-s0512a:88_4: dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato. So aññaṃ kammaṃ akatvā
atk-s0512a:88_5: brāhmaṇasippameva uggaṇhi. Tassa daharakāleyeva mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu. Athassa rāsivaḍḍhako
atk-s0512a:88_6: amacco āyapotthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādibharite sāragabbhe vivaritvā
atk-s0512a:88_7: “ettakaṃ te, kumāra, mātusantakaṃ, ettakaṃ te pitusantakaṃ, ettakaṃ te ayyakapayyakāna”nti
atk-s0512a:88_8: yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhanaṃ ācikkhitvā “etaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti āha. Sumedhapaṇḍito
atk-s0512a:88_9: cintesi – “imaṃ evaṃ bahuṃ dhanaṃ saṃharitvā mayhaṃ mātāpitādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā
atk-s0512a:88_10: ekakahāpaṇampi gahetvā na gatā, mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0512a:88_11: So rañño ārocetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā himavantappadesaṃ
atk-s0512a:88_12: gantvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā sattāheneva aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca ca abhiññāyo
atk-s0512a:89_0: Tasmiñca kāle dīpaṅkaradasabalo paramābhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko
atk-s0512a:89_1: catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi parivuto anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno rammavatīnagaraṃ
atk-s0512a:89_2: nāma patvā tassa avidūre sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasati. Rammavatīnagaravāsino “satthā
atk-s0512a:89_3: kira amhākaṃ nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasatī”ti sutvā gandhamālādihatthā
atk-s0512a:89_4: satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0512a:89_5: sutvā svātanāya nimantetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu. Te punadivase mahādānaṃ sajjetvā
atk-s0512a:89_6: nagaraṃ alaṅkaritvā dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭhā sodhenti.
atk-s0512a:90_0: Tasmiñca kāle sumedhatāpaso ākāsena gacchanto te haṭṭhatuṭṭhe manusse disvā “ambho,
atk-s0512a:90_1: kassa tumhe imaṃ maggaṃ sodhethā”ti pucchi? Tehi “sammāsambuddhassa āgamanamaggaṃ
atk-s0512a:90_2: sodhemā”ti vutte atītesu buddhesu katādhikārattā “buddho”ti vacanaṃ sutvā uppannapītisomanasso
atk-s0512a:90_3: tāvadeva ākāsato oruyha “mayhampi okāsaṃ detha, ahampi sodhessāmī”ti tehi dassitaṃ
atk-s0512a:90_4: okāsaṃ “kiñcāpi ahaṃ imaṃ iddhiyā sattaratanavicittaṃ katvā alaṅkarituṃ pahomi, ajja
atk-s0512a:90_5: pana mayā kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati, kāyārahaṃ puññaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0512a:90_6: tiṇakacavarādayo nīharitvā paṃsuṃ āharitvā samaṃ karonto sodheti. Aniṭṭhiteyeva pana
atk-s0512a:90_7: tassa padesassa sodhane dīpaṅkaro bhagavā mahānubhāvānaṃ chaḷabhiññānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ
atk-s0512a:90_8: catūhi satasahassehi parivuto taṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji. Sumedhapaṇḍito “sammāsambuddho
atk-s0512a:90_9: buddhasāvakā ca mā cikkhallaṃ akkamantū”ti attano vākacīrañca cammakhaṇḍañca jaṭākalāpañca
atk-s0512a:90_10: pasāretvā sayañca yena bhagavā tena sīsaṃ katvā avakujjo nipajji. Evañca cintesi
atk-s0512a:90_11: – “sacāhaṃ icchissāmi, imassa bhagavato sāvako hutvā ajjeva kilese ghātessāmi. Kiṃ
atk-s0512a:90_12: mayhaṃ ekakeneva saṃsāramahoghato nittharaṇena? Yaṃnūnāhampi evarūpo sammāsambuddho
atk-s0512a:90_13: hutvā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ saṃsāramahaṇṇavato tāreyya”nti. Iti so aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatamahābhinīhāravasena
atk-s0512a:90_14: cittaṃ paṇidhesi. Atha bhagavā āgantvā tassa ussīsake ṭhatvā cittācāraṃ samijjhanabhāvañcassa
atk-s0512a:90_15: ñatvā “ayaṃ ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake gotamo
atk-s0512a:90_16: nāma sammāsambuddho bhavissatī”ti sabbaṃ imaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ byākaritvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0512a:91_0: Tato aparepi koṇḍaññabhagavantaṃ ādiṃ katvā anukkamena uppannā yāva kassapadasabalapariyosānā
atk-s0512a:91_1: sammāsambuddhā mahāsattaṃ “buddho bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu. Iti amhākaṃ bodhisattassa
atk-s0512a:91_2: pāramiyo pūrentasseva catuvīsati sammāsambuddhā uppannā. Yasmiṃ pana kappe dīpaṅkaradasabalo
atk-s0512a:91_3: udapādi, tasmiṃ aññepi tayo buddhā ahesuṃ. Tesaṃ santike bodhisattassa byākaraṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:91_4: nāhosi, tasmā te idha na gahitā. Porāṇaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tamhā kappā paṭṭhāya sabbabuddhe
atk-s0512a:94: “Maṅgalo ca sumano ca, revato sobhito muni;
atk-s0512a:98: “Tisso phusso ca sambuddho, vipassī sikhi vessabhū;
atk-s0512a:103_0: Tattha dīpaṅkaradasabalassa ca koṇḍaññadasabalassa ca antare mahākappānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
atk-s0512a:103_1: buddhasuñño loko ahosi, tathā bhagavato koṇḍaññassa ca bhagavato maṅgalassa ca antare,
atk-s0512a:103_2: tathā bhagavato sobhitassa ca bhagavato anomadassissa ca antare, tathā bhagavato
atk-s0512a:103_3: nāradassa ca bhagavato padumuttarassa ca antare. Vuttañhetaṃ buddhavaṃse –
atk-s0512a:112_0: Evaṃ gaṇanātītatāya asaṅkhyeyyattepi catūsu ṭhānesu mahākappānaṃ gaṇanātikkamena
atk-s0512a:112_1: “caturo ca asaṅkhiye”ti vuttaṃ, na saṅkhyāvisesenāti veditabbaṃ. Yasmā pana padumuttaradasabalassa
atk-s0512a:112_2: ca sumedhadasabalassa ca antare tiṃsakappasahassāni, sujātadasabalassa ca piyadassīdasabalassa
atk-s0512a:112_3: ca antare navasahassādhikānaṃ kappānaṃ saṭṭhisahassāni dvāsītuttarāni aṭṭha ca satāni,
atk-s0512a:112_4: dhammadassīdasabalassa ca siddhatthadasabalassa ca antare vīsati kappā, siddhatthadasabalassa
atk-s0512a:112_5: ca tissadasabalassa ca antare eko kappo, bhagavato vipassissa ca bhagavato sikhissa
atk-s0512a:112_6: ca antare saṭṭhi kappā, bhagavato ca vessabhussa bhagavato ca kakusandhassa antare
atk-s0512a:112_7: tiṃsa kappā, iti padumuttaradasabalassa uppannakappato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā tesaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0512a:112_8: buddhānaṃ uppannakappehi iminā ca bhaddakappena saddhiṃ satasahassamahākappā. Te
atk-s0512a:112_9: sandhāya vuttaṃ “kappe ca satasahasse”ti. Imasmiṃ panatthe vitthāriyamāne sabbaṃ
atk-s0512a:112_10: buddhavaṃsapāḷiṃ āharitvā saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ hotīti ativitthārabhīrukassa mahājanassa
atk-s0512a:112_11: cittaṃ anurakkhantā na vitthārayimha. Atthikehi buddhavaṃsato gahetabbo. Yopi cettha
atk-s0512a:112_12: vattabbo kathāmaggo, sopi aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahavaṇṇanāya jātakaṭṭhakathāya
atk-s0512a:115: Janā saṅgamma mantenti, mañca tañca kimantara”nti. –
atk-s0512a:116_0: Ādīsu kāraṇe āgato. “Addasā kho maṃ, bhante, aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ
atk-s0512a:116_1: dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe, vijjuniccharaṇakkhaṇeti attho. “Yassantarato na santi kopā”tiādīsu
atk-s0512a:116_2: citte. “Antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi”ntiādīsu vivare. “Na upajjhāyassa bhaṇamānassa
atk-s0512a:116_3: antarantarā kathā opātetabbā”tiādīsu vemajjhe. Idhāpi vemajjheyeva daṭṭhabbo, tasmā
atk-s0512a:116_4: etasmiṃ antare vemajjheti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmiṃ mahākappe amhākaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0512a:119_0: Evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ mahābhinīhāraṃ akāsi, samattiṃsa pāramiyo
atk-s0512a:119_1: pavicini samādiyi, sabbepi buddhakārake dhamme sampādetuṃ ārabhi, yamhi cetasmiṃ
atk-s0512a:119_2: bhaddakappe sabbaso pūritapāramī hutvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhi. Imesaṃ
atk-s0512a:119_3: dvinnaṃ mahākappānaṃ antare yathāvuttaparicchede kālaviseseti. Kathaṃ panetaṃ viññāyatīti?
atk-s0512a:119_4: “Kappe ca satasahasse, caturo ca asaṅkhiye”ti idañhi mahākappānaṃ paricchedato aparicchedato
atk-s0512a:119_5: ca saṅkhyādassanaṃ. Sā kho panāyaṃ saṅkhyā saṅkhyeyyassa ādipariyosānaggahaṇaṃ vinā
atk-s0512a:119_6: na sambhavatīti yattha bodhisambhārānamārambho yattha ca te pariyositā tadubhayampi
atk-s0512a:119_7: avadhibhāvena “etthantare”ti ettha atthato dassitanti viññāyati. Avadhi ca panāyaṃ
atk-s0512a:119_8: abhividhivasena veditabbo, na mariyādāvasena, ārambhosānakappānaṃ ekadesena antogadhattā.
atk-s0512a:119_9: Nanu ca nippadesena tesaṃ apariyādānato abhividhi ca idha na sambhavatīti? Na idamevaṃ
atk-s0512a:119_10: tadekadesepi tabbohārato. Yo hi tadekadesabhūto kappo, so nippadesato pariyādinnoti.
atk-s0512a:120_0: Yaṃ caritaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ bodhipācananti ettha caritanti cariyā, samattiṃsapāramisaṅgahā
atk-s0512a:120_2: Tathā yā cimā aṭṭha cariyā, seyyathidaṃ – paṇidhisampannānaṃ catūsu iriyāpathesu
atk-s0512a:120_3: iriyāpathacariyā, indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ ajjhattikāyatanesu āyatanacariyā, appamādavihārīnaṃ
atk-s0512a:120_4: catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu saticariyā, adhicittamanuyuttānaṃ catūsu jhānesu samādhicariyā,
atk-s0512a:120_5: buddhisampannānaṃ catūsu ariyasaccesu ñāṇacariyā, sammā paṭipannānaṃ catūsu ariyamaggesu
atk-s0512a:120_6: maggacariyā, adhigataphalānaṃ catūsu sāmaññaphalesu patticariyā, tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:120_7: sabbasattesu lokatthacariyāti. Tattha padesato dvinnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānañca
atk-s0512a:120_8: lokatthacariyā, mahābodhisattānaṃ pana sammāsambuddhānañca nippadesato. Vuttañhetaṃ
atk-s0512a:120_9: niddese “cariyāti aṭṭha cariyāyo iriyāpathacariyā āyatanacariyā”ti vitthāro. “Adhimuccanto
atk-s0512a:120_10: saddhāya carati, paggaṇhanto vīriyena carati, upaṭṭhahanto satiyā carati, avikkhipanto
atk-s0512a:120_11: samādhinā carati, pajānanto paññāya carati, vijānanto viññāṇena carati, evampi paṭipannassa
atk-s0512a:120_12: kusalā dhammā āyatantīti āyatanacariyāya carati, evampi paṭipanno visesamadhigacchatīti
atk-s0512a:120_13: visesacariyāya caratī”ti yā imā aparāpi aṭṭha cariyā vuttā, tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ pāramitāsveva
atk-s0512a:120_14: samorodho veditabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “caritanti cariyā, samattiṃsapāramisaṅgahā dānasīlādipaṭipattī”ti.
atk-s0512a:120_15: Hetucariyāya eva pana idhādhippetattā maggacariyāpatticariyānaṃ idha anavarodho veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:121_0: Tattha sabba-saddo sabbasabbaṃ āyatanasabbaṃ sakkāyasabbaṃ padesasabbanti catūsu
atk-s0512a:121_1: atthesu dissati. Tathā hi “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe
atk-s0512a:121_2: āpāthamāgacchantī”tiādīsu sabbasabbasmiṃ. “Sabbaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi taṃ suṇātha,
atk-s0512a:121_3: kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṃ cakkhuñceva rūpā ca…pe… mano ceva dhammā cā”ti ettha āyatanasabbasmiṃ.
atk-s0512a:121_4: “Sabbaṃ sabbato sañjānātī”tiādīsu sakkāyasabbasmiṃ. “Sabbesampi vo, sāriputta, subhāsitaṃ
atk-s0512a:121_5: pariyāyenā”tiādīsu padesasabbasmiṃ. Idhāpi padesasabbasmiṃ eva veditabbo, bodhisambhārabhūtassa
atk-s0512a:122_0: Bodhīti rukkhopi ariyamaggopi nibbānampi sabbaññutaññāṇampi. “Bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti
atk-s0512a:122_1: ca “antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi”nti ca āgataṭṭhāne bujjhati etthāti rukkho bodhi.
atk-s0512a:122_2: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne cattāri ariyasaccāni bujjhati
atk-s0512a:122_3: etenāti ariyamaggo bodhi. “Patvāna bodhiṃ amataṃ asaṅkhata”nti āgataṭṭhāne bujjhati
atk-s0512a:122_4: etasmiṃ nimittabhūteti nibbānaṃ bodhi. “Pappoti bodhiṃ varabhūrimedhaso”ti āgataṭṭhāne
atk-s0512a:122_5: sabbe dhamme sabbākārena bujjhati etenāti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ bodhi. Idhāpi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:122_6: adhippetaṃ. Arahattamaggasabbaññutaññāṇāni vā idha bodhīti veditabbāni, mahābodhiyā
atk-s0512a:122_9: yaṃ mama dānāsīlādipaṭipattisaṅkhātaṃ caritaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ mahābodhiyā
atk-s0512a:122_10: pācanaṃ sādhakaṃ nibbattakanti. Etena bodhisambhārānaṃ nirantarabhāvanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0512a:122_11: Atha vā sabbanti etthantare yathāvuttakālaparicchede yaṃ caritaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ sakalameva
atk-s0512a:123_0: Tasso hi bodhisambhāresu bhāvanā sabbasambhārabhāvanā nirantarabhāvanā cirakālabhāvanā
atk-s0512a:123_1: sakkaccabhāvanā cāti. Tāsu “kappe ca satasahasse, caturo ca asaṅkhiye”ti iminā cirakālabhāvanā
atk-s0512a:123_2: vuttā. Yo cettha accantasaṃyogo, tena paṭhame atthavikappe sabbaggahaṇena ca nirantarabhāvanā,
atk-s0512a:123_3: dutiye atthavikappe sabbaṃ carita”nti iminā sabbasambhārabhāvanā, bodhipācana”nti
atk-s0512a:123_4: iminā sakkaccabhāvanā vuttā hoti, yathā taṃ caritaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ pāceti evaṃbhūtabhāvadīpanato.
atk-s0512a:123_5: Tathā hi taṃ “bodhipācana”nti vattabbataṃ arahati, na aññathāti. Kathaṃ panettha
atk-s0512a:123_6: bodhicariyāya nirantarabhāvo veditabbo? Yadi cittanirantaratāya taṃ na yujjati, na
atk-s0512a:123_7: hi mahābodhisattānaṃ mahābhinīhārato uddhaṃ bodhisambhārasambharaṇacittato aññaṃ
atk-s0512a:123_8: cittaṃ nappavattatīti sakkā vattuṃ. Atha kiriyamayacittappavattiṃ sandhāya vucceyya,
atk-s0512a:123_9: evampi na yujjati, na hi sabbāni tesaṃ kiriyamayacittāni bodhisambhārasambharaṇavaseneva
atk-s0512a:123_10: pavattanti. Eteneva payoganirantaratāpi paṭikkhittāti daṭṭhabbā. Jātinirantaratāya
atk-s0512a:123_11: pana nirantarabhāvanā veditabbā. Yassañhi jātiyaṃ mahābodhisattena mahāpaṇidhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:123_12: nibbattitaṃ, tato paṭṭhāya yāva carimattabhāvā na sā nāma jāti upalabbhati, yā sabbena
atk-s0512a:123_13: sabbaṃ bodhisambhārasambhatā na siyā antamaso dānapāramimattaṃ upādāya. Ayañhi niyatipatthitānaṃ
atk-s0512a:123_14: bodhisattānaṃ dhammatā. Yāva ca te kammādīsu vasībhāvaṃ na pāpuṇanti, tāva sappadesampi
atk-s0512a:123_15: sambhāresu payogamāpajjanti. Yadā pana sabbaso kammādīsu vasībhāvappattā honti, atha
atk-s0512a:123_16: tato paṭṭhāya nippadesato eva bodhisambhāresu samīhanaṃ sātaccakiriyā ca sampajjati.
atk-s0512a:123_17: Sakkaccakāritā pana sabbakālaṃ hoti, evaṃ yena yena bodhisattānaṃ tattha tattha yathādhippāyaṃ
atk-s0512a:123_18: samijjhanaṃ sampajjatīti. Evametāya gāthāya bodhisambhāresu sabbasambhārabhāvanā
atk-s0512a:123_19: cirakālabhāvanā nirantarabhāvanā sakkaccabhāvanā cāti catassopi bhāvanā pakāsitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a:124_0: Tatra yasmā bodhisattacaritaṃ bodhisambhārā bodhicariyā aggayānaṃ pāramiyoti atthato
atk-s0512a:124_1: ekaṃ, byañjanameva nānaṃ, yasmā ca parato vibhāgena vakkhamānānaṃ dānapāramiādīnaṃ
atk-s0512a:124_2: caritanti idaṃ avisesavacanaṃ, tasmā sabbabodhisambhāresu kosallajananatthaṃ pāramiyo
atk-s0512a:124_3: idha saṃvaṇṇetabbā. Tā parato pakiṇṇakakathāyaṃ sabbākārena saṃvaṇṇayissāma.
atk-s0512a:125_0: 2. Iti bhagavā attano bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ caritaṃ ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā
atk-s0512a:125_1: mahābodhiyā paripācanamevāti avisesato dassetvā idāni tassa paramukkaṃsagamanena
atk-s0512a:125_2: atisayato bodhiparipācanabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ imasmiṃ bhaddakappe katipayā pubbacariyā
atk-s0512a:126_0: Tattha atītakappeti ito purime purimatare vā sabbasmiṃ atikkante yathāvuttaparicchede
atk-s0512a:126_1: mahākappe, kappānaṃ satasahassādhikesu catūsu asaṅkhyeyyesūti attho. Caritanti ciṇṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:126_2: dānādipaṭipattiṃ. Ṭhapayitvāti muñcitvā aggahetvā, avatvāti attho. Bhavābhaveti bhave
atk-s0512a:126_3: ca abhave ca, “itibhavābhavakatha”nti ettha hi vuddhihāniyo bhavābhavāti vuttā. “Itibhavābhavatañca
atk-s0512a:126_5: adhippetāni. “Itibhavābhavahetu vā, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti
atk-s0512a:126_6: ettha pana paṇītapaṇītatarāni sappinavanītādibhesajjāni bhavābhavāti adhippetāni.
atk-s0512a:126_7: Sampattibhavesu paṇītatarā paṇītatamā bhavābhavātipi vadanti eva, tasmā idhāpi so
atk-s0512a:126_8: eva attho veditabbo, khuddake ceva mahante ca bhavasminti vuttaṃ hoti. Imamhi kappeti
atk-s0512a:126_9: imasmiṃ bhaddakappe. Pavakkhissanti kathayissaṃ. Suṇohīti dhammasenāpatiṃ savane
atk-s0512a:126_10: niyojeti. Meti mama santike, mama bhāsatoti attho.
atk-s0512a:130_0: 3. Evaṃ bhagavā āyasmato sāriputtattherassa sadevamanussāya ca parisāya attano pubbacariyāya
atk-s0512a:130_1: savane ussāhaṃ janetvā idāni taṃ pubbacaritaṃ bhavantarapaṭicchannaṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ
atk-s0512a:131_0: Tattha yadāti yasmiṃ kāle. Brahāraññeti mahāaraññe, araññāniyaṃ, mahante vaneti attho.
atk-s0512a:131_1: Suññeti janavivitte. Vipinakānaneti vipinabhūte kānane, padadvayenāpi tassa araññassa
atk-s0512a:131_2: gahanabhāvameva dīpeti, sabbametaṃ kāradīpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Ajjhogāhetvāti anupavisitvā.
atk-s0512a:131_4: sarīradukkhaṃ vicchinditvā harāmi attabhāvaṃ pavattemi. Akitti nāma tāpasoti evaṃnāmako
atk-s0512a:131_5: tāpaso hutvā yadā ahaṃ tasmiṃ araññe viharāmīti attho. Satthā tadā attano akittitāpasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0512a:132_0: Atīte kira imasmiṃyeva bhaddakappe bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte nāma rājini rajjaṃ kārente
atk-s0512a:132_1: bodhisatto asītikoṭivibhavassa brāhmaṇamahāsālassa kule nibbatti, “akittī”tissa nāmaṃ
atk-s0512a:132_2: kariṃsu. Tassa padasā gamanakāle bhaginīpi jāyi. “Yasavatī”tissā nāmaṃ kariṃsu. So
atk-s0512a:132_3: soḷasavassakāle takkasilaṃ gantvā sabbasippāni uggahetvā paccāgamāsi. Athassa mātāpitaro
atk-s0512a:132_4: kālamakaṃsu. So tesaṃ petakiccāni kāretvā katipayadivasātikkamena ratanāvalokanaṃ
atk-s0512a:132_5: āyuttakapurisehi kārayamāno “ettakaṃ mattikaṃ, ettakaṃ pettikaṃ, ettakaṃ pitāmaha”nti
atk-s0512a:132_6: sutvā saṃviggamānaso hutvā “idaṃ dhanameva paññāyati, na dhanassa saṃhārakā, sabbe
atk-s0512a:132_7: imaṃ dhanaṃ pahāyeva gatā, ahaṃ pana naṃ ādāya gamissāmī”ti rājānaṃ āpucchitvā bheriṃ
atk-s0512a:133_0: So sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā dhane akhīyamāne “kiṃ me imāya dhanakīḷāya, atthikā
atk-s0512a:133_1: gaṇhissantī”ti nivesanadvāraṃ vivaritvā hiraññasuvaṇṇādibharite sāragabbhe vivarāpetvā
atk-s0512a:133_2: “dinnaṃyeva harantū”ti gehaṃ pahāya ñātiparivaṭṭassa paridevantassa bhaginiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0512a:133_3: bārāṇasito nikkhamitvā nadiṃ uttaritvā dve tīṇi yojanāni gantvā pabbajitvā ramaṇīye
atk-s0512a:133_4: bhūmibhāge paṇṇasālaṃ karitvā vasati. Yena pana dvārena tadā nikkhami, taṃ akittidvāraṃ
atk-s0512a:133_5: nāma jātaṃ. Yena titthena nadiṃ otiṇṇo, taṃ akittititthaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Tassa pabbajitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0512a:133_6: sutvā bahū manussā gāmanigamarājadhānivāsino tassa guṇehi ākaḍḍhiyamānahadayā anupabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0512a:133_7: Mahāparivāro ahosi, mahālābhasakkāro nibbatti, buddhuppādo viya ahosi. Atha mahāsatto
atk-s0512a:133_8: “ayaṃ lābhasakkāro mahā, parivāropi mahanto, kāyavivekamattampi idha na labhati,
atk-s0512a:133_9: mayā ekākinā viharituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā paramappicchabhāvato vivekaninnatāya ca
atk-s0512a:133_10: kassaci ajānāpetvā ekakova nikkhamitvā anupubbena damiḷaraṭṭhaṃ patvā kāvīrapaṭṭanasamīpe
atk-s0512a:133_11: uyyāne viharanto jhānābhiññāyo nibbattesi. Tatrāpissa mahālābhasakkāro uppajji. So
atk-s0512a:133_12: taṃ jigucchanto chaḍḍetvā ākāsena gantvā kāradīpe otari. Tadā kāradīpo ahidīpo nāma.
atk-s0512a:133_13: So tattha mahantaṃ kārarukkhaṃ upanissāya paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā vāsaṃ kappesi. Appicchatāya
atk-s0512a:133_14: pana katthaci agantvā tassa rukkhassa phalakāle phalāni khādanto phale asati pattāni
atk-s0512a:134_0: Tassa sīlatejena sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi. Sakko “ko nu kho
atk-s0512a:134_1: maṃ imamhā ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti āvajjento paṇḍitaṃ disvā “kimatthaṃ nu kho ayaṃ tāpaso
atk-s0512a:134_2: evaṃ dukkaraṃ tapaṃ carati, sakkattaṃ nu kho pattheti, udāhu aññaṃ, vīmaṃsissāmi
atk-s0512a:134_3: naṃ. Ayañhi suvisuddhakāyavacīmanosamācāro jīvite nirapekkho udakasittāni kārapattāni
atk-s0512a:134_4: khādati, sace sakkattaṃ pattheti attano sittāni kārapattāni mayhaṃ dassati, no ce,
atk-s0512a:134_5: na dassatī”ti brāhmaṇavaṇṇena tassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Bodhisattopi kārapattāni sedetvā
atk-s0512a:134_6: “sītalībhūtāni khādissāmī”ti paṇṇasāladvāre nisīdi. Athassa purato sakko brāhmaṇarūpena
atk-s0512a:134_7: bhikkhāya atthiko hutvā aṭṭhāsi. Mahāsatto taṃ disvā “lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata
atk-s0512a:134_8: me, cirassaṃ vata me yācako diṭṭho”ti somanassappatto hutvā “ajja mama manorathaṃ
atk-s0512a:134_9: matthakaṃ pāpetvā dānaṃ dassāmī”ti pakkabhājaneneva ādāya gantvā dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā
atk-s0512a:134_10: attano asesetvāva tassa bhikkhābhājane pakkhipi. Sakko taṃ gahetvā thokaṃ gantvā
atk-s0512a:134_11: antaradhāyi. Mahāsattopi tassa datvā puna pariyeṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvā teneva pītisukhena vītināmesi.
atk-s0512a:135_0: Dutiyadivase pana kārapattāni pacitvā “hiyyo dakkhiṇeyyaṃ alabhiṃ, ajja nu kho katha”nti
atk-s0512a:135_1: paṇṇasāladvāre nisīdi. Sakkopi tatheva āgami. Mahāsatto punapi tatheva datvā vītināmesi.
atk-s0512a:135_2: Tatiyadivase ca tatheva datvā “aho vata me lābhā, bahuṃ vata puññaṃ pasavāmi, sacāhaṃ
atk-s0512a:135_3: dakkhiṇeyyaṃ labheyyaṃ, evameva māsampi dvemāsampi dānaṃ dadeyya”nti cintesi. Tīsupi
atk-s0512a:135_4: divasesu “tena dānena na lābhasakkārasilokaṃ na cakkavattisampattiṃ na sakkasampattiṃ
atk-s0512a:135_5: na brahmasampattiṃ na sāvakabodhiṃ na paccekabodhiṃ patthemi, api ca idaṃ me dānaṃ
atk-s0512a:135_6: sabbaññutaññāṇassa paccayo hotū”ti yathādhikāraṃ cittaṃ ṭhapesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:141: Mama dvāre ṭhitaṃ disvā, sakaṭāhena ākiriṃ.
atk-s0512a:155: “Na tassa dānaṃ dadamāno, yasaṃ lābhañca patthayiṃ;
atk-s0512a:157_0: Tattha tadāti yadā ahaṃ akittināmako tāpaso hutvā tasmiṃ dīpe kārāraññe viharāmi,
atk-s0512a:157_1: tadā. Manti mama. Tapatejenāti sīlapāramitānubhāvena. Sīlañhi duccaritasaṃkilesassa
atk-s0512a:157_2: tapanato “tapo”ti vuccati, nekkhammavīriyapāramitānubhāvena vā. Tāpi hi taṇhāsaṃkilesassa
atk-s0512a:157_3: kosajjassa ca tapanato “tapo”ti vuccati, ukkaṃsagatā ca tā bodhisattassa imasmiṃ
atk-s0512a:157_5: vattuṃ vaṭṭateva. “Khantī paramaṃ tapo”ti hi vuttaṃ. Santattoti yathāvuttaguṇānubhāvajanitena
atk-s0512a:157_6: dhammatāsiddhena paṇḍukambalasilāsanassa uṇhākārena santāpito. Tidivābhibhūti devalokādhipati,
atk-s0512a:157_7: sakkoti attho. Paṇṇasālāya samīpe gahitampi kārapaṇṇaṃ paṇṇasālāya araññamajjhagatattā
atk-s0512a:158_0: Atelañca aloṇikanti deyyadhammassa anuḷārabhāvepi ajjhāsayasampattiyā dānadhammassa
atk-s0512a:158_1: mahājutikabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Mama dvāreti mayhaṃ paṇṇasālāya dvāre. Sakaṭāhena
atk-s0512a:158_2: ākirinti iminā attano kiñcipi asesetvā dinnabhāvaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0512a:159: Punesanaṃ jahitvānāti “ekadivasaṃ dvikkhattuṃ ghāsesanaṃ na sallekha”nti cintetvā dānapītiyā titto viya hutvā tasmiṃ divase puna āhārapariyeṭṭhiṃ akatvā.
atk-s0512a:160_0: Akampitoti sudūravikkhambhitattā macchariyena acalito dānajjhāsayato calanamattampi
atk-s0512a:160_1: akārito. Anolaggoti lobhavasena īsakampi alaggo. Tatiyampīti pi-saddena dutiyampīti
atk-s0512a:160_2: imaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Evamevamadāsahanti yathā paṭhamaṃ, evamevaṃ dutiyampi, tatiyampi adāsiṃ ahaṃ.
atk-s0512a:161_0: Na me tappaccayāti gāthāya vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ karoti. Tattha tappaccayāti dānapaccayā
atk-s0512a:161_1: tīsu divasesu chinnāhāratāya sarīrasmiṃ yena vevaṇṇiyena bhavitabbaṃ, tampi me sarīrasmiṃ
atk-s0512a:161_2: vivaṇṇiyaṃ dānapaccayāyeva natthi. Kasmā? Dānavisayena pītisukhena dānavisayāya eva
atk-s0512a:161_3: ca ratiyā. Vītināmemi taṃ divanti taṃ sakalaṃ timattadivasaṃ vītināmemi, na kevalañca
atk-s0512a:161_4: tīṇi eva divasāni, atha kho māsadvimāsamattampi kālaṃ, evameva dātuṃ pahomīti dassetuṃ
atk-s0512a:161_5: “yadi māsampī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Anolīnoti alīnacitto, dāne asaṅkucitacittoti attho.
atk-s0512a:162_0: Tassāti brāhmaṇarūpena āgatassa sakkassa. Yasanti kittiṃ, parivārasampattiṃ vā. Lābhañcāti
atk-s0512a:162_1: devamanussesu cakkavattiādibhāvena laddhabbaṃ lābhaṃ vā na patthayiṃ. Atha kho sabbaññutaṃ
atk-s0512a:162_2: sammāsambodhiṃ patthayāno ākaṅkhamāno tāni tīsu divasesu anekavāraṃ uppannāni dānamayāni
atk-s0512a:162_3: puññakammāni dānassa vā parivārabhūtāni kāyasucaritādīni puññakammāni ācariṃ akāsinti.
atk-s0512a:163_0: Iti bhagavā tasmiṃ attabhāve attano sudukkaraṃ puññacaritamattameva idha mahātherassa
atk-s0512a:163_1: pakāsesi. Jātakadesanāyaṃ pana catutthadivase sakkassa upasaṅkamitvā bodhisattassa
atk-s0512a:163_2: ajjhāsayajānanaṃ varena upanimantanā bodhisattassa varasampaṭicchanasīsena dhammadesanā
atk-s0512a:163_3: deyyadhammadakkhiṇeyyānaṃ puna sakkassa anāgamanassa ca ākaṅkhamānatā ca pakāsitā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0512a:165: Kiṃ patthayaṃ mahābrahme, eko sammasi ghammani.
atk-s0512a:169: Varaṃ kassapa te dammi, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi.
atk-s0512a:171: Yena putte ca dāre ca, dhanadhaññaṃ piyāni ca;
atk-s0512a:172: Laddhā narā na tappanti, so lobho na mayī vase.
atk-s0512a:176: Yena jātena jīyanti, so doso na mayī vase.
atk-s0512a:179: Bālaṃ na passe na suṇe, na ca bālena saṃvase;
atk-s0512a:180: Bālenallāpasallāpaṃ, na kare na ca rocaye.
atk-s0512a:181: “Kiṃ nu te akaraṃ bālo, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
atk-s0512a:184: Dunnayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto pakuppati;
atk-s0512a:185: Vinayaṃ so na jānāti, sādhu tassa adassanaṃ.
atk-s0512a:188: Dhīraṃ passe suṇe dhīraṃ, dhīrena saha saṃvase;
atk-s0512a:190: “Kiṃ nu te akaraṃ dhīro, vada kassapa kāraṇaṃ;
atk-s0512a:193: Sunayo seyyaso hoti, sammā vutto na kuppati;
atk-s0512a:194: Vinayaṃ so pajānāti, sādhu tena samāgamo.
atk-s0512a:198: Dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṃ, sīlavanto ca yācakā.
atk-s0512a:200: Dadaṃ cittaṃ pasādeyyaṃ, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare.
atk-s0512a:203: Na maṃ puna upeyyāsi, etaṃ sakka varaṃ vare.
atk-s0512a:205: Dassanaṃ abhikaṅkhanti, kiṃ nu me dassane bhayaṃ.
atk-s0512a:207: Disvā tapo pamajjeyyaṃ, etaṃ te dassane bhaya”nti. ;
atk-s0512a:208: Atha sakko “sādhu, bhante, na te ito paṭṭhāya santikaṃ āgamissāmī”ti taṃ abhivādetvā pakkāmi. Mahāsatto yāvajīvaṃ tattheva vasanto āyupariyosāne brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0512a:209: Anuruddhatthero tadā sakko ahosi, lokanātho akittipaṇḍito.
atk-s0512a:210_1: sīlapāramī. Kāmavitakkādīnaṃ suṭṭhu vikkhambhitattā vīriyapāramī. Khantisaṃvarassa
atk-s0512a:210_2: paramukkaṃsagamanato khantipāramī. Paṭiññānurūpaṃ paṭipattiyā saccapāramī. Sabbattha
atk-s0512a:210_5: dhamme jānitvā anupakāre dhamme pahāya upakāradhammesu pavattāpanapurecarā sahajātā
atk-s0512a:210_6: ca upāyakosallabhūtā atisallekhavuttisādhanī ca paññā paññāpāramīti imāpi dasa pāramiyo labbhanti.
atk-s0512a:211_0: Dānajjhāsayassa pana atiuḷārabhāvena dānamukhena desanā pavattā. Tasmā sabbattha
atk-s0512a:211_1: samakā mahākaruṇā, dvepi puññañāṇasambhārā, kāyasucaritādīni tīṇi bodhisattasucaritāni,
atk-s0512a:211_2: saccādhiṭṭhānādīni cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, ussāhādayo catasso buddhabhūmiyo, saddhādayo
atk-s0512a:211_3: pañca mahābodhiparipācanīyā dhammā, alobhajjhāsayādayo cha bodhisattānaṃ ajjhāsayā,
atk-s0512a:211_4: tiṇṇo tāressāmītiādayo satta paṭiññā dhammā, appicchassāyaṃ dhammo, nāyaṃ dhammo
atk-s0512a:211_5: mahicchassātiādayo aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakkā, nava yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā, dānajjhāsayādayo
atk-s0512a:211_6: dasa mahāpurisajjhāsayā, dānasīlādayo dasa puññakiriyavatthūnīti evamādayo ye anekasataanekasahassappabhedā
atk-s0512a:211_7: bodhisambhārabhūtā mahābodhisattaguṇā. Te sabbepi yathārahaṃ idha niddhāretvā vattabbā.
atk-s0512a:212_0: Api cettha mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahantañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya mahābhinikkhamanasadisaṃ
atk-s0512a:212_1: gehato nikkhamanaṃ, nikkhamitvā pabbajitassa bahujanasammatassa sato paramappicchabhāvena
atk-s0512a:212_2: kulesu gaṇesu ca alaggatā, accantameva lābhasakkārasilokajigucchā, pavivekābhirati,
atk-s0512a:212_3: kāyajīvitanirapekkho pariccāgo, anāhārasseva sato divasattayampi dānapītiyā parituṭṭhassa
atk-s0512a:212_4: nibbikārasarīrayāpanaṃ, māsadvimāsamattampi kālaṃ yācake sati āhāraṃ tatheva datvā
atk-s0512a:212_5: “dānagateneva pītisukhena sarīraṃ yāpessāmī”ti pariccāge anolīnavuttisādhako uḷāro
atk-s0512a:212_6: dānajjhāsayo, dānaṃ datvā puna āhārapariyeṭṭhiyā akaraṇahetubhūtā paramasallekhavuttīti
atk-s0512a:212_7: evamādayo mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā veditabbā. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0512a:218: Api laṅgheyya velantaṃ, bodhisattā na dhammataṃ.
atk-s0512a:221: “Yesaṃ ve attani sneho, nihīyati yathā yathā;
atk-s0512a:223: “Yathā cittaṃ vase hoti, na ca cittavasānugā;
atk-s0512a:224: Tathā kammaṃ vase hoti, na ca kammavasānugā.
atk-s0512a:232_0: 11-12. Dutiyasmiṃ punāparanti puna aparaṃ, na kevalamidaṃ akitticariyameva, atha
atk-s0512a:232_1: kho puna aparaṃ aññaṃ saṅkhacariyampi pavakkhissaṃ, suṇohīti adhippāyo. Ito paresupi
atk-s0512a:232_2: eseva nayo. Saṅkhasavhayoti saṅkhanāmo. Mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmoti suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gantuṃ
atk-s0512a:232_3: nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmo. Upagacchāmi paṭṭananti tāmalittipaṭṭanaṃ uddissa
atk-s0512a:232_4: gacchāmi. Sayambhuñāṇena paccekabodhiyā adhigatattā sayameva bhūtanti sayambhuṃ.
atk-s0512a:232_5: Kilesamārādīsu kenacipi na parājitanti aparājitaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā
atk-s0512a:232_6: ṭhitanti attho. Tattāya kaṭhinabhūmiyāti ghammasantāpena santattāya sakkharavālukānicitattā
atk-s0512a:233_0: 13. Tanti taṃ paccekabuddhaṃ. Imamatthanti imaṃ idāni vakkhamānaṃ “idaṃ khetta”ntiādikaṃ
atk-s0512a:233_1: atthaṃ. Vicintayinti tadā saṅkhabrāhmaṇabhūto cintesinti satthā vadati. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā –
atk-s0512a:234_0: Atīte ayaṃ bārāṇasī moḷinī nāma ahosi. Moḷinīnagare brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto
atk-s0512a:234_1: saṅkho nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā aḍḍho mahaddhano catūsu nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe attano
atk-s0512a:234_2: nivesanadvāreti chasu ṭhānesu cha dānasālāyo kāretvā devasikaṃ chasatasahassāni vissajjento
atk-s0512a:234_3: kapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattesi. So ekadivasaṃ cintesi – “ahaṃ gehe dhane khīṇe
atk-s0512a:234_4: dānaṃ dātuṃ na sakkhissāmi, aparikkhīṇeyeva dhane nāvāya suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ gantvā dhanaṃ
atk-s0512a:234_5: āharissāmī”ti. So nāvaṃ bhaṇḍassa pūrāpetvā puttadāraṃ āmantetvā “yāvāhaṃ āgacchissāmi,
atk-s0512a:234_6: tāva me dānaṃ anupacchindantā pavatteyyāthā”ti vatvā dāsakammakaraparivuto upāhanaṃ
atk-s0512a:235_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe gandhamādane eko paccekabuddho sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0512a:235_1: nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento taṃ dhanāharaṇatthaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā
atk-s0512a:235_2: “mahāpuriso dhanaṃ āharituṃ gacchati, bhavissati nu kho assa mahāsamudde antarāyo,
atk-s0512a:235_3: no”ti āvajjetvā “bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “esa maṃ disvā chattañca upāhanañca mayhaṃ datvā
atk-s0512a:235_4: upāhanadānanissandena samudde bhinnāya nāvāya patiṭṭhaṃ labhissati, karissāmissa
atk-s0512a:235_5: anuggaha”nti ākāsena gantvā tassa avidūre otaritvā majjhanhikasamaye caṇḍavātātapena
atk-s0512a:235_6: aṅgārasanthatasadisaṃ uṇhavālukaṃ maddanto tassa abhimukhaṃ āgañchi. So taṃ disvāva
atk-s0512a:235_7: haṭṭhatuṭṭho “puññakkhettaṃ me āgataṃ, ajja mayā ettha bījaṃ ropetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0512a:235_8: Tena vuttaṃ “tamahaṃ paṭipathe disvā, imamatthaṃ vicintayi”ntiādi.
atk-s0512a:236_0: Tattha idaṃ khettantiādi cintitākāradassanaṃ. Khettanti khittaṃ bījaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena
atk-s0512a:236_1: tāyatīti khettaṃ, pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaviruhanabhūmi. Idha pana khettaṃ viyāti khettaṃ,
atk-s0512a:237: 14. Mahāgamanti vipulaphalāgamaṃ, sassasampattidāyakanti attho. Bījaṃ na ropetīti bījaṃ na vapati.
atk-s0512a:239_0: Khettavaruttamanti khettavaresupi uttamaṃ. Sīlādiguṇasampannā hi visesato ariyasāvakā
atk-s0512a:239_1: khettavarā, tatopi aggabhūto paccekabuddho khettavaruttamo. Kāranti sakkāraṃ. Yadi
atk-s0512a:239_2: na karomīti sambandho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – idamīdisaṃ anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0512a:239_3: tattha pūjāsakkāraṃ yadi na karomi, puññena atthiko nāmāhaṃ na bhaveyyanti.
atk-s0512a:240_0: 16-17. Yathā amaccotiādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ gāthānaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – yathā nāma yo koci
atk-s0512a:240_1: raññā muddādhikāre ṭhapito lañchanadharo amaccapuriso senāpati vā so antepure jane
atk-s0512a:240_2: bahiddhā ca balakāyādīsu rañño yathānusiṭṭhaṃ na paṭipajjati na tesaṃ dhanadhaññaṃ
atk-s0512a:240_3: deti, taṃ taṃ kattabbaṃ vattaṃ parihāpeti. So muddito parihāyati muddādhikāraladdhavibhavato
atk-s0512a:240_4: paridhaṃsati, evameva ahampi puññakammassa rato laddhabbapuññaphalasaṅkhātaṃ puññakāmo
atk-s0512a:240_5: dakkhiṇāya vipulaphalabhāvakaraṇena vipulaṃ disvāna taṃ dakkhiṇaṃ uḷāraṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ
atk-s0512a:240_6: labhitvā tassa dānaṃ yadi na dadāmi puññato āyatiṃ puññaphalato ca paridhaṃsāmi.
atk-s0512a:241_0: Evaṃ pana cintetvā mahāpuriso dūratova upāhanā orohitvā vegena upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā
atk-s0512a:241_1: “bhante, mayhaṃ anuggahatthāya imaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagacchathā”ti vatvā tasmiṃ rukkhamūlaṃ
atk-s0512a:241_2: upasaṅkamante tattha vālukaṃ ussāpetvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ paññāpetvā paccekabuddhe tattha
atk-s0512a:241_3: nisinne vanditvā vāsitaparissāvitena udakena tassa pāde dhovitvā, gandhatelena makkhetvā,
atk-s0512a:241_4: attano upāhanaṃ puñchitvā, gandhatelena makkhetvā, tassa pāde paṭimuñcitvā “bhante,
atk-s0512a:241_5: imaṃ upāhanaṃ āruyha, imaṃ chattaṃ matthake katvā gacchathā”ti chattupāhanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0512a:241_6: Sopissa anuggahatthāya taṃ gahetvā pasādasaṃvaḍḍhanatthaṃ passantasseva vehāsaṃ uppatitvā
atk-s0512a:245_0: Bodhisatto taṃ disvā ativiya pasannacitto paṭṭanaṃ gantvā nāvaṃ abhiruhi. Athassa
atk-s0512a:245_1: mahāsamuddaṃ tarantassa sattame divase nāvā vivaramadāsi. Udakaṃ ussiñcituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0512a:245_2: Mahājano maraṇabhayabhīto attano attano devatā namassitvā mahāviravaṃ viravi. Bodhisatto
atk-s0512a:245_3: ekaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ gahetvā sakalasarīraṃ telena makkhetvā sappinā saddhiṃ sakkharacuṇṇāni
atk-s0512a:245_4: yāvadatthaṃ khāditvā tampi khādāpetvā tena saddhiṃ kūpakayaṭṭhimatthakaṃ āruyha “imāya
atk-s0512a:245_5: disāya amhākaṃ nagara”nti disaṃ vavatthapetvā macchakacchapaparipanthato attānaṃ
atk-s0512a:245_6: saccādhiṭṭhānena pamocento tena saddhiṃ usabhamattaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā patitvā samuddaṃ
atk-s0512a:245_7: tarituṃ ārabhi. Mahājano pana tattheva vināsaṃ pāpuṇi. Tassa tarantasseva satta divasā
atk-s0512a:245_8: gatā. So tasmimpi kāle loṇodakena mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā uposathiko ahosiyeva.
atk-s0512a:246_0: Tadā pana īdisānaṃ purisavisesānaṃ rakkhaṇatthāya catūhi lokapālehi ṭhapitā maṇimekhalā
atk-s0512a:246_1: nāma devadhītā attano issariyena sattāhaṃ pamajjitvā sattame divase taṃ disvā “sacāyaṃ
atk-s0512a:246_2: idha marissa, ativiya gārayhā abhavissa”nti saṃviggahadayā suvaṇṇapātiyā dibbabhojanassa
atk-s0512a:246_3: pūretvā vegenāgantvā “brāhmaṇa, idaṃ dibbabhojanaṃ bhuñjā”ti āha. So taṃ ulloketvā
atk-s0512a:247: “Yaṃ tvaṃ sukhenābhisamekkhase maṃ, bhuñjassu bhattaṃ iti maṃ vadesi;
atk-s0512a:248: Pucchāmi taṃ nāri mahānubhāve, devī nusi tvaṃ uda mānusī nū”ti. –
atk-s0512a:251: Anukampikā no ca paduṭṭhacittā, taveva atthāya idhāgatāsmi.
atk-s0512a:253: Sabbassa tyāhaṃ paṭipādayāmi, yaṃ kiñci tuyhaṃ manasābhipatthita”nti. –
atk-s0512a:254_0: Imā gāthā abhāsi. Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ayaṃ devadhītā samuddapiṭṭhe mayhaṃ ‘idañcidañca
atk-s0512a:254_1: dammī’ti vadati, yañcesā mayhaṃ deti, tampi mama puññeneva, taṃ pana puññaṃ ayaṃ
atk-s0512a:254_2: devadhītā jānāti nu kho, udāhu na jānāti, pucchissāmi tāva na”nti cintetvā pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0512a:255: “Yaṃ kiñci yiṭṭhañca hutañca mayhaṃ, sabbassa no issarā tvaṃ sugatte;
atk-s0512a:256: Sussoṇi subbhūru vilaggamajjhe, kissa me kammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti. ;
atk-s0512a:257_0: Tattha yiṭṭhanti dānavasena yajitaṃ. Hutanti āhunapāhunavasena dinnaṃ. Sabbassa no
atk-s0512a:257_1: issarā tvanti amhākaṃ puññakammassa sabbassa tvaṃ issarā, “ayaṃ imassa vipāko, ayaṃ
atk-s0512a:257_2: imassā”ti byākarituṃ samatthā. Sussoṇīti sundarajaghane. Subbhūrūti sundarehi bhamukehi
atk-s0512a:257_3: ūrūhi ca samannāgate. Vilaggamajjheti vilaggatanumajjhe. Kissa meti mayā katakammesu
atk-s0512a:257_4: katarakammassa ayaṃ vipāko, yenāhaṃ appatiṭṭhe mahāsamudde ajja patiṭṭhaṃ labhāmīti.
atk-s0512a:258_0: Taṃ sutvā devadhītā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo ‘yaṃ attanā kusalakammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ kammaṃ na
atk-s0512a:258_1: jānātī’ti saññāya pucchati maññe, kathessāmi na”nti nāvābhiruhanadivase paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0512a:259: “Ghamme pathe brāhmaṇa ekabhikkhuṃ, ugghaṭṭapādaṃ tasitaṃ kilantaṃ;
atk-s0512a:260: Paṭipādayī saṅkha upāhanāni, sā dakkhiṇā kāmaduhā tavajjā”ti. –
atk-s0512a:262_0: Tattha ekabhikkhunti ekaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ sandhāyāha. Ugghaṭṭapādanti uṇhavālukāya
atk-s0512a:262_1: ghaṭṭapādaṃ, vibādhitapādanti attho. Tasitanti pipāsitaṃ. Paṭipādayīti paṭipādesi
atk-s0512a:263: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “evarūpepi nāma appatiṭṭhe mahāsamudde mayā dinnaṃ chattupāhanadānaṃ mama sabbakāmadadaṃ jātaṃ aho sudinna”nti tuṭṭhacitto –
atk-s0512a:265: Aññassa yānassa na hettha bhūmi, ajjeva maṃ moḷiniṃ pāpayassū”ti. –
atk-s0512a:267: Tattha phalakūpapannāti mahānāvatāya bahūhi phalakehi upetā. Udakappavesanābhāvena anavassutā. Sammā gahetvā gamanakavātena erakavātayuttā.
atk-s0512a:268_0: Devadhītā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā dīghato aṭṭhausabhaṃ vitthārato catuusabhaṃ
atk-s0512a:268_1: gambhīrato vīsatiyaṭṭhikaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ nāvaṃ māpetvā kūpaphiyārittayuttāni indanīlarajatasuvaṇṇamayādīni
atk-s0512a:268_2: nimminitvā sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ pūretvā brāhmaṇaṃ āliṅgetvā nāvaṃ āropesi, upaṭṭhākaṃ
atk-s0512a:268_3: panassa na olokesi. Brāhmaṇo attanā katakalyāṇato tassa pattiṃ adāsi, so anumodi.
atk-s0512a:268_4: Atha devadhītā tampi āliṅgetvā nāvāya patiṭṭhāpetvā taṃ nāvaṃ moḷinīnagaraṃ netvā
atk-s0512a:268_5: brāhmaṇassa ghare dhanaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0512a:269: “Sā tattha vittā sumanā patītā, nāvaṃ sucittaṃ abhinimminitvā;
atk-s0512a:270: Ādāya saṅkhaṃ purisena saddhiṃ, upānayī nagaraṃ sādhuramma”nti. ;
atk-s0512a:271_0: Mahāpurisassa hi cittasampattiyā paccekabuddhassa ca nirodhato vuṭṭhitabhāvena sattasu
atk-s0512a:271_1: cetanāsu ādicetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā atiuḷāraphalā ca jātā. Idampi tassa dānassa
atk-s0512a:271_2: appamattaphalanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aparimāṇaphalañhi taṃ dānaṃ bodhisambhārabhūtaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:274: Api ca dānaṃ paripūrento, evaṃ tassa adāsaha”nti.
atk-s0512a:275_0: Tattha tenāti tato paccekabuddhato, sataguṇatoti sataguṇena ahaṃ tadā saṅkhabhūto
atk-s0512a:275_1: sukhumālo, tasmā sukhedhito sukhasaṃvaḍḍho, api ca evaṃ santepi dānaṃ paripūrento,
atk-s0512a:275_2: evaṃ mayhaṃ dānapāramī paripūretūti tassa paccekabuddhassa attano sarīradukkhaṃ anapekkhitvā
atk-s0512a:275_3: chattupāhanaṃ adāsinti attano dānajjhāsayassa uḷārabhāvaṃ satthā pavedesi.
atk-s0512a:276: Bodhisattopi yāvajīvaṃ amitadhanagehaṃ ajjhāvasanto bhiyyosomattāya dānāni datvā sīlāni rakkhitvā āyupariyosāne sapariso devanagaraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0512a:277: Tadā devadhītā uppalavaṇṇā ahosi, puriso ānandatthero, lokanātho saṅkhabrāhmaṇo.
atk-s0512a:278_2: tathā mahāsamuddataraṇavāyāmavasena ca vīriyapāramī, tadatthaṃ adhivāsanakhantivasena
atk-s0512a:278_5: majjhattabhāvappattiyā upekkhāpāramī, sabbapāramīnaṃ upakārānupakāre dhamme jānitvā
atk-s0512a:278_6: anupakāre dhamme pahāya upakāradhammesu pavattāpanapurecarā sahajātā ca upāyakosallabhūtā
atk-s0512a:279_0: Dānajjhāsayassa pana atiuḷārabhāvena dānapāramīvasena desanā pavattā. Yasmā cettha
atk-s0512a:279_1: dasa pāramiyo labbhanti, tasmā heṭṭhā vuttā mahākaruṇādayo bodhisattaguṇā idhāpi
atk-s0512a:279_2: yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbā. Tathā attano bhogasukhaṃ anapekkhitvā mahākaruṇāya “dānapāramiṃ
atk-s0512a:279_3: pūressāmī”ti dānasambhārasaṃharaṇatthaṃ samuddataraṇaṃ, tattha ca samuddapatitassapi
atk-s0512a:279_4: uposathādhiṭṭhānaṃ, sīlakhaṇḍabhayena devadhītāyapi upagatāya āhārānāharaṇanti evamādayo
atk-s0512a:279_5: mahāsattassa guṇā veditabbā. Idāni vakkhamānesu sesacaritesu imināva nayena guṇaniddhāraṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:279_6: veditabbaṃ. Tattha tattha visesamattameva vakkhāma. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
atk-s0512a:285_0: Tatiye indapatthe puruttameti indapatthanāmake kururaṭṭhassa puravare uttamanagare.
atk-s0512a:285_1: Rājāti dhammena samena catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ rañjetīti rājā. Kusale dasahupāgatoti
atk-s0512a:285_2: kusalehi dasahi samannāgato, dānādīhi dasahi puññakiriyavatthūhi, dasahi kusalakammapathehi vā yuttoti attho.
atk-s0512a:286_0: 21. Kaliṅgaraṭṭhavisayāti kaliṅgaraṭṭhasaṅkhātavisayā. Brāhmaṇā upagañchu manti kaliṅgarājena
atk-s0512a:286_1: uyyojitā aṭṭha brāhmaṇā maṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu. Upasaṅkamitvā ca pana āyācuṃ maṃ hatthināganti
atk-s0512a:286_2: hatthibhūtaṃ mahānāgaṃ maṃ āyāciṃsu. Dhaññanti dhanāyitabbasirisobhaggappattaṃ lakkhaṇasampannaṃ.
atk-s0512a:286_3: Maṅgalasammatanti tāyayeva lakkhaṇasampattiyā maṅgalaṃ abhivuḍḍhikāraṇanti abhisammataṃ janehi.
atk-s0512a:287_0: 22. Avuṭṭhikoti vassarahito. Dubbhikkhoti dullabhabhojano. Chātako mahāti mahatī
atk-s0512a:287_1: jighacchābādhā vattatīti attho. Dadāhīti dehi. Nīlanti nīlavaṇṇaṃ. Añjanasavhayanti
atk-s0512a:287_2: añjanasaddena avhātabbaṃ, añjananāmakanti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – amhākaṃ kaliṅgaraṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0512a:287_3: avuṭṭhikaṃ, tena idāni mahādubbhikkhaṃ tattha mahantaṃ chātakabhayaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa
atk-s0512a:287_4: vūpasamatthāya imaṃ añjanagirisaṅkāsaṃ tuyhaṃ añjananāmakaṃ maṅgalahatthiṃ dehi,
atk-s0512a:287_5: imasmiñhi tattha nīte devo vassissati, tena taṃ sabbabhayaṃ vūpasammissatīti. Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā –
atk-s0512a:288_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe indapatthanagare bodhisatto kururājassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0512a:288_1: gahetvā anupubbena viññutaṃ patto, takkasilaṃ gantvā yogavihitāni sippāyatanāni vijjāṭṭhānāni
atk-s0512a:288_2: ca uggahetvā paccāgato pitarā uparajje ṭhapito, aparabhāge pitu accayena rajjaṃ patvā
atk-s0512a:288_3: dasa rājadhamme akopento dhammena rajjaṃ kāresi dhanañjayo nāma nāmena. So catūsu
atk-s0512a:288_4: nagaradvāresu nagaramajjhe nivesanadvāreti cha dānasālāyo kāretvā devasikaṃ chasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0512a:288_5: dhanaṃ vissajjento sakalajambudīpaṃ unnaṅgalaṃ katvā dānaṃ adāsi. Tassa dānajjhāsayatā
atk-s0512a:289_0: Tasmiṃ kāle kaliṅgaraṭṭhe dubbhikkhabhayaṃ chātakabhayaṃ rogabhayanti tīṇi bhayāni
atk-s0512a:289_1: uppajjiṃsu. Sakalaraṭṭhavāsino dantapuraṃ gantvā rājabhavanadvāre ukkuṭṭhimakaṃsu
atk-s0512a:289_2: “devaṃ vassāpehi devā”ti. Rājā taṃ sutvā “kiṃkāraṇā ete viravantī”ti amacce pucchi.
atk-s0512a:289_3: Amaccā rañño tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Rājā porāṇakarājāno deve avassante kiṃ karontīti.
atk-s0512a:289_4: “Devo vassatū”ti dānaṃ datvā uposathaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samādinnasīlā sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0512a:289_5: dabbasanthare sattāhaṃ nipajjantīti. Taṃ sutvā tathā akāsi. Devo na vassi, evaṃ rājā
atk-s0512a:289_6: ahaṃ mayā kattabbakiccaṃ akāsiṃ, devo na vassati, kinti karomāti. Deva, indapatthanagare
atk-s0512a:289_7: dhanañjayassa nāma kururājassa maṅgalahatthimhi ānīte devo vassissatīti. So rājā
atk-s0512a:289_8: balavāhanasampanno duppasaho, kathamassa hatthiṃ ānessāmāti. Mahārāja, tena saddhiṃ
atk-s0512a:289_9: yuddhakiccaṃ natthi, dānajjhāsayo so rājā dānābhirato yācito samāno alaṅkatasīsampi
atk-s0512a:289_10: chinditvā pasādasampannāni akkhīnipi uppāṭetvā sakalarajjampi niyyātetvā dadeyya,
atk-s0512a:289_11: hatthimhi vattabbameva natthi, avassaṃ yācito samāno dassatīti. Ke pana yācituṃ samatthāti?
atk-s0512a:289_12: Brāhmaṇā, mahārājāti. Rājā aṭṭha brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā sakkārasammānaṃ katvā paribbayaṃ
atk-s0512a:289_13: datvā hatthiyācanatthaṃ pesesi. Te sabbattha ekarattivāsena turitagamanaṃ gantvā
atk-s0512a:289_14: katipāhaṃ nagaradvāre dānasālāsu bhuñjantā sarīraṃ santappetvā rañño dānaggaṃ āgamanapathe
atk-s0512a:290_1: mahantena rājānubhāvena dānasālaṃ gantvā otaritvā sattaṭṭhajanānaṃ sahatthena dānaṃ
atk-s0512a:290_2: datvā “imināva nīhārena dethā”ti vatvā hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā dakkhiṇadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0512a:290_3: Brāhmaṇā pācīnadvāre ārakkhassa balavatāya okāsaṃ alabhitvā dakkhiṇadvāraṃ gantvā
atk-s0512a:290_4: rājānaṃ āgacchantaṃ ullokayamānā dvārato nātidūre unnataṭṭhāne ṭhitā sampattaṃ rājānaṃ
atk-s0512a:290_5: hatthe ukkhipitvā jayāpesuṃ. Rājā vajiraṅkusena vāraṇaṃ nivattetvā tesaṃ santikaṃ
atk-s0512a:290_6: gantvā te brāhmaṇe “kiṃ icchathā”ti pucchi. Brāhmaṇā “kaliṅgaraṭṭhaṃ dubbhikkhabhayena
atk-s0512a:290_7: chātakabhayena rogabhayena ca upaddutaṃ. So upaddavo imasmiṃ tava maṅgalahatthimhi
atk-s0512a:290_8: nīte vūpasammissati. Tasmā imaṃ añjanavaṇṇaṃ nāgaṃ amhākaṃ dehī”ti āhaṃsu. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0512a:290_9: pakāsento satthā āha “kaliṅgaraṭṭhavisayā…pe… añjanasavhaya”nti. Tassattho vutto eva.
atk-s0512a:291_0: Atha bodhisatto “na metaṃ patirūpaṃ, yaṃ me yācakānaṃ manorathavighāto siyā, mayhañca
atk-s0512a:291_1: samādānabhedo siyā”ti hatthikkhandhato otaritvā “sace analaṅkataṭṭhānaṃ atthi, alaṅkaritvā
atk-s0512a:291_2: dassāmī”ti samantato oloketvā analaṅkataṭṭhānaṃ adisvā soṇḍāya naṃ gahetvā brāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0512a:291_3: hatthesu ṭhapetvā ratanabhiṅgārena pupphagandhavāsitaṃ udakaṃ pātetvā adāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:294: Mā me bhijji samādānaṃ, dassāmi vipulaṃ gajaṃ.
atk-s0512a:297: Jalaṃ hatthe ākiritvā, brāhmaṇānaṃ adaṃ gaja”nti.
atk-s0512a:298_0: Tattha yācakamanuppatteti yācake anuppatte. Anucchavoti anucchaviko patirūpo. Mā
atk-s0512a:298_1: me bhijji samādānanti sabbaññutaññāṇatthāya sabbassa yācakassa sabbaṃ anavajjaṃ icchitaṃ
atk-s0512a:298_2: dadanto dānapāramiṃ pūressāmīti yaṃ mayhaṃ samādānaṃ, taṃ mā bhijji. Tasmā dassāmi
atk-s0512a:298_3: vipulaṃ gajanti mahantaṃ imaṃ maṅgalahatthiṃ dassāmīti. Adanti adāsiṃ.
atk-s0512a:300_0: Tasmiṃ pana hatthimhi dinne amaccā bodhisattaṃ etadavocuṃ – “kasmā, mahārāja, maṅgalahatthiṃ
atk-s0512a:300_1: dadattha, nanu añño hatthī dātabbo, raññā nāma evarūpo opavayho maṅgalahatthī issariyaṃ
atk-s0512a:300_2: abhivijayañca ākaṅkhantena na dātabbo”ti. Mahāsatto yaṃ maṃ yācakā yācanti, tadeva
atk-s0512a:300_3: mayā dātabbaṃ, sace pana maṃ rajjaṃ yāceyyuṃ, rajjampi tesaṃ dadeyyaṃ, mayhaṃ rajjatopi
atk-s0512a:300_4: jīvitatopi sabbaññutaññāṇameva piyataraṃ, tasmā taṃ hatthiṃ adāsinti āha. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0512a:300_5: “tassa nāge padinnamhī”tiādi. Tattha tassāti tassa tena, tasmiṃ nāge hatthimhi dinne.
atk-s0512a:301_1: uttamaṃ, saṅgāmavijaye vā uttamaṃ padhānaṃ pavaraṃ nāgaṃ. Kiṃ te rajjaṃ karissatīti
atk-s0512a:301_2: tasmiṃ nāge apagate tava rajjaṃ kiṃ karissati, rajjakiccaṃ na karissati, rajjampi
atk-s0512a:302_0: 27. Rajjampi me dade sabbanti tiṭṭhatu nāgo tiracchānagato, idaṃ me sabbaṃ kururaṭṭhampi
atk-s0512a:302_1: yācakānaṃ dadeyyaṃ. Sarīraṃ dajjamattanoti rajjepi vā kiṃ vattabbaṃ, attano sarīrampi
atk-s0512a:302_2: yācakānaṃ dadeyyaṃ, sabbopi hi me ajjhattikabāhiro pariggaho lokahitatthameva mayā
atk-s0512a:302_3: pariccatto. Yasmā sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ sabbaññutā ca dānapāramiṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbapāramiyo
atk-s0512a:302_4: apūrentena na sakkā laddhuṃ, tasmā nāgaṃ adāsiṃ ahanti dasseti.
atk-s0512a:303_0: Evampi tasmiṃ nāge ānīte kaliṅgaraṭṭhe devo na vassateva. Kaliṅgarājā “idānipi na
atk-s0512a:303_1: vassati, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti pucchitvā “kururājā garudhamme rakkhati, tenassa raṭṭhe
atk-s0512a:303_2: anvaddhamāsaṃ anudasāhaṃ devo vassati, rañño guṇānubhāvo esa, na imassa tiracchānagatassā”ti
atk-s0512a:303_3: jānitvā “mayampi garudhamme rakkhissāma, gacchatha dhanañcayakorabyassa santike te
atk-s0512a:303_4: suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhāpetvā ānethā”ti amacce pesesi. Garudhammā vuccanti pañca sīlāni,
atk-s0512a:303_5: tāni bodhisatto suparisuddhāni katvā rakkhati, yathā ca bodhisatto. Evamassa mātā
atk-s0512a:303_6: aggamahesī, kaniṭṭhabhātā uparājā, purohito brāhmaṇo, rajjuggāhako amacco, sārathi
atk-s0512a:303_7: seṭṭhi, doṇamāpako dovāriko, nagarasobhinī vaṇṇadāsīti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:305: Rajjuggāho sārathī seṭṭhi, doṇo dovāriko tathā;
atk-s0512a:307_0: Te amaccā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Mahāsatto “mayhaṃ
atk-s0512a:307_1: garudhamme kukkuccaṃ atthi, mātā pana me surakkhitaṃ rakkhati, tassā santike gaṇhathā”ti
atk-s0512a:307_2: vatvā tehi “mahārāja, kukkuccaṃ nāma sikkhākāmassa sallekhavuttino hoti, detha no”ti
atk-s0512a:307_3: yācito “pāṇo na hantabbo, adinnaṃ na ādātabbaṃ, kāmesumicchācāro na caritabbo, musā
atk-s0512a:307_4: na bhaṇitabbaṃ, majjaṃ na pātabba”nti suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhāpetvā “evaṃ santepi mātu
atk-s0512a:308_0: Dūtā rājānaṃ vanditvā tassā santikaṃ gantvā “devi, tumhe kira garudhammaṃ rakkhatha,
atk-s0512a:308_1: taṃ no dethā”ti vadiṃsu. Bodhisattassa mātāpi tatheva attano kukkuccassa atthibhāvaṃ
atk-s0512a:308_2: vatvāva tehi yācitā adāsi. Tathā mahesiādayopi. Te sabbesampi santike suvaṇṇapaṭṭe
atk-s0512a:308_3: garudhamme likhāpetvā dantapuraṃ gantvā kaliṅgarañño datvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0512a:308_4: Sopi rājā tasmiṃ dhamme vattamāno pañca sīlāni pūresi. Tato sakalakaliṅgaraṭṭhe devo
atk-s0512a:308_5: vassi. Tīṇi bhayāni vūpasantāni. Raṭṭhaṃ khemaṃ subhikkhaṃ ahosi. Bodhisatto yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0512a:308_6: dānādīni puññāni katvā sapariso saggapuraṃ pūresi.
atk-s0512a:311: Rajjuggāho ca kaccāno, doṇamāpako ca kolito.
atk-s0512a:316: Idhāpi nekkhammapāramiādayo sesadhammā ca vuttanayeneva niddhāretabbāti.
atk-s0512a:319_0: 28. Catutthe kusāvatimhi nagareti kusāvatīnāmake nagare, yasmiṃ ṭhāne etarahi kusinārā
atk-s0512a:319_1: niviṭṭhā. Mahīpatīti khattiyo, nāmena mahāsudassano nāma. Cakkavattīti cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0512a:319_2: vatteti catūhi vā sampatticakkehi vattati, tehi ca paraṃ pavatteti, parahitāya ca
atk-s0512a:319_3: iriyāpathacakkānaṃ vatto etasmiṃ atthītipi cakkavattī. Atha vā catūhi acchariyadhammehi
atk-s0512a:319_4: saṅgahavatthūhi ca samannāgatena, parehi anabhibhavanīyassa anatikkamanīyassa āṇāsaṅkhātassa
atk-s0512a:319_5: cakkassa vatto etasmiṃ atthītipi cakkavattī. Pariṇāyakaratanapubbaṅgamena hatthiratanādipamukhena
atk-s0512a:319_6: mahābalakāyena puññānubhāvanibbattena kāyabalena ca samannāgatattā mahabbalo. Yadā
atk-s0512a:320_0: Atīte kira mahāpuriso sudassanattabhāvato tatiye attabhāve gahapatikule nibbatto
atk-s0512a:320_1: dharamānakassa buddhassa sāsane ekaṃ theraṃ araññavāsaṃ vasantaṃ attano kammena araññaṃ
atk-s0512a:320_2: paviṭṭho rukkhamūle nisinnaṃ disvā “idha mayā ayyassa paṇṇasālaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0512a:320_3: cintetvā attano kammaṃ pahāya dabbasambhāraṃ chinditvā nivāsayoggaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ katvā
atk-s0512a:320_4: dvāraṃ yojetvā kaṭṭhattharaṇaṃ katvā “karissati nu kho paribhogaṃ, na nu kho karissatī”ti
atk-s0512a:320_5: ekamante nisīdi. Thero antogāmato āgantvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā kaṭṭhattharaṇe nisīdi.
atk-s0512a:320_6: Mahāsattopi naṃ upasaṅkamitvā “phāsukā, bhante, paṇṇasālā”ti pucchi. Phāsukā, bhaddamukha,
atk-s0512a:320_7: pabbajitasāruppāti. Vasissatha, bhante, idhāti? Āma, upāsakāti. So adhivāsanākāreneva
atk-s0512a:320_8: “vasissatī”ti ñatvā “nibaddhaṃ mayhaṃ gharadvāraṃ āgantabba”nti paṭijānāpetvā niccaṃ
atk-s0512a:320_9: attano ghareyeva bhattavissaggaṃ kārāpesi. So paṇṇasālāyaṃ kaṭasārakaṃ pattharitvā
atk-s0512a:320_10: mañcapīṭhaṃ paññapesi, apassenaṃ nikkhipi, pādakaṭhalikaṃ ṭhapesi, pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇi,
atk-s0512a:320_11: caṅkamaṃ katvā vālukaṃ okiri, parissayavinodanatthaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ kaṇṭakavatiyā parikkhipi,
atk-s0512a:320_12: tathā pokkharaṇiṃ caṅkamañca. Tesaṃ antovatipariyante tālapantiyo ropesi. Evamādinā
atk-s0512a:320_13: āvāsaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā therassa ticīvaraṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ samaṇaparikkhāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0512a:320_16: nāma nāhosi. So pañca sīlāni rakkhanto uposathaṃ karonto yāvajīvaṃ theraṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0512a:320_17: Thero tattheva vasanto arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0512a:321_0: 29. Bodhisattopi yāvatāyukaṃ puññaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattitvā tato cuto manussalokaṃ
atk-s0512a:321_1: āgacchanto kusāvatiyā rājadhāniyā nibbattitvā mahāsudassano nāma rājā ahosi cakkavattī.
atk-s0512a:321_2: Tassissariyānubhāvo “bhūtapubbaṃ, ānanda, rājā mahāsudassano nāma ahosi khattiyo
atk-s0512a:321_3: muddhāvasitto”tiādinā nayena sutte āgato eva. Tassa kira caturāsīti nagarasahassāni
atk-s0512a:321_5: kūṭāgārasahassāni mahābyūhakūṭāgārappamukhāni, tāni sabbāni tassa therassa katāya
atk-s0512a:321_6: ekissā paṇṇasālāya nissandena nibbattāni, caturāsīti pallaṅkasahassāni nāgasahassāni
atk-s0512a:321_7: assasahassāni rathasahassāni tassa dinnassa mañcapīṭhassa, caturāsīti maṇisahassāni
atk-s0512a:321_8: tassa dinnassa padīpassa, caturāsīti pokkharaṇisahassāni ekapokkharaṇiyā, caturāsīti
atk-s0512a:321_12: nissandena nibbattāni. So sattahi ratanehi catūhi iddhīhi ca samannāgato rājādhirājā
atk-s0512a:321_13: hutvā sakalaṃ sāgarapariyantaṃ pathavimaṇḍalaṃ dhammena abhivijiya ajjhāvasanto anekasatesu
atk-s0512a:321_14: ṭhānesu dānasālāyo kāretvā mahādānaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Divasassa tikkhattuṃ nagare bheriṃ
atk-s0512a:321_15: carāpesi “yo yaṃ icchati, so dānasālāsu āgantvā taṃ gaṇhātū”ti. Tena vuttaṃ “tatthāhaṃ
atk-s0512a:322_0: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ nagare. “Tadāha”ntipi pāṭho, tassa tadā ahaṃ, mahāsudassanakāleti
atk-s0512a:322_1: attho. Tahiṃ tahinti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne, tassa tassa pākārassa anto ca bahi cāti
atk-s0512a:322_2: attho. Ko kiṃ icchatīti brāhmaṇādīsu yo koci satto annādīsu deyyadhammesu yaṃ kiñci
atk-s0512a:322_3: icchati. Patthetīti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Kassa kiṃ dīyatu dhananti anekavāraṃ pariyāyantarehi
atk-s0512a:322_4: ca dānaghosanāya pavattitabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, etena dānapāramiyā sarūpaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0512a:323: 30. Idāni dānaghosanāya tassa tassa deyyadhammassa anucchavikapuggalaparikittanaṃ dassetuṃ “ko chātako”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a:324_0: Tattha chātakoti jighacchito. Tasitoti pipāsito. Ko mālaṃ ko vilepanantipi “icchatī”ti
atk-s0512a:324_1: padaṃ ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. Naggoti vatthavikalo, vatthena atthikoti adhippāyo. Paridahissatīti nivāsissati.
atk-s0512a:325_0: 31. Ko pathe chattamādetīti ko pathiko pathe magge attano vassavātātaparakkhaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0512a:325_1: chattaṃ gaṇhāti, chattena atthikoti attho. Kopāhanā mudū subhāti dassanīyatāya subhā
atk-s0512a:325_2: sukhasamphassatāya mudū upāhanā attano pādānaṃ cakkhūnañca rakkhaṇatthaṃ. Ko ādetīti
atk-s0512a:325_3: ko tāhi atthikoti adhippāyo. Sāyañca pāto cāti ettha ca-saddena majjhanhike cāti
atk-s0512a:325_4: āharitvā vattabbaṃ. “Divase tikkhattuṃ ghosāpemī”ti hi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a:326_0: 32. Na taṃ dasasu ṭhānesūti taṃ dānaṃ na dasasu ṭhānesu paṭiyattanti yojanā. Napi
atk-s0512a:326_1: ṭhānasatesu vā paṭiyattaṃ, api ca kho anekasatesu ṭhānesu paṭiyattaṃ. Yācake dhananti
atk-s0512a:326_2: yācake uddissa dhanaṃ paṭiyattaṃ upakkhaṭaṃ. Dvādasayojanāyāme hi nagare sattayojanavitthate
atk-s0512a:326_3: sattasu pākārantaresu satta tālapantiparikkhepā, tāsu tālapantīsu caturāsīti pokkharaṇisahassāni
atk-s0512a:326_4: pāṭiyekkaṃ pokkharaṇitīre mahādānaṃ paṭṭhapitaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
atk-s0512a:327_0: “Paṭṭhapesi kho, ānanda, rājā mahāsudassano tāsaṃ pokkharaṇīnaṃ tīre evarūpaṃ dānaṃ
atk-s0512a:327_1: annaṃ annatthikassa, pānaṃ pānatthikassa, vatthaṃ vatthatthikassa, yānaṃ yānatthikassa,
atk-s0512a:327_2: sayanaṃ sayanatthikassa, itthiṃ itthitthikassa, hiraññaṃ hiraññatthikassa, suvaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:328_0: 33. Tatthāyaṃ dānassa pavattitākāro – mahāpuriso hi itthīnañca purisānañca anucchavike
atk-s0512a:328_1: alaṅkāre kāretvā itthimattameva tattha paricāravasena sesañca sabbaṃ pariccāgavasena
atk-s0512a:328_2: ṭhapetvā “rājā mahāsudassano dānaṃ deti, taṃ yathāsukhaṃ paribhuñjathā”ti bheriṃ
atk-s0512a:328_3: carāpesi. Mahājanā pokkharaṇitīraṃ gantvā nhatvā vatthādīni nivāsetvā mahāsampattiṃ
atk-s0512a:328_4: anubhavitvā yesaṃ tādisāni atthi, te pahāya gacchanti. Yesaṃ natthi, te gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0512a:328_5: Ye hatthiyānādīsupi nisīditvā yathāsukhaṃ vicaritvā varasayanesupi sayitvā sampattiṃ
atk-s0512a:328_6: anubhavitvā itthīhipi saddhiṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā sattavidharatanapasādhanāni pasādhetvā
atk-s0512a:328_7: sampattiṃ anubhavitvā yaṃ yaṃ atthikā, taṃ taṃ gahetvā gacchanti, anatthikā ohāya
atk-s0512a:328_8: gacchanti. Tampi dānaṃ uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya devasikaṃ dīyateva. Tadā jambudīpavāsīnaṃ
atk-s0512a:328_9: aññaṃ kammaṃ natthi, dānaṃ paribhuñjantā sampattiṃ anubhavantā vicaranti. Na tassa
atk-s0512a:328_10: dānassa kālaparicchedo ahosi. Rattiñcāpi divāpi yadā yadā atthikā āgacchanti, tadā
atk-s0512a:328_11: tadā dīyateva. Evaṃ mahāpuriso yāvajīvaṃ sakalajambudīpaṃ unnaṅgalaṃ katvā mahādānaṃ
atk-s0512a:328_12: pavattesi. Tena vuttaṃ “divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, yadi eti vanibbako”tiādi.
atk-s0512a:329_0: Tattha divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, yadi etīti etenassa yathākālaṃ dānaṃ dasseti. Yācakānañhi
atk-s0512a:329_1: lābhāsāya upasaṅkamanakālo eva bodhisattānaṃ dānassa kālo nāma. Vanibbakoti yācako.
atk-s0512a:329_2: Laddhā yadicchakaṃ bhoganti etena yathābhirucitaṃ dānaṃ. Yo yo hi yācako yaṃ yaṃ
atk-s0512a:329_3: deyyadhammaṃ icchati, tassa tassa taṃtadeva bodhisatto deti. Na tassa mahagghadullabhādibhāvaṃ
atk-s0512a:329_4: attano uparodhaṃ cintesi. Pūrahatthova gacchatīti etena yāvadicchakaṃ dānaṃ dasseti,
atk-s0512a:329_5: yattakañhi yācakā icchanti, tattakaṃ aparihāpetvāva mahāsatto deti uḷārajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0512a:330_0: 34. “Yāvajīvika”nti etena dānassa kālapariyantābhāvaṃ dasseti. Samādānato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0512a:330_1: hi mahāsattā yāvapāripūri vemajjhe na kālaparicchedaṃ karonti, bodhisambhārasambharaṇe
atk-s0512a:330_2: saṅkocābhāvena antarantarā avosānāpattito maraṇenapi anupacchedo eva, tato parampi
atk-s0512a:330_3: tatheva paṭipajjanato, “yāvajīvika”nti pana mahāsudassanacaritassa vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a:330_4: Napāhaṃ dessaṃ dhanaṃ dammīti idaṃ dhanaṃ nāma mayhaṃ na dessaṃ amanāpanti evarūpaṃ
atk-s0512a:330_5: mahādānaṃ dento gehato ca dhanaṃ nīharāpemi. Napi natthi nicayo mayīti mama samīpe
atk-s0512a:330_6: dhananicayo dhanasaṅgaho nāpi natthi, sallekhavuttisamaṇo viya asaṅgahopi na homīti
atk-s0512a:330_7: attho. Idaṃ yena ajjhāsayena tassidaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattitaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0512a:331_0: 35. Idāni taṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathāpi āturo nāmā”tiādimāha. Tatthidaṃ upamāsaṃsandanena
atk-s0512a:331_1: saddhiṃ atthadassanaṃ – yathā nāma āturo rogābhibhūto puriso rogato attānaṃ parimocetukāmo
atk-s0512a:331_2: dhanena hiraññasuvaṇṇādinā vejjaṃ tikicchakaṃ tappetvā ārādhetvā yathāvidhi paṭipajjanto
atk-s0512a:332_0: 36. Tatheva evameva ahampi aṭṭabhūtaṃ sakalalokaṃ kilesarogato sakalasaṃsāradukkharogato
atk-s0512a:332_1: ca parimocetukāmo tassa tato parimocanassa ayaṃ sabbasāpateyyapariccāgo dānapāramiupāyoti
atk-s0512a:332_2: jānamāno bujjhamāno asesato deyyadhammassa paṭiggāhakānañca vasena anavasesato mahādānassa
atk-s0512a:332_3: vasena sattānaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ paripūretuṃ attano ca na mayhaṃ dānapāramī paripuṇṇā,
atk-s0512a:332_4: tasmā ūnamananti pavattaṃ ūnaṃ manaṃ pūrayituṃ pavattayituṃ vanibbake yācake adāsiṃ
atk-s0512a:332_5: taṃ dānaṃ evarūpaṃ mahādānaṃ dadāmi, tañca kho tasmiṃ dānadhamme tassa ca phale nirālayo
atk-s0512a:332_6: anapekkho apaccāso kiñcipi apaccāsīsamāno kevalaṃ sambodhimanupattiyā sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhigantuṃ demīti.
atk-s0512a:333_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto mahādānaṃ pavattento attano puññānubhāvanibbattaṃ dhammapāsādaṃ abhiruyha
atk-s0512a:333_1: mahābyūhakūṭāgāradvāre eva kāmavitakkādayo nivattetvā tattha sovaṇṇamaye rājapallaṅke
atk-s0512a:333_2: nisinno jhānābhiññāyo nibbattetvā tato nikkhamitvā sovaṇṇamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0512a:333_3: tattha rajatamaye pallaṅke nisinno cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā caturāsīti vassasahassāni
atk-s0512a:333_4: jhānasamāpattīhi vītināmetvā maraṇasamaye dassanāya upagatānaṃ subhaddādevīpamukhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:336: Imāya gāthāya ovaditvā āyupariyosāne brahmalokaparāyano ahosi.
atk-s0512a:337: Tadā subhaddādevī rāhulamātā ahosi, pariṇāyakaratanaṃ rāhulo, sesaparisā buddhaparisā, mahāsudassano pana lokanātho.
atk-s0512a:338_0: Idhāpi dasa pāramiyo sarūpato labbhanti eva, dānajjhāsayassa pana uḷāratāya dānapāramī
atk-s0512a:338_1: eva pāḷiyaṃ āgatā. Sesadhammā heṭṭhā vuttanayā eva. Tathā uḷāre sattaratanasamujjale
atk-s0512a:338_2: catudīpissariyepi ṭhitassa tādisaṃ bhogasukhaṃ analaṅkaritvā kāmavitakkādayo dūrato
atk-s0512a:338_3: vikkhambhetvā tathārūpe mahādāne pavattentasseva caturāsīti vassasahassāni samāpattīhi
atk-s0512a:338_4: vītināmetvā aniccatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ katvāpi vipassanāya anussukkanaṃ
atk-s0512a:341_0: Pañcame sattarājapurohitoti sattabhūādīnaṃ sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ sabbakiccānusāsakapurohito.
atk-s0512a:341_1: Pūjito naradevehīti tehi eva aññehi ca jambudīpe sabbeheva khattiyehi catupaccayapūjāya
atk-s0512a:341_2: sakkārasammānena ca pūjito. Mahāgovindabrāhmaṇoti mahānubhāvatāya govindassābhisekena
atk-s0512a:341_3: abhisittatāya ca “mahāgovindo”ti saṅkhaṃ gato brāhmaṇo, abhisittakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0512a:341_4: hi bodhisattassa ayaṃ samaññā jātā, nāmena pana jotipālo nāma. Tassa kira jātadivase
atk-s0512a:341_5: sabbāvudhāni jotiṃsu. Rājāpi paccūsasamaye attano maṅgalāvudhaṃ pajjalitaṃ disvā
atk-s0512a:341_6: bhīto attano purohitaṃ bodhisattassa pitaraṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgataṃ pucchitvā “mā bhāyi,
atk-s0512a:341_7: mahārāja, mayhaṃ putto jāto, tassānubhāvena na kevalaṃ rājageheyeva, sakalanagarepi
atk-s0512a:341_8: āvudhāni pajjaliṃsu, na taṃ nissāya tuyhaṃ antarāyo atthi, sakalajambudīpe pana paññāya
atk-s0512a:341_9: tena samo na bhavissati, tassetaṃ pubbanimitta”nti purohitena samassāsito tuṭṭhacitto
atk-s0512a:341_10: “kumārassa khīramūlaṃ hotū”ti sahassaṃ datvā “vayappattakāle mayhaṃ dassethā”ti āha.
atk-s0512a:341_11: So vuddhippatto aparabhāge alamatthadasso sattannaṃ rājūnaṃ sabbakiccānusāsako hutvā
atk-s0512a:341_12: pabbajitvā ca satte diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikehi anatthehi pāletvā atthehi niyojesi.
atk-s0512a:341_13: Iti jotitattā pālanasamatthatāya ca “jotipālo”tissa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ “nāmena jotipālo nāmā”ti.
atk-s0512a:342_0: Tattha bodhisatto disampatissa nāma rañño purohitassa govindabrāhmaṇassa putto hutvā
atk-s0512a:342_1: attano pitu tassa ca rañño accayena tassa putto reṇu, sahāyā cassa sattabhū, brahmadatto,
atk-s0512a:342_2: vessabhū, bharato, dve ca dhataraṭṭhāti ime satta rājāno yathā aññamaññaṃ na vivadanti.
atk-s0512a:342_3: Evaṃ rajje patiṭṭhāpetvā tesaṃ atthadhamme anusāsanto jambudīpatale sabbesaṃ rājūnaṃ
atk-s0512a:342_4: aññesañca brāhmaṇānaṃ devanāgagahapatikānaṃ sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito
atk-s0512a:342_5: uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhānaṃ patto ahosi. Tassa atthadhammesu kusalatāya “mahāgovindo”tveva
atk-s0512a:342_6: samaññā udapādi. Yathāha “govindo vata, bho brāhmaṇo, mahāgovindo vata, bho brāhmaṇo”ti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:346_0: Atha bodhisattassa puññānubhāvasamussāhitehi rājūhi tesaṃ anuyuttehi khattiyehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi
