atk-s0512a:986_3: pabbajjājātivasena sahajātā, tenevāha “ekasāsanī”ti. “Ekasāsanī”ti ca idaṃ bhummatthe
atk-s0512a:986_4: paccattaṃ, ekasāsaniyāti attho. Nayantiyāti nīyantiyā. Kopo me upapajjathāti ayaṃ
atk-s0512a:986_5: te gihikāle bhariyā brāhmaṇī sīlavatī, pabbajitakāle ca sabrahmacārinībhāvato sahajātā
atk-s0512a:986_6: bhaginī, sā tuyhaṃ purato balakkārena ākaḍḍhitvā nīyati. “Bodhibrāhmaṇa, kiṃ te purisabhāva”nti
atk-s0512a:986_7: purisamānena ussāhito cirakālasayito vammikabilato kenaci purisena ghaṭṭito “susū”ti
atk-s0512a:986_8: phaṇaṃ karonto āsiviso viya me cittato kopo sahasā vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0512a:987_0: 34-5. Sahakope samuppanneti kopuppattiyā saha, tassa uppattisamanantaramevāti attho.
atk-s0512a:987_1: Sīlabbatamanussarinti attano sīlapāramiṃ āvajjesiṃ. Tattheva kopaṃ niggaṇhinti tasmiṃ
atk-s0512a:987_2: eva āsane yathānisinnova taṃ kopaṃ nivāresiṃ. Nādāsiṃ vaḍḍhitūparīti tato ekavāruppattito
atk-s0512a:987_3: upari uddhaṃ vaḍḍhituṃ na adāsiṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kope uppannamatte eva “nanu
atk-s0512a:987_4: tvaṃ, bodhiparibbājaka, sabbapāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitukāmo,
atk-s0512a:987_5: tassa te kimidaṃ sīlamattepi upakkhalanaṃ, tayidaṃ gunnaṃ khuramattodake osīdantassa
atk-s0512a:987_6: mahāsamuddassa paratīraṃ gaṇhitukāmatā viya hotī”ti attānaṃ paribhāsitvā paṭisaṅkhānabalena
atk-s0512a:987_7: tasmiṃ eva khaṇe kopaṃ niggahetvā puna uppajjanavasenassa vaḍḍhituṃ na adāsinti.
atk-s0512a:988_0: Tassattho – taṃ paribbājikaṃ brāhmaṇiṃ so rājā vā añño vā koci tiṇhāyapi nisitāya
atk-s0512a:988_1: sattiyā koṭṭeyya, khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ yadi chindeyya, evaṃ santepi sīlaṃ attano sīlapāramiṃ
atk-s0512a:988_2: neva bhindeyyaṃ. Kasmā? Bodhiyā eva kāraṇā, sabbattha akhaṇḍitasīleneva sakkā sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0512a:989_0: 36. Na me sā brāhmaṇī dessāti sā brāhmaṇī jātiyā gottena kulappadesena ācārasampattiyā
atk-s0512a:989_1: ciraparicayena pabbajjādiguṇasampattiyā cāti sabbappakārena na me dessā na appiyā,
atk-s0512a:989_2: etissā mama appiyabhāvo koci natthi. Napi me balaṃ na vijjatīti mayhampi balaṃ na
atk-s0512a:989_3: na vijjati, atthi eva. Ahaṃ nāgabalo thāmasampanno, icchamāno sahasā vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0512a:989_4: taṃ ākaḍḍhante purise nippothetvā taṃ gahetvā yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantuṃ samatthoti
atk-s0512a:989_5: dasseti. Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhanti tato paribbājikato sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena
atk-s0512a:989_6: sabbaññutaññāṇameva mayhaṃ piyaṃ. Tasmā sīlānurakkhissanti tena kāraṇena sīlameva anurakkhissaṃ.
atk-s0512a:990_0: Atha so rājā uyyāne papañcaṃ akatvāva sīghataraṃ gantvā taṃ paribbājikaṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0512a:990_1: mahantena yasena nimantesi. Sā yasassa aguṇaṃ pabbajjāya guṇaṃ attano bodhisattassa
atk-s0512a:990_2: ca mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya saṃvegena pabbajitabhāvañca kathesi. Rājā kenaci
atk-s0512a:990_3: pariyāyena tassā manaṃ alabhanto cintesi – “ayaṃ paribbājikā sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā,
atk-s0512a:990_4: sopi paribbājako imāya ākaḍḍhitvā nīyamānāya na kiñci vippakāraṃ dassesi, sabbattha
atk-s0512a:990_5: nirapekkhacitto, na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ, yaṃ evarūpesu guṇavantesu vippakāro,
atk-s0512a:990_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ paribbājikaṃ gahetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā imaṃ, tañca paribbājakaṃ khamāpeyya”nti?
atk-s0512a:990_7: Evaṃ pana cintetvā “paribbājikaṃ uyyānaṃ ānethā”ti purise āṇāpetvā sayaṃ paṭhamataraṃ
atk-s0512a:990_8: gantvā bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi – “bho pabbajita, kiṃ mayā tāya paribbājikāya
atk-s0512a:990_9: nīyamānāya kopo te uppajjitthā”ti. Mahāsatto āha –
atk-s0512a:991: “Uppajji me na muccittha, na me muccittha jīvato;
atk-s0512a:993: Taṃ sutvā rājā “kiṃ nu kho esa kopameva sandhāya vadati, udāhu aññaṃ kiñci sippādika”nti cintetvā puna pucchi –
atk-s0512a:994: “Kiṃ te uppajji no mucci, kiṃ te no mucci jīvato;
atk-s0512a:995: Rajaṃva vipulā vuṭṭhi, katamaṃ taṃ nivārayī”ti. ;
atk-s0512a:996_0: Tattha uppajjīti ekavāraṃ uppajji, na puna uppajji. Na muccitthāti kāyavacīvikāruppādanavasena
atk-s0512a:996_1: pana na muccittha, na naṃ bahi pavattituṃ vissajjesinti attho. Rajaṃva vipulā vuṭṭhīti
atk-s0512a:996_2: yathā nāma gimhānaṃ pacchime māse uppannaṃ rajaṃ vipulā akālavuṭṭhidhārā ṭhānaso
atk-s0512a:996_3: nivāreti, evaṃ taṃ vūpasamento nivārayiṃ, nivāresinti attho.
atk-s0512a:997: Athassa mahāpuriso nānappakārena kodhe ādīnavaṃ pakāsento –
atk-s0512a:998: “Yamhi jāte na passati, ajāte sādhu passati;
atk-s0512a:999: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0512a:1001: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0512a:1003: So me uppajji no mucci, kodho dummedhagocaro.
atk-s0512a:1005: Sa bhīmaseno balavā pamaddī, kodho mahārājā na me amuccatha.
atk-s0512a:1007: Tameva kaṭṭhaṃ ḍahati, yasmā so jāyate gini.
atk-s0512a:1009: Sārambhā jāyate kodho, sapi teneva ḍayhati.
atk-s0512a:1015_0: Tattha na passatīti attatthampi na passati, pageva paratthaṃ. Sādhu passatīti attatthaṃ
atk-s0512a:1015_1: paratthaṃ ubhayatthañca sammadeva passati. Dummedhagocaroti nippaññānaṃ visayabhūto,
atk-s0512a:1015_2: nippañño vā gocaro āhāro indhanaṃ etassāti dummedhagocaro. Dukkhamesinoti dukkhaṃ
atk-s0512a:1015_3: icchantā. Sadatthanti attano atthaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ. Parakkareti apaneyya vināseyya. Sabhīmasenoti
atk-s0512a:1015_4: so bhīmāya bhayajananiyā mahatiyā kilesasenāya samannāgato. Pamaddīti balavabhāvena
atk-s0512a:1015_5: satte pamaddanasīlo. Na me amuccathāti mama santikā mokkhaṃ na labhi, abbhantare
atk-s0512a:1015_6: eva damito, nibbisevano katoti attho. Khīraṃ viya vā muhuttaṃ dadhibhāvena cittena
atk-s0512a:1016_0: Manthamānasminti araṇisahite mathiyamāne. “Mathamānasmi”ntipi pāṭho. Yasmāti yato
atk-s0512a:1016_1: kaṭṭhā. Ginīti aggi. Bālassa avijānatoti bālassa ajānantassa. Sārambhā jāyateti karaṇuttariyakaraṇalakkhaṇā
atk-s0512a:1016_2: sārambhā araṇimanthanato viya pāvako kodho jāyate. Sapi tenevāti sopi bālo teneva
atk-s0512a:1016_3: kodhena kaṭṭhaṃ viya agginā ḍayhati. Anindho dhūmaketūvāti anindhano aggi viya. Tassāti
atk-s0512a:1016_4: tassa adhivāsanakhantiyā samannāgatassa puggalassa sukkapakkhe cando viya laddho,
atk-s0512a:1017_0: Rājā mahāsattassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā mahāpurisaṃ paribbājikampi rājagehato āgataṃ
atk-s0512a:1017_1: khamāpetvā “tumhe pabbajjāsukhaṃ anubhavantā idheva uyyāne vasatha, ahaṃ vo dhammikaṃ
atk-s0512a:1017_2: rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā vanditvā pakkāmi. Te ubhopi tattheva vasiṃsu.
atk-s0512a:1017_3: Aparabhāge paribbājikā kālamakāsi. Bodhisatto himavantaṃ pavisitvā jhānābhiññāyo
atk-s0512a:1018: Tadā paribbājikā rāhulamātā ahosi, rājā ānandatthero, bodhiparibbājako lokanātho.
atk-s0512a:1019_0: Tassa idhāpi yathārahaṃ sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. Tathā mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ
atk-s0512a:1019_1: mahantañca ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ pahāya mahābhinikkhamanasadisaṃ gehato nikkhamanaṃ, tathā
atk-s0512a:1019_2: nikkhamitvā pabbajitassa bahujanasammatassa sato paramappicchatāya kulesu ca gaṇesu
atk-s0512a:1019_3: ca alaggatā, accantameva lābhasakkārajigucchāya pavivekābhirati, atisayavatī ca abhisallekhavutti,
atk-s0512a:1019_4: tathārūpāya sīlavatiyā kalyāṇadhammāya paribbājikāya ananuññātā attano purato balakkārena
atk-s0512a:1019_5: parāmasiyamānāya sīlapāramiṃ āvajjetvā vikārānāpatti, katāparādhe ca tasmiṃ rājini
atk-s0512a:1019_6: upagate hitacittataṃ mettacittataṃ upaṭṭhapetvā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikehi samanusāsananti
atk-s0512a:1019_7: evamādayo idha mahāpurisassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbā. Tenetaṃ vuccati “evaṃ acchariyā
atk-s0512a:1022_0: 37. Pañcame mahiṃso pavanacārakoti mahāvanacārī vanamahiṃso yadā homīti yojanā. Pavaḍḍhakāyoti
atk-s0512a:1022_1: vayasampattiyā aṅgapaccaṅgānañca thūlabhāvena abhivaḍḍhakāyo. Balavāti mahābalo thāmasampanno.
atk-s0512a:1022_2: Mahantoti vipulasarīro. Hatthikalabhappamāṇo kira tadā bodhisattassa kāyo hoti. Bhīmadassanoti
atk-s0512a:1022_3: mahāsarīratāya vanamahiṃsajātitāya ca sīlaṃ ajānantānaṃ bhayaṃ jananato bhayānakadassano.
atk-s0512a:1023: 38. Pabbhāreti olambakasilākucchiyaṃ. Dakāsayeti jalāsayasamīpe. Hotettha ṭhānanti ettha mahāvane yo koci padeso vanamahiṃsānaṃ tiṭṭhanaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tahiṃ tahinti tattha tattha.
atk-s0512a:1024_0: 39. Vicarantoti vihāraphāsukaṃ vīmaṃsituṃ vicaranto. Ṭhānaṃ addasa bhaddakanti evaṃ
atk-s0512a:1024_1: vicaranto tasmiṃ mahāraññe bhaddakaṃ mayhaṃ phāsukaṃ rukkhamūlaṭṭhānaṃ addakkhiṃ.
atk-s0512a:1024_2: Disvā ca taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagantvāna, tiṭṭhāmi ca sayāmi ca gocaraṃ gahetvā divā taṃ rukkhamūlaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1025_0: 40. Tadā kira bodhisatto himavantappadese mahiṃsayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā vayappatto thāmasampanno
atk-s0512a:1025_2: ekaṃ phāsukaṃ mahārukkhamūlaṃ disvā gocaraṃ gahetvā divā tattha vasati. Atheko lolamakkaṭo
atk-s0512a:1025_3: rukkhā otaritvā mahāsattassa piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhitvā uccārapassāvaṃ katvā siṅgesu gaṇhitvā
atk-s0512a:1025_4: olambanto naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā dolāyanto kīḷi. Bodhisatto khantimettānuddayasampadāya
atk-s0512a:1025_5: taṃ tassa anācāraṃ na manasākāsi. Makkaṭo punappunaṃ tatheva karoti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0512a:1026_0: Tattha kapi māgantvāti kapi āgantvā, ma-kāro padasandhikaro. Pāpoti lāmako. Anariyoti
atk-s0512a:1026_1: anaye iriyanena aye ca na iriyanena anariyo, nihīnācāroti attho. Lahūti lolo. Khandheti
atk-s0512a:1026_2: khandhappadese. Muttetīti passāvaṃ karoti. Ohadetīti karīsaṃ ossajjati. Tanti taṃ
atk-s0512a:1027_0: 41. Sakimpi divasanti ekadivasampi dūseti maṃ sabbakālampi. Tenāha “dūseti maṃ sabbakāla”nti.
atk-s0512a:1027_1: Na kevalañca dutiyatatiyacatutthadivasamattaṃ, atha kho sabbakālampi maṃ passāvādīhi
atk-s0512a:1027_2: dūseti. Yadā yadā muttādīni kātukāmo, tadā tadā mayhameva upari karotīti dasseti.
atk-s0512a:1027_3: Upaddutoti bādhito, tena siṅgesu olambanādinā muttādiasucimakkhaṇena tassa ca apaharaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0512a:1027_4: anekavāraṃ siṅgakoṭīhi vālaggena ca anekavāraṃ kaddamapaṃsumissakaṃ udakaṃ siñcitvā
atk-s0512a:1028_0: 42. Yakkhoti tasmiṃ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā. Maṃ idamabravīti rukkhakkhandhe ṭhatvā
atk-s0512a:1028_1: “mahiṃsarāja, kasmā imassa duṭṭhamakkaṭassa avamānaṃ sahasī”ti imamatthaṃ pakāsento
atk-s0512a:1028_2: nāsehetaṃ chavaṃ pāpaṃ, siṅgehi ca khurehi cāti idaṃ vacanaṃ maṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0512a:1029_0: 43. Evaṃ vutte tadā yakkheti tadā tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ yakkhe evaṃ vutte sati. Ahaṃ
atk-s0512a:1029_1: taṃ idamabravinti ahaṃ taṃ yakkhaṃ idaṃ idāni vakkhamānaṃ abraviṃ abhāsiṃ. Kuṇapenāti
atk-s0512a:1029_3: ca kuṇapasadisatāya kuṇapena. Pāpenāti pāṇātipātapāpena. Anariyenāti anariyānaṃ asādhūnaṃ
atk-s0512a:1029_4: māgavikanesādādīnaṃ hīnapurisānaṃ dhammattā anariyena, kiṃ kena kāraṇena, tvaṃ devate
atk-s0512a:1029_5: maṃ makkhesi, ayuttaṃ tayā vuttaṃ maṃ pāpe niyojentiyāti dasseti.
atk-s0512a:1030_0: 44. Idāni tasmiṃ pāpadhamme ādīnavaṃ pakāsento “yadiha”ntiādimāha. Tassattho – bhadde
atk-s0512a:1030_1: devate, ahaṃ tassa yadi kujjheyyaṃ, tatopi lāmakataro bhaveyyaṃ. Yena hi adhammacaraṇena
atk-s0512a:1030_2: so bālamakkaṭo nihīno nāma jāto, sace panāhaṃ tatopi balavataraṃ pāpadhammaṃ careyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a:1030_3: nanu tena tato pāpataro bhaveyyaṃ, aṭṭhānañcetaṃ yadihaṃ idhalokaparalokaṃ taduttari
atk-s0512a:1030_4: ca jānitvā ṭhito ekanteneva parahitāya paṭipanno evarūpaṃ pāpadhammaṃ careyyanti.
atk-s0512a:1030_5: Kiñca bhiyyo – sīlañca me pabhijjeyyāti ahañceva kho pana evarūpaṃ pāpaṃ kareyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a:1030_6: mayhaṃ sīlapāramī khaṇḍitā siyā. Viññū ca garaheyyu manti paṇḍitā ca devamanussā
atk-s0512a:1030_7: maṃ garaheyyuṃ “passatha, bho, ayaṃ bodhisatto bodhipariyesanaṃ caramāno evarūpaṃ pāpaṃ akāsī”ti.
atk-s0512a:1031_0: 45. Hīḷitā jīvitā vāpīti vā-saddo avadhāraṇe. Evaṃ viññūhi hīḷitā garahitā jīvitāpi
atk-s0512a:1031_1: parisuddhena parisuddhasīlena hutvā mataṃ vā maraṇameva varaṃ uttamaṃ seyyo. Kyāhaṃ
atk-s0512a:1031_2: jīvitahetupi, kāhāmi paraheṭhananti evaṃ jānanto ca ahaṃ mayhaṃ jīvitanimittampi
atk-s0512a:1031_3: parasattavihiṃsanaṃ kiṃ kāhāmi kiṃ karissāmi, etassa karaṇe kāraṇaṃ natthīti attho.
atk-s0512a:1032_0: Ayaṃ pana aññepi maṃ viya maññamāno evaṃ anācāraṃ karissati, tato yesaṃ caṇḍamahiṃsānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1032_1: evaṃ karissati, te eva etaṃ vadhissanti, sā etassa aññehi māraṇā mayhaṃ dukkhato
atk-s0512a:1032_2: ca pāṇātipātato ca mutti bhavissatīti āha. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1035: Teva tassa vadhissanti, sā me mutti bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0512a:1036: Tattha mamevāyanti maṃ viya ayaṃ. Aññepīti aññesampi. Sesaṃ vuttatthameva.
atk-s0512a:1037_0: 47. Hīnamajjhimaukkaṭṭheti hīne ca majjhime ca ukkaṭṭhe ca nimittabhūte. Sahanto
atk-s0512a:1037_1: avamānitanti vibhāgaṃ akatvā tehi pavattitaṃ avamānaṃ paribhavaṃ sahanto khamanto.
atk-s0512a:1037_2: Evaṃ labhati sappaññoti evaṃ hīnādīsu vibhāgaṃ akatvā khantimettānuddayaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0512a:1037_3: tadaparādhaṃ sahanto sīlādipāramiyo brūhetvā manasā yathāpatthitaṃ yathicchitaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:1037_4: labhati paṭivijjhati, tassa taṃ na dūreti.
atk-s0512a:1038_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto attano ajjhāsayaṃ pakāsento devatāya dhammaṃ desesi. So katipāhaccayena
atk-s0512a:1038_1: aññattha gato. Añño caṇḍamahiṃso nivāsaphāsutāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā aṭṭhāsi. Duṭṭhamakkaṭo
atk-s0512a:1038_2: “so eva aya”nti saññāya tassa piṭṭhiṃ abhiruhitvā tatheva anācāraṃ akāsi. Atha naṃ
atk-s0512a:1038_3: so vidhunanto bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā siṅgena hadaye vijjhitvā pādehi madditvā sañcuṇṇesi.
atk-s0512a:1040: Tassa idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yathārahaṃ sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. Tathā hatthināga- bhūridatta- campeyyanāgarāja- cariyāsu viya idha mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā veditabbā.
atk-s0512a:1043_0: 48. Chaṭṭhe sutattakanakasannibhoti yathā suṭṭhu apagatasabbakāḷako hoti, evaṃ aggimhi
atk-s0512a:1043_1: pakkhipitvā sutattakanakasannibho. Migarājā ruru nāmāti jātisiddhena nāmena ruru
atk-s0512a:1043_2: nāma migarājā, jātito ruru, migānañca rājāti attho. Paramasīlasamāhitoti uttamasīlasamāhito,
atk-s0512a:1043_3: visuddhasīlo ceva samāhitacitto ca, visuddhasīle vā sammā āhitacittoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:1044_0: Tadā bodhisatto rurumigayoniyaṃ nibbatti. Tassa sarīracchavi suṭṭhu tāpetvā majjitakañcanapaṭṭavaṇṇo
atk-s0512a:1044_1: ahosi, hatthapādā lākhārasaparikammakatā viya, naṅguṭṭhaṃ camarīnaṅguṭṭhaṃ viya,
atk-s0512a:1044_2: siṅgāni rajatadāmavaṇṇāni akkhīni sumajjitamaṇiguḷikā viya, mukhaṃ odahitvā ṭhapitarattakambalageṇḍukā
atk-s0512a:1044_3: viya. So janasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya vivekavāsaṃ vasitukāmo parivāraṃ chaḍḍetvā ekakova
atk-s0512a:1044_4: gaṅgānivattane ramaṇīye sālamissake supupphitapavane vasati. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1048_0: Tattha ramme padeseti muttātalasadisavālukācuṇṇapaṇḍarehi bhūmibhāgehi siniddhaharitatiṇasañcaritehi
atk-s0512a:1048_1: vanatthalehi cittattharaṇehi viya nānāvaṇṇavicittehi silātalehi maṇikkhandhanimmalasalilehi
atk-s0512a:1048_2: jalāsayehi ca samannāgatattā yebhuyyena ca indagopakavaṇṇāya rattāya sukhasamphassāya
atk-s0512a:1048_5: vanagahanehi upasobhitattā tattha paviṭṭhassa janassa ratijananaṭṭhena ramaṇīye.
atk-s0512a:1051_0: Vivitteti janavāsavirahena suññe. Amanussaketi sañcaraṇamanussānampi tattha abhāvena
atk-s0512a:1051_1: manussarahite. Manorameti yathāvuttaguṇasampattiyā visesato pavivekakāmānaṃ mano rametīti manorame.
atk-s0512a:1052_0: 50. Atha uparigaṅgāyāti ettha athāti adhikāre nipāto, tena mayi tattha tathā vasante
atk-s0512a:1052_1: idaṃ adhikārantaraṃ uppannanti dīpeti. Uparigaṅgāyāti gaṅgāya nadiyā uparisote. Dhanikehi
atk-s0512a:1052_2: paripīḷitoti iṇaṃ gahetvā taṃ dātuṃ asakkonto iṇāyikehi codiyamāno.
atk-s0512a:1053_0: Eko kira bārāṇasiseṭṭhi attano puttaṃ “ayaṃ sippaṃ uggaṇhanto kilamissatī”ti kiñci
atk-s0512a:1053_1: sippaṃ na uggaṇhāpesi. Gītavāditanaccakhādanabhojanato uddhaṃ na kiñci aññāsi. Taṃ
atk-s0512a:1053_2: vayappattaṃ patirūpena dārena saṃyojetvā dhanaṃ niyyātetvā mātāpitaro kālamakaṃsu.
atk-s0512a:1053_3: So tesaṃ accayena itthidhuttasurādhuttādiparivuto nānābyasanamukhehi sabbaṃ dhanaṃ
atk-s0512a:1053_4: viddhaṃsetvā tattha tattha iṇaṃ ādāya tampi dātuṃ asakkonto dhanikehi codiyamāno
atk-s0512a:1053_5: “kiṃ mayhaṃ jīvitena, tenevamhi attabhāvena añño viya jāto, maraṇaṃ me seyyo”ti cintetvā
atk-s0512a:1053_6: iṇāyike āha – “tumhākaṃ iṇapaṇṇāni gahetvā āgacchatha, gaṅgātīre me nihitaṃ kulasantakaṃ
atk-s0512a:1053_7: dhanaṃ atthi, taṃ vo dassāmī”ti. Te tena saddhiṃ agamaṃsu. So “idha dhanaṃ, ettha
atk-s0512a:1053_8: dhana”nti nidhiṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto viya “evaṃ me iṇamokkho bhavissatī”ti palāyitvā
atk-s0512a:1053_9: gaṅgāyaṃ pati. So caṇḍasotena vuyhanto kāruññaravaṃ ravi. Tena vuttaṃ “atha uparigaṅgāyā”tiādi.
atk-s0512a:1054: Tattha jīvāmi vā marāmi vāti imasmiṃ gaṅgāsote patito jīvāmi vā marāmi vā, jīvitaṃ vā me ettha hotu maraṇaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi iṇāyikapīḷā na hotīti adhippāyo.
atk-s0512a:1055_0: 51. Majjhe gaṅgāya gacchatīti so puriso rattindivaṃ gaṅgāya vuyhamāno jīvitapemassa
atk-s0512a:1055_1: vijjamānattā maraṇaṃ appatto maraṇabhayatajjito hutvā karuṇaṃ ravaṃ ravanto gaṅgāya
atk-s0512a:1056_0: 52. Atha mahāpuriso aḍḍharattasamaye tassa taṃ karuṇaṃ paridevantassa paridevitasaddaṃ
atk-s0512a:1056_1: sutvā “manussasaddo sūyati, mā mayi idha dharante maratu, jīvitamassa dassāmī”ti
atk-s0512a:1056_2: cintetvā sayanagumbā vuṭṭhāya nadītīraṃ gantvā “ambho purisa, mā bhāyi, jīvitaṃ te
atk-s0512a:1056_3: dassāmī”ti vatvā assāsetvā sotaṃ chindanto gantvā taṃ piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā tīraṃ pāpetvā
atk-s0512a:1056_4: attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ netvā parissamaṃ vinodetvā phalāphalāni datvā dvīhatīhaccayena
atk-s0512a:1056_5: taṃ āha – “ambho purisa, ahaṃ taṃ bārāṇasigāmimaggaṃ pāpessāmi, tvaṃ ‘asukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0512a:1056_6: nāma kañcanamigo vasatī’ti mā kassaci ārocehī”ti. So “sādhu, sāmī”ti sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0512a:1056_7: Mahāsatto taṃ attano piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā bārāṇasimagge otāretvā nivatti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0512a:1057: Tattha kosi tvaṃ naroti tvaṃ ko manusso asi, kuto idha vuyhamāno āgatosīti attho.
atk-s0512a:1058: 53. Attano karaṇanti attano kiriyaṃ. Dhanikehi bhītoti iṇāyikehi ubbiggo. Tasitoti utrasto.
atk-s0512a:1059_0: 54. Tassa katvāna kāruññaṃ, cajitvā mama jīvitanti kāruññaṃ katvā mahākaruṇāya samussāhito
atk-s0512a:1059_1: mama jīvitaṃ tassa purisassa pariccajitvā. Pavisitvā nīhariṃ tassāti nadiṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0512a:1059_2: sotaṃ chindanto ujukameva gantvā mama piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā tato taṃ nīhariṃ. Tassāti
atk-s0512a:1059_3: upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. “Tatthā”tipi pāḷi, tattha nadiyanti attho. Andhakāramhi
atk-s0512a:1060_0: 55. Assatthakālamaññāyāti parissamaṃ apanetvā phalāphalāni datvā dvīhatīhaccayena
atk-s0512a:1060_1: kilamathassa vigatakālaṃ jānitvā. Ekaṃ taṃ varaṃ yācāmīti ahaṃ taṃ ekaṃ varaṃ yācāmi,
atk-s0512a:1060_2: mayhaṃ ekaṃ varaṃ dehīti attho. Kiṃ taṃ varanti ce? Āha – mā maṃ kassaci pāvadāti
atk-s0512a:1060_3: “asukaṭṭhāne suvaṇṇamigo vasatī”ti kassaci rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā maṃ mā pāvada.
atk-s0512a:1061_0: Atha tasmiṃ purise bārāṇasiṃ paviṭṭhadivaseyeva so rājā “ahaṃ, deva, suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:1061_1: migaṃ mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desentaṃ supinena addasaṃ, ahañhi saccasupinā, addhā so vijjati,
atk-s0512a:1061_2: tasmā kañcanamigassa dhammaṃ sotukāmā labhissāmi ce jīvissāmi, no ce me jīvitaṃ natthī”ti
atk-s0512a:1061_3: aggamahesiyā vutto taṃ assāsetvā “sace manussaloke atthi, labhissasī”ti vatvā brāhmaṇe
atk-s0512a:1061_4: pakkosāpetvā “suvaṇṇamigā nāma hontī”ti pucchitvā “āma, deva, hontī”ti sutvā sahassatthavikaṃ
atk-s0512a:1061_5: suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭake ṭhapetvā taṃ hatthikkhandhaṃ āropetvā nagare bheriṃ carāpesi – “yo
atk-s0512a:1061_6: suvaṇṇamigaṃ ācikkhissati, tassa hatthinā saddhiṃ imaṃ dassāmī”ti. Tato uttarimpi dātukāmo hutvā –
atk-s0512a:1064_0: Gāthaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭe likhāpetvā sakalanagare vācāpesi. Atha so seṭṭhiputto taṃ gāthaṃ
atk-s0512a:1064_1: sutvā rājapurisānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “rañño evarūpaṃ migaṃ ācikkhissāmi, maṃ rājānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1064_2: dassethā”ti āha. Rājapurisā taṃ rañño santikaṃ netvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Rājā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0512a:1064_3: bho, addasā”ti pucchi. So “saccaṃ, deva, mayā saddhiṃ āgacchatu, ahaṃ taṃ dassessāmī”ti
atk-s0512a:1064_4: āha. Rājā tameva purisaṃ maggadesakaṃ katvā mahantena parivārena taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā
atk-s0512a:1064_5: tena mittadubbhinā purisena dassitaṃ padesaṃ āvudhahatthe purise samantatova parivāretvā
atk-s0512a:1064_6: “ukkuṭṭhiṃ karothā”ti vatvā sayaṃ katipayehi janehi saddhiṃ ekamante aṭṭhāsi. Sopi
atk-s0512a:1064_7: puriso avidūre aṭṭhāsi. Mahāsatto saddaṃ sutvā “mahato balakāyassa saddo, addhā tamhā
atk-s0512a:1064_8: me purisā bhayena uppannena bhavitabba”nti ñatvā uṭṭhāya sakalaparisaṃ oloketvā “rañño
atk-s0512a:1064_9: ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva me sotthi bhavissatī”ti rājābhimukho pāyāsi. Rājā taṃ āgacchantaṃ
atk-s0512a:1064_10: disvā “nāgabalo avattharanto āgaccheyyā”ti saraṃ sannayhitvā “imaṃ migaṃ santāsetvā
atk-s0512a:1064_11: sace palāyati, vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā gaṇhissāmī”ti bodhisattābhimukho ahosi. Mahāsatto –
atk-s0512a:1066: Ko nu te idamakkhāsi, ettheso tiṭṭhate migo”ti. –
atk-s0512a:1067_0: Gāthaṃ abhāsi. Rājā tassa madhurakathāya bajjhitvā saraṃ paṭisaṃharitvā gāravena
atk-s0512a:1067_1: aṭṭhāsi. Mahāsattopi rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ akāsi. Mahājanopi
atk-s0512a:1067_2: sabbāvudhāni apanetvā āgantvā rājānaṃ parivāresi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1071_0: Tassattho – yo mittadubbhī pāpapuriso jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā tathā mayā pāṇasaṃsayato
atk-s0512a:1071_1: mocito bārāṇasinagaraṃ gantvā attanā laddhabbadhananimittaṃ rañño maṃ ācikkhi, ācikkhitvā
atk-s0512a:1071_2: so rañño gāhāpetuṃ maggadesako hutvā rājānaṃ gahetvā mama santikamupāgamīti.
atk-s0512a:1072_0: Mahāsatto suvaṇṇakiṅkiṇikaṃ cālento viya madhurassarena rājānaṃ puna pucchi – “ko
atk-s0512a:1072_1: nu te idamakkhāsi, ettheso tiṭṭhate migo”ti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe so pāpapuriso thokaṃ paṭikkamitvā
atk-s0512a:1072_2: sotapathe aṭṭhāsi. Rājā “iminā me tvaṃ dassito”ti taṃ purisaṃ niddisi. Tato bodhisatto –
atk-s0512a:1074: Kaṭṭhaṃ niplavitaṃ seyyo, na tvevekacciyo naro”ti. –
atk-s0512a:1076: “Kiṃ nu ruru garahasi migānaṃ, kiṃ pakkhīnaṃ kiṃ pana mānusānaṃ;
atk-s0512a:1077: Bhayañhi maṃ vindatinapparūpaṃ, sutvāna taṃ mānusiṃ bhāsamāna”nti. –
atk-s0512a:1078: Gāthamāha. Tato mahāpuriso “mahārāja, na migaṃ na pakkhiṃ garahāmi, manussaṃ pana garahāmī”ti dassento –
atk-s0512a:1080: Tatonidānaṃ bhayamāgataṃ mama, dukkho have rāja asabbhi saṅgamo”ti. –
atk-s0512a:1082_0: Tattha niplavitanti uddharitaṃ, ekacciyoti ekacco mittadubbhī pāpapuriso udake patantopi
atk-s0512a:1082_1: uttārito natveva seyyo. Kaṭṭhañhi nānappakārena upakārāya saṃvattati, mittadubbhī
atk-s0512a:1082_2: pana vināsāya, tasmā tato kaṭṭhameva varataranti. Migānanti rurumigarāja, migānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1082_3: kiṃ aññataraṃ garahasi, udāhu pakkhīnaṃ manussānanti pucchati. Bhayañhi maṃ vindatinapparūpanti
atk-s0512a:1082_4: mahantaṃ bhayaṃ maṃ paṭilabhati, attano santakaṃ viya karotīti attho.
atk-s0512a:1083_0: Vāhaneti patitapatite vahituṃ samatthe gaṅgāvahe. Mahodake salileti mahodakībhūte
atk-s0512a:1083_1: salile. Ubhayenāpi gaṅgāvahassa bahūdakataṃ dasseti. Tato nidānanti, mahārāja, yo
atk-s0512a:1083_2: mayhaṃ tayā dassito puriso, eso mayā gaṅgāya vuyhamāno aḍḍharattasamaye karuṇaṃ paridevanto
atk-s0512a:1083_3: tato uttārito, tatonidānaṃ idaṃ mayhaṃ bhayamāgataṃ, asappurisehi samāgamo nāma dukkhoti.
atk-s0512a:1084: Taṃ sutvā rājā tassa kujjhitvā “evaṃ bahūpakārassa nāma guṇaṃ na jānāti, dukkhaṃ uppādeti, vijjhitvā naṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpessāmī”ti saraṃ sannayhi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1087: Rājā sutvāna vacanaṃ, usuṃ tassa pakappayi;
atk-s0512a:1089: Tattha yāvatā karaṇanti yaṃ tassa mayā kataṃ upakārakaraṇaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ. Pakappayīti sannayhi. Mittadubbhinti attano mittesu upakārīsu dubbhanasīlaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1090_0: Tato mahāsatto “esa bālo maṃ nissāya mā nassī”ti cintetvā “mahārāja, vadho nāmesa
atk-s0512a:1090_1: bālassa vā paṇḍitassa vā na sādhūhi pasaṃsito, aññadatthu garahito eva, tasmā mā
atk-s0512a:1090_2: imaṃ ghātehi, ayaṃ yathāruci gacchatu, yañceva tassa ‘dassāmī’ti tayā paṭiññātaṃ,
atk-s0512a:1090_3: tampi ahāpetvāva dehī”ti āha. “Ahañca te yaṃ icchitaṃ, taṃ karissāmi, attānaṃ tuyhaṃ
atk-s0512a:1094_0: Tattha nimmininti taṃ mittadubbhiṃ pāpapuggalaṃ anurakkhanto mama attano attabhāvena
atk-s0512a:1094_1: taṃ parivattesiṃ, attānaṃ rañño niyyātetvā rājahatthato pattaṃ tassa maraṇaṃ nivāresinti
atk-s0512a:1095_0: 59. Idāni yadatthaṃ so attavinimayo kato, taṃ dassetuṃ osānagāthamāha. Tassattho
atk-s0512a:1095_1: – tadā maṃ nissāya taṃ mittadubbhiṃ purisaṃ tasmiṃ raññe jīvitā voropetukāme ahaṃ
atk-s0512a:1095_2: attānaṃ rañño pariccajanto mama sīlameva anurakkhiṃ, jīvitaṃ pana nārakkhiṃ. Yaṃ
atk-s0512a:1095_3: panāhameva attano jīvitanirapekkhaṃ sīlavā āsiṃ, taṃ sammāsambodhiyā eva kāraṇāti.
atk-s0512a:1096_0: Atha rājā bodhisattena attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā tassa purisassa maraṇe nivārente
atk-s0512a:1096_1: tuṭṭhamānaso “gaccha, bho, migarājassa anuggahena mama hatthato maraṇā mutto”ti vatvā
atk-s0512a:1096_2: yathāpaṭiññāya tañcassa dhanaṃ dāpesi. Mahāsattassa yathāruciyāva anujānitvā taṃ
atk-s0512a:1096_3: nagaraṃ netvā nagarañca bodhisattañca alaṅkārāpetvā deviyā dhammaṃ desāpesi. Mahāsatto
atk-s0512a:1096_4: deviṃ ādiṃ katvā rañño ca rājaparisāya ca madhurāya manussabhāsāya dhammaṃ desetvā
atk-s0512a:1096_5: rājānaṃ dasahi rājadhammehi ovaditvā mahājanaṃ anusāsitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā migagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0512a:1096_6: vāsaṃ kappesi. Rājāpi mahāsattassa ovāde ṭhatvā sabbasattānaṃ abhayaṃ datvā dānādīni
atk-s0512a:1097: Tadā seṭṭhiputto devadatto ahosi, rājā ānando, rurumigarājā lokanātho.
atk-s0512a:1098_0: Tassa idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yathārahaṃ sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. Tathā idhāpi
atk-s0512a:1098_1: pavivekārāmatāya janasaṃsaggaṃ anicchato yūthaṃ pahāya ekakavihāro, aḍḍharattasamaye
atk-s0512a:1098_2: nadiyā vuyhamānassa karuṇaṃ paridevantassa purisassa aṭṭassaraṃ sutvā sayitaṭṭhānato
atk-s0512a:1098_3: vuṭṭhāya nadītīraṃ gantvā mahāgaṅgāya mahati udakoghe vattamāne attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā
atk-s0512a:1098_4: otaritvā sotaṃ pacchinditvā taṃ purisaṃ attano piṭṭhiyaṃ āropetvā tīraṃ pāpetvā samassāsetvā
atk-s0512a:1098_5: phalāphalādīni datvā parissamavinodanaṃ, puna taṃ attano piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā araññato
atk-s0512a:1098_6: nīharitvā mahāmagge otāraṇaṃ, saraṃ sannayhitvā vijjhissāmīti abhimukhe ṭhitassa
atk-s0512a:1098_7: rañño nibbhayena hutvā paṭimukhameva gantvā paṭhamataraṃ manussabhāsāya ālapitvā
atk-s0512a:1098_8: madhurapaṭisanthārakaraṇaṃ, mittadubbhī pāpapurisaṃ hantukāmaṃ rājānaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0512a:1098_9: katvā punapi attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā maraṇato pamocanaṃ, tassa ca rañño yathāpaṭiññaṃ
atk-s0512a:1098_10: dhanadāpanaṃ, raññā attano vare dīyamāne tena sabbasattānaṃ abhayadāpanaṃ, rājānañca
atk-s0512a:1098_11: deviñca pamukhaṃ katvā mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā dānādīsu puññesu tesaṃ patiṭṭhāpanaṃ,
atk-s0512a:1098_12: laddhābhayānaṃ migānaṃ ovādaṃ datvā manussānaṃ sassakhādanato nivāraṇaṃ, paṇṇasaññāya
atk-s0512a:1098_13: ca tassa yāvajjakālā thāvarakaraṇanti evamādayo mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a:1101_0: 60. Sattame jaṭiloti jaṭāvanto, jaṭābandhakesoti attho. Uggatāpanoti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1101_1: indriyānaṃ tāpanato niggaṇhanato tapasaṅkhātaṃ uggatāpanaṃ etassāti uggatāpano, ghoratapo
atk-s0512a:1101_2: paramadhitindriyoti attho. Atha vā nānappakāre diṭṭhadhammikādibhede anatthe uggiraṇato
atk-s0512a:1101_3: bahi chaḍḍāpanato ghorabhīmabhayānakaṭṭhena vā “uggā”ti laddhanāme kilese vīriyātapena
atk-s0512a:1101_4: santāpanato ugge tāpetīti uggatāpano. Mātaṅgo nāma nāmenāti nāmena mātaṅgo nāma.
atk-s0512a:1101_5: Mātaṅgakule nibbattiyā jātiyā āgataṃ hissa etaṃ nāmaṃ. Sīlavāti sīlasampanno suparisuddhasīlo.
atk-s0512a:1101_6: Susamāhitoti upacārappanāsamādhīhi suṭṭhu samāhito, jhānasamāpattilābhīti attho.
atk-s0512a:1102_0: Tadā hi bodhisatto caṇḍālayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā rūpena duddasiko bahinagare caṇḍālagāme
atk-s0512a:1102_1: vasati. “Mātaṅgapaṇḍito”ti pakāsanāmo. Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ nagare nakkhatte ghosite
atk-s0512a:1102_2: yebhuyyena nāgarā nakkhattaṃ kīḷanti. Aññatarāpi brāhmaṇamahāsālakaññā soḷasapannarasavassuddesikā
atk-s0512a:1102_3: devakaññā viya rūpena dassanīyā pāsādikā “attano vibhavānurūpaṃ nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmī”ti
atk-s0512a:1102_4: pahūtakhajjabhojjādīni sakaṭesu āropetvā sabbasetaṃ vaḷavārathamāruyha mahatā parivārena
atk-s0512a:1102_5: uyyānabhūmiṃ gacchati. Diṭṭhamaṅgalikā nāmesā, sā kira dussaṇṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ “avamaṅgala”nti
atk-s0512a:1102_6: taṃ daṭṭhuṃ na icchati, tenassā “diṭṭhamaṅgalikā”tveva samaññā udapādi.
atk-s0512a:1103_0: Tadā bodhisatto kālasseva uṭṭhāya paṭapilotikaṃ nivāsetvā jajjaritamukhabhāgaṃ veṇudaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0512a:1103_1: gahetvā bhājanahattho nagaraṃ pavisati manusse disvā dūratova tesaṃ dūrīkaraṇatthaṃ
atk-s0512a:1103_2: tena veṇudaṇḍena saññaṃ karonto. Atha diṭṭhamaṅgalikā “ussaratha ussarathā”ti ussāraṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:1103_3: karontehi attano purisehi nīyamānā nagaradvāramajjhe mātaṅgaṃ disvā “ko eso”ti āha.
atk-s0512a:1103_4: “Ayye, mātaṅgacaṇḍālo”ti ca vutte “īdisaṃ disvā gatānaṃ kuto vuḍḍhī”ti yānaṃ nivattāpesi.
atk-s0512a:1103_5: Manussā “yaṃ mayaṃ uyyānaṃ gantvā bahuṃ khajjabhojjādiṃ labheyyāma, tassa no mātaṅgena
atk-s0512a:1103_6: antarāyo kato”ti kupitā “gaṇhatha, caṇḍāla”nti leḍḍūhi paharitvā visaññībhūtaṃ pātetvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0512a:1104_0: So na cireneva satiṃ paṭilabhitvā vuṭṭhāya manusse pucchi – “kiṃ, ayyā, dvāraṃ nāma
atk-s0512a:1104_1: sabbasādhāraṇaṃ, udāhu brāhmaṇānaṃ eva kata”nti? “Sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇa”nti. “Evaṃ sabbasādhāraṇadvāre
atk-s0512a:1104_2: ekamantaṃ apakkamantaṃ maṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya manussā imaṃ anayabyasanaṃ pāpesu”nti
atk-s0512a:1104_3: rathikāya manussānaṃ ārocetvā “handāhaṃ imissā mānaṃ bhindissāmī”ti tassā nivesanadvāraṃ
atk-s0512a:1104_4: gantvā “ahaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ aladdhā na vuṭṭhahissāmī”ti nipajji. Diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya
atk-s0512a:1104_5: pitā “gharadvāre mātaṅgo nipanno”ti sutvā “tassa kākaṇikaṃ detha, telena sarīraṃ
atk-s0512a:1104_6: makkhetvā gacchatū”ti āha. So “diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ aladdhā na uṭṭhahissāmi”cceva āha.
atk-s0512a:1104_7: Tato brāhmaṇena – “dve kākaṇike detha, māsakaṃ pādaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ dve tīṇi yāva kahāpaṇasataṃ
atk-s0512a:1104_8: kahāpaṇasahassaṃ dethā”ti vuttepi na sampaṭicchati eva. Evaṃ tesaṃ mantentānaṃ eva sūriyo atthaṅgato.
atk-s0512a:1105_0: Atha diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya mātā pāsādā oruyha sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā tassa santikaṃ
atk-s0512a:1105_1: gantvā “tāta, mātaṅga, diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya aparādhaṃ khama, dve sahassāni gaṇhāhi yāva
atk-s0512a:1105_2: satasahassaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti vuttepi na sampaṭicchi, nipajji eva. Tassevaṃ cha divase
atk-s0512a:1105_3: nipajjitvā sattame divase sampatte samantā sāmantagharā paṭivisakagharā ca manussā
atk-s0512a:1105_4: uṭṭhahitvā “tumhe mātaṅgaṃ vā uṭṭhāpetha, dārikaṃ vā detha, mā amhe nāsayitthā”ti
atk-s0512a:1105_5: āhaṃsu. Tadā kira ayaṃ tasmiṃ dese desadhammo “yassa gharadvāre evaṃ nipajjitvā caṇḍālo
atk-s0512a:1105_6: marati, tena gharena saddhiṃ sattasattagharavāsino caṇḍālā hontī”ti.
atk-s0512a:1106_0: Tato diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya mātāpitaro diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ paṭapilotikaṃ nivāsāpetvā caṇḍālānucchavikaṃ
atk-s0512a:1106_1: parikkhāraṃ datvā paridevamānaṃ eva tassa santikaṃ netvā “handa, dāni dārikaṃ uṭṭhāya
atk-s0512a:1106_2: gaṇhāhī”ti adaṃsu. Sā passe ṭhatvā “uṭṭhāhī”ti āha. So “ahaṃ ativiya kilanto, hatthe
atk-s0512a:1106_3: gahetvā maṃ uṭṭhāpehī”ti āha. Sā tathā akāsi. Mātaṅgo “mayaṃ antonagare vasituṃ na
atk-s0512a:1106_4: labhāma, ehi, bahinagare caṇḍālagāmaṃ gamissāmā”ti taṃ apassāya attano gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0512a:1107_0: Evaṃ pana gehaṃ gantvā jātisambhedavītikkamaṃ akatvāva katipāhaṃ gehe vasitvā balaṃ
atk-s0512a:1107_1: gahetvā cintesi – “ahaṃ imaṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālakaññaṃ mayhaṃ caṇḍālagehe vāsāpesiṃ,
atk-s0512a:1107_2: handa, dāni taṃ lābhaggayasaggappattaṃ karissāmī”ti. So araññaṃ pavisitvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0512a:1107_3: sattāhabbhantareyeva aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañcābhiññāyo nibbattetvā iddhiyā caṇḍālagāmadvāre
atk-s0512a:1107_4: otaritvā gehadvāre ṭhito diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “sāmi, kissa maṃ anāthaṃ katvā
atk-s0512a:1107_5: pabbajitosī”ti paridevamānaṃ “tvaṃ, bhadde, mā cintayi, tava porāṇakayasato idāni
atk-s0512a:1107_6: mahantataraṃ yasaṃ karissāmi, tvaṃ pana ‘mahābrahmā me sāmiko, na mātaṅgo, so brahmalokaṃ
atk-s0512a:1107_7: gato, ito sattame divase puṇṇamāya candamaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā āgamissatī’ti parisāsu
atk-s0512a:1108_0: Diṭṭhamaṅgalikāpi bārāṇasiyaṃ mahājanamajjhe tesu tesu ṭhānesu tathā kathesi. Atha
atk-s0512a:1108_1: puṇṇamadivase bodhisatto candamaṇḍalassa gaganamajjhe ṭhitakāle brahmattabhāvaṃ māpetvā
atk-s0512a:1108_2: candamaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā dvādasayojanikaṃ bārāṇasiṃ sakalaṃ kāsiraṭṭhañca ekobhāsaṃ
atk-s0512a:1108_3: katvā ākāsato otaritvā bārāṇasiyā upari tikkhattuṃ paribbhamitvā mahājanena gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0512a:1108_4: pūjiyamāno caṇḍālagāmābhimukho ahosi. Brahmabhattā sannipatitvā taṃ caṇḍālagāmakaṃ
atk-s0512a:1108_5: gantvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya gehaṃ suddhavatthagandhamālādīhi devavimānaṃ viya alaṅkariṃsu.
atk-s0512a:1108_6: Diṭṭhamaṅgalikā ca tadā utunī hoti. Mahāsatto tattha gantvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ aṅguṭṭhena
atk-s0512a:1108_7: nābhiyaṃ parāmasitvā “bhadde, gabbho te patiṭṭhito, tvaṃ puttaṃ vijāyissasi, tvampi
atk-s0512a:1108_8: puttopi te lābhaggayasaggappattā bhavissatha, tava sīsadhovanaudakaṃ sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0512a:1108_9: rājūnaṃ abhisekodakaṃ bhavissati, nhānodakaṃ pana te amatodakaṃ bhavissati, ye naṃ
atk-s0512a:1108_10: sīse āsiñcissanti, te sabbarogehi muccissanti, kāḷakaṇṇiyā ca parimuccissanti, tava
atk-s0512a:1108_11: pādapiṭṭhe sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā vandantā sahassaṃ dassanti, kathāsavanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā vandantā
atk-s0512a:1108_12: sataṃ dassanti, cakkhupathe ṭhatvā vandantā ekekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ datvā vandissanti, appamattā
atk-s0512a:1108_13: hohī”ti taṃ ovaditvā gehā nikkhamma mahājanassa passantasseva candamaṇḍalaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0512a:1109_0: Brahmabhattā sannipatitvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikaṃ mahantena sakkārena nagaraṃ pavesetvā
atk-s0512a:1109_1: mahantena sirisobhaggena tattha vasāpesuṃ. Devavimānasadisañcassā nivesanaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0512a:1109_2: Tattha netvā uḷāraṃ lābhasakkāraṃ upanāmesuṃ. Puttalābhādi sabbo bodhisattena vuttasadisova
atk-s0512a:1109_3: ahosi. Soḷasasahassā brāhmaṇā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya puttena saha nibaddhaṃ bhuñjanti,
atk-s0512a:1109_4: sahassamattā naṃ parivārenti, anekasahassānaṃ dānaṃ dīyati. Atha mahāsatto “ayaṃ
atk-s0512a:1109_5: aṭṭhāne abhippasanno, handassa dakkhiṇeyye jānāpessāmī”ti bhikkhāya caranto tassā
atk-s0512a:1109_6: gehaṃ gantvā tena saddhiṃ sallapitvā agamāsi. Atha kumāro gāthamāha –
atk-s0512a:1111: Saṅkāracoḷaṃ paṭimuñca kaṇṭhe, ko re tuvaṃ hosi adakkhiṇeyyo”ti. ;
atk-s0512a:1112_0: Tena vuttaṃ anācāraṃ asahamānā devatā tassa tesañca soḷasasahassānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1112_1: mukhaṃ viparivattesuṃ. Taṃ disvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikā mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ
atk-s0512a:1112_2: ārocesi. Bodhisatto “tassa anācāraṃ asahantehi yakkhehi so vippakāro kato, api ca
atk-s0512a:1112_3: kho pana imaṃ ucchiṭṭhapiṇḍakaṃ tesaṃ mukhe āsiñcitvā taṃ vippakāraṃ vūpasamehī”ti
atk-s0512a:1112_4: āha. Sāpi tathā katvā taṃ vūpasamesi. Atha diṭṭhamaṅgalikā puttaṃ āha – “tāta, imasmiṃ
atk-s0512a:1112_5: loke dakkhiṇeyyā nāma mātaṅgapaṇḍitasadisā bhavanti, na ime brāhmaṇā viya jātimattena,
atk-s0512a:1112_6: mantasajjhāyanamattena vā mānatthaddhā”ti vatvā ye tadā sīlādiguṇavisesayuttā jhānasamāpattilābhino
atk-s0512a:1112_7: ceva paccekabuddhā ca, tatthevassa pasādaṃ uppādesīti.
atk-s0512a:1113_0: Tadā vettavatīnagare jātimanto nāma eko brāhmaṇo pabbajitvāpi jātiṃ nissāya mahantaṃ
atk-s0512a:1113_1: mānamakāsi. Mahāsatto “tassa mānaṃ bhindissāmī”ti taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā tassāsanne uparisote
atk-s0512a:1116: Ahaṃ vasāmi upari, heṭṭhā vasati brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0512a:1117_0: Atha mahāsatto ekadivasaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā “idaṃ jātimantassa jaṭāsu laggatū”ti
atk-s0512a:1117_1: adhiṭṭhāya nadiyaṃ pātesi. Taṃ tassa udakaṃ ācamentassa jaṭāsu laggi, so taṃ disvā
atk-s0512a:1117_2: “nassa vasalā”ti vatvā “kutoyaṃ kāḷakaṇṇī āgato, upadhāressāmi na”nti uddhaṃsotaṃ
atk-s0512a:1117_4: dantakaṭṭhaṃ pātita”nti? “Āma, mayā”ti. “Nassa, vasala, caṇḍāla, kāḷakaṇṇi, mā idha
atk-s0512a:1117_5: vasi, heṭṭhāsote vasā”ti vatvā heṭṭhāsote vasantenapi pātite dantakaṭṭhe paṭisotaṃ
atk-s0512a:1117_6: āgantvā jaṭāsu laggante “nassa, vasala, sace idha vasissasi, sattame divase sattadhā
atk-s0512a:1117_7: te muddhā phalissatī”ti āha. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1121_0: Tattha vicaranto anukūlamhīti ucchiṭṭhadantakaṭṭhe attano jaṭāsu lagge tassa āgamanagavesanavasena
atk-s0512a:1121_1: gaṅgāya tīre anuvicaranto. Uddhaṃ me assamaddasāti attano vasanaṭṭhānato uparisote
atk-s0512a:1121_2: mama assamaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ addakkhi. Tattha maṃ paribhāsetvāti mama assamaṃ āgantvā
atk-s0512a:1121_3: jātiṃ sutvā tatova paṭikkamitvā savanūpacāre ṭhatvā “nassa, vasala caṇḍāla, kāḷakaṇṇi
atk-s0512a:1121_4: mā idha vasī”tiādīni vatvā bhayena santajjetvā. Abhisapi muddhaphālananti “sace jīvitukāmosi,
atk-s0512a:1121_5: ettova sīghaṃ palāyassū”ti vatvā “sace na pakkamissati, ito te sattame divase sattadhā
atk-s0512a:1122: Kiṃ pana tassa abhisapena muddhā phalatīti? Na phalati, kuhako pana so, evamayaṃ maraṇabhayatajjito sudūraṃ pakkamissatīti saññāya santāsanatthaṃ tathā āha.
atk-s0512a:1123_0: 63. Yadihaṃ tassa pakuppeyyanti tassa mānatthaddhassa kūṭajaṭilassa ahaṃ yadi kujjheyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1123_1: Yadi sīlaṃ na gopayeti sīlaṃ yadi na rakkheyyaṃ, idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma jīvitanirapekkhaṃ
atk-s0512a:1123_2: sammadeva rakkhitabbanti yadi na cinteyyanti attho. Oloketvānahaṃ tassa, kareyyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1123_3: chārikaṃ viyāti sacāhaṃ tadā tassa appatīto abhavissaṃ. Mama cittācāraṃ ñatvā mayi
atk-s0512a:1123_4: abhippasannā devatā khaṇeneva taṃ bhasmamuṭṭhiṃ viya viddhaṃseyyunti adhippāyo. Satthā
atk-s0512a:1123_5: pana tadā attano appatītabhāve sati devatāhi sādhetabbaṃ tassa anatthaṃ attanā kattabbaṃ
atk-s0512a:1124_0: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha – “bodhisattova taṃ jaṭilaṃ icchamāno iddhiyā chārikaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0512a:1124_1: evañhi sati imissā pāḷiyā attho ujukameva nīto hotī”ti. So evamassa vacanīyo – “tvaṃ
atk-s0512a:1124_2: iddhiyā parūpaghātaṃ vadasi, iddhi nāmesā adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikubbanā iddhi, manomayā
atk-s0512a:1124_3: iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, samādhivipphārā iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi,
atk-s0512a:1124_4: puññavato iddhi, vijjāmayā iddhi, tattha tattha sammāpayogappaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena
atk-s0512a:1124_5: iddhīti dasavidhā. Tattha “kataraṃ iddhiṃ vadesī”ti? “Bhāvanāmaya”nti. “Kiṃ pana
atk-s0512a:1124_6: bhāvanāmayāya parūpaghātakammaṃ hotī”ti? Āma, ekacce ācariyā “ekavāraṃ hotī”ti vadanti,
atk-s0512a:1124_7: yathā hi paraṃ paharitukāmena udakabharite ghaṭe khitte paropi paharīyati, ghaṭopi
atk-s0512a:1124_8: bhijjati, evameva bhāvanāmayāya iddhiyā ekavāraṃ parūpaghātakammaṃ hoti, tato paṭṭhāya pana sā nassati.
atk-s0512a:1125_0: Atha so “bhāvanāmayāya iddhiyā neva ekavāraṃ na dvevāraṃ parūpaghātakammaṃ hotī”ti
atk-s0512a:1125_1: vatvā pucchitabbo “kiṃ bhāvanāmayā iddhi kusalā akusalā abyākatā, sukhāya vedanāya
atk-s0512a:1125_2: sampayuttā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, savitakkasavicārā
atk-s0512a:1125_3: avitakkavicāramattā avitakkaavicārā, kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarā”ti? Jānanto
atk-s0512a:1125_4: “bhāvanāmayā iddhi kusalā abyākatā vā adukkhamasukhavedaniyā avitakkaavicārā rūpāvacarā
atk-s0512a:1125_5: cā”ti vakkhati. So vattabbo “pāṇātipātacetanā kusalādīsu kataraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ bhajatī”ti?
atk-s0512a:1125_6: Jānanto vakkhati “pāṇātipātacetanā akusalāva dukkhavedanāva savitakkasavicārāva kāmāvacarāvā”ti.
atk-s0512a:1125_7: Evaṃ sante “tava pañho neva kusalattikena sameti, na vedanāttikena na vitakkattikena
atk-s0512a:1125_8: na bhūmantarenā”ti pāḷiyā virodhaṃ dassetvā saññāpetabbo. Yadi pana so “puna caparaṃ,
atk-s0512a:1125_9: bhikkhave, idhekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā iddhimā cetovasippatto aññissā kucchigataṃ
atk-s0512a:1125_10: gabbhaṃ pāpakena manasānupekkhitā hoti ‘aho vata yaṃ taṃ kucchigataṃ gabbhaṃ na sotthinā
atk-s0512a:1125_11: abhinikkhameyyā’ti. Evampi, bhikkhave, kulumpassa upaghāto hotī”ti saṅgītiṃ anāruḷhaṃ
atk-s0512a:1125_12: kulumpasuttaṃ udāhareyya. Tassāpi “tvaṃ atthaṃ na jānāsi. Iddhimā cetovasippattoti
atk-s0512a:1125_13: hi ettha na bhāvanāmayā iddhi adhippetā, āthabbanikā iddhi adhippetā. Sā hi ettha
atk-s0512a:1125_14: labbhamānā labbhatīti bhāvanāmayāya iddhiyā parūpaghāto na sambhavatiyevā”ti saññāpetabbo.
atk-s0512a:1125_15: No ce saññattiṃ upeti, kammaṃ katvā uyyojetabbo. Tasmā yathāvuttanayenevettha gāthāya attho veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:1126_0: Tathā pana tena abhisapito mahāsatto “sacāhaṃ etassa kujjhissāmi, sīlaṃ me arakkhitaṃ
atk-s0512a:1126_1: bhavissati, upāyenevassa mānaṃ bhindissāmi, sā cassa rakkhā bhavissatī”ti sattame
atk-s0512a:1126_2: divase sūriyuggamanaṃ vāresi. Manussā sūriyassa anuggamanena ubbāḷhā jātimantatāpasaṃ
atk-s0512a:1126_3: upasaṅkamitvā “bhante, tumhe sūriyassa uggantuṃ na dethā”ti pucchiṃsu. So “na metaṃ
atk-s0512a:1126_4: kammaṃ, gaṅgātīre pana eko caṇḍālatāpaso vasati, tassetaṃ kammaṃ siyā”ti āha. Manussā
atk-s0512a:1126_5: mahāsattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “bhante, tumhe sūriyassa uggantuṃ na dethā”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0512a:1126_7: āgantvā khamāpanatthaṃ mama pādesu patite sūriyaṃ vissajjessāmī”ti. Te gantvā taṃ
atk-s0512a:1126_8: ākaḍḍhantā ānetvā mahāsattassa pādamūle nipajjāpetvā khamāpetvā “sūriyaṃ vissajjetha,
atk-s0512a:1126_9: bhante”ti āhaṃsu. “Na sakkā vissajjetuṃ, sacāhaṃ vissajjessāmi, imassa sattadhā muddhā
atk-s0512a:1126_10: phalissatī”ti. “Atha, bhante, kiṃ karomā”ti. Mahāsatto “mattikāpiṇḍaṃ āharathā”ti
atk-s0512a:1126_11: āharāpetvā “imaṃ tāpasassa sīse ṭhapetvā tāpasaṃ otāretvā udake ṭhapetha, yadā sūriyo
atk-s0512a:1126_12: dissati, tadā tāpaso udake nimujjatū”ti vatvā sūriyaṃ vissajjesi. Sūriyarasmīhi phuṭṭhamatteva
atk-s0512a:1126_13: mattikāpiṇḍo sattadhā bhijji. Tāpaso udake nimujji. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1128: “Yaṃ so tadā maṃ abhisapi, kupito duṭṭhamānaso;
atk-s0512a:1129: Tasseva matthake nipati, yogena taṃ pamocayi”nti.
atk-s0512a:1130_0: Tattha yaṃ so tadā maṃ abhisapīti so jātimantajaṭilo yaṃ muddhaphālanaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0512a:1130_1: tadā maṃ abhisapi, mayhaṃ sapaṃ adāsi. Tasseva matthake nipatīti taṃ mayhaṃ upari
atk-s0512a:1130_2: tena icchitaṃ tasseva pana upari nipati nipatanabhāvena aṭṭhāsi. Evañhetaṃ hoti yathā
atk-s0512a:1130_3: taṃ appaduṭṭhassa padussato. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati…pe…
atk-s0512a:1130_4: paṭivātaṃva khitto”ti. Yogena taṃ pamocayinti taṃ tassa bhāsitaṃ matthakaphālanaṃ
atk-s0512a:1130_5: upāyena tato pamocesiṃ, taṃ vā jaṭilaṃ tato pamocesiṃ, yena upāyena taṃ na hoti,
atk-s0512a:1131_2: pharusavacanaṃ payuttaṃ, taṃ mahāsattassa khettavisesabhāvato tassa ca ajjhāsayapharusatāya
atk-s0512a:1131_3: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hutvā sace so mahāsattaṃ na khamāpesi, sattame divase vipaccanasabhāvaṃ
atk-s0512a:1131_4: jātaṃ, khamāpite pana mahāsatte payogasampattipaṭibāhitattā avipākadhammataṃ āpajji
atk-s0512a:1131_5: ahosikammabhāvato. Ayañhi ariyūpavādapāpassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassa ca dhammatā.
atk-s0512a:1131_6: Tattha yaṃ sattame divase bodhisattena sūriyuggamananivāraṇaṃ kataṃ, ayamettha yogoti
atk-s0512a:1131_7: adhippeto upāyo. Tena hi ubbāḷhā manussā bodhisattassa santike tāpasaṃ ānetvā khamāpesuṃ.
atk-s0512a:1131_8: Sopi ca mahāsattassa guṇe jānitvā tasmiṃ cittaṃ pasādesīti veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ panassa
atk-s0512a:1131_9: matthake mattikāpiṇḍassa ṭhapanaṃ, tassa ca sattadhā phālanaṃ kataṃ, taṃ manussānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1131_10: cittānurakkhaṇatthaṃ, aññathā hi ime pabbajitāpi samānā cittassa vase vattanti, na
atk-s0512a:1131_11: pana cittaṃ attano vase vattāpentīti mahāsattampi tena sadisaṃ katvā gaṇheyyuṃ. Tadassa
atk-s0512a:1132: 65. Idāni yadatthaṃ tadā tasmiṃ tāpase cittaṃ adūsetvā suparisuddhaṃ sīlameva rakkhitaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ “anurakkhiṃ mama sīla”nti osānagāthamāha. Taṃ heṭṭhā vuttatthameva.
atk-s0512a:1134_0: Idhāpi sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. Tathā nihīnajātikassa sato yathādhippāyaṃ diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya
atk-s0512a:1134_1: mānaniggaho, pabbajitvā “diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya avassayo bhavissāmī”ti uppannacitto araññaṃ
atk-s0512a:1134_3: tato āgantvā diṭṭhamaṅgalikāya lābhaggayasaggappattiyā upāyasampādanaṃ, maṇḍabyakumārassa
atk-s0512a:1134_4: mānaniggaho, jātimantatāpasassa mānaniggaho, tassa ca ajānantasseva bhāvino jīvitantarāyassa
atk-s0512a:1134_5: apanayanaṃ, mahāparādhassāpi tassa akujjhitvā attano sīlānurakkhaṇaṃ, acchariyabbhutapāṭihāriyakaraṇanti
atk-s0512a:1137_0: 66. Aṭṭhame mahāpakkhoti mahāparivāro. Mahiddhikoti mahatiyā deviddhiyā samannāgato.
atk-s0512a:1137_1: Dhammo nāma mahāyakkhoti nāmena dhammo nāma mahānubhāvo devaputto. Sabbalokānukampakoti
atk-s0512a:1138_0: Mahāsatto hi tadā kāmāvacaradevaloke dhammo nāma devaputto hutvā nibbatti. So dibbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0512a:1138_1: dibbarathamabhiruyha accharāgaṇaparivuto manussesu sāyamāsaṃ bhuñjitvā attano attano
atk-s0512a:1138_2: gharadvāresu sukhakathāya nisinnesu puṇṇamuposathadivase gāmanigamarājadhānīsu ākāse
atk-s0512a:1138_4: pūretha, matteyyā petteyyā sāmaññā brahmaññā kule jeṭṭhāpacāyino bhavatha, saggaparāyanā
atk-s0512a:1138_5: hutvā mahantaṃ yasaṃ anubhavissathā”ti manusse dasakusalakammapathe samādapento jambudīpaṃ
atk-s0512a:1142: Tattha samittoti dhammikehi dhammavādīhi sahāyehi sasahāyo.
atk-s0512a:1143_0: Tena ca samayena adhammo nāmeko devaputto kāmāvacaradevaloke nibbatti. “So pāṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:1143_1: hanatha, adinnaṃ ādiyathā”tiādinā nayena satte akusalakammapathe samādapento mahatiyā
atk-s0512a:1143_2: parisāya parivuto jambudīpaṃ vāmaṃ karoti. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1147_0: Tattha pāpoti pāpadhammehi samannāgato. Kadariyoti thaddhamaccharī. Yakkhoti devaputto.
atk-s0512a:1147_1: Dīpento dasa pāpaketi sabbaloke gocaraṃ nāma sattānaṃ upabhogaparibhogāya jātaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1147_2: Tasmā satte vadhitvā yaṃkiñci katvā ca attā pīṇetabbo, indriyāni santappetabbānītiādinā
atk-s0512a:1147_3: nayena pāṇātipātādike dasa lāmakadhamme kattabbe katvā pakāsento. Sopetthāti sopi
atk-s0512a:1147_4: adhammo devaputto imasmiṃ jambudīpe. Mahiyāti bhūmiyā āsanne, manussānaṃ dassanasavanūpacāreti attho.
atk-s0512a:1148_0: 69. Tattha ye sattā sādhukammikā dhammagaruno, te dhammaṃ devaputtaṃ tathā āgacchantameva
atk-s0512a:1148_1: disvā āsanā vuṭṭhāya gandhamālādīhi pūjentā yāva cakkhupathasamatikkamanā tāva abhitthavanti,
atk-s0512a:1148_2: pañjalikā namassamānā tiṭṭhanti, tassa vacanaṃ sutvā appamattā sakkaccaṃ puññāni
atk-s0512a:1148_3: karonti. Ye pana sattā pāpasamācārā kurūrakammantā, te adhammassa vacanaṃ sutvā abbhanumodanti,
atk-s0512a:1148_4: bhiyyosomattāya pāpāni samācaranti. Evaṃ te tadā aññamaññassa ujuvipaccanīkavādā
atk-s0512a:1148_5: ceva ujuvipaccanīkakiriyā ca hutvā loke vicaranti. Tenāha bhagavā “dhammavādī adhammo
atk-s0512a:1149_0: Evaṃ pana gacchante kāle athekadivasaṃ tesaṃ rathā ākāse sammukhā ahesuṃ. Atha nesaṃ
atk-s0512a:1149_1: parisā “tumhe kassa, tumhe kassā”ti pucchitvā “mayaṃ dhammassa, mayaṃ adhammassā”ti
atk-s0512a:1149_2: vatvā maggā okkamitvā dvidhā jātā. Dhammassa pana adhammassa ca rathā abhimukhā hutvā
atk-s0512a:1149_3: īsāya īsaṃ āhacca aṭṭhaṃsu. “Tava rathaṃ okkamāpetvā mayhaṃ maggaṃ dehi, tava rathaṃ
atk-s0512a:1149_4: okkamāpetvā mayhaṃ maggaṃ dehī”ti aññamaññaṃ maggadāpanatthaṃ vivādaṃ akaṃsu. Parisā
atk-s0512a:1149_5: ca nesaṃ āvudhāni abhiharitvā yuddhasajjā ahesuṃ. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1154_0: Tattha dhure dhuranti ekassa rathīsāya itarassa rathīsaṃ ghaṭṭayantā. Samimhāti samāgatā
atk-s0512a:1154_1: sammukhībhūtā. Puna ubhoti vacanaṃ ubhopi mayaṃ aññamaññassa paccanīkā hutvā loke
atk-s0512a:1154_2: vicarantā ekadivasaṃ paṭimukhaṃ āgacchantā dvīsu parisāsu ubhosu passesu maggato
atk-s0512a:1154_3: okkantāsu saha rathena mayaṃ ubho eva samāgatāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Bhesmāti bhayajanako.
atk-s0512a:1154_4: Kalyāṇapāpakassa cāti kalyāṇassa ca pāpakassa ca. Mahāyuddho upaṭṭhitoti mahāsaṅgāmo paccupaṭṭhito āsi.
atk-s0512a:1155_0: Aññamaññassa hi parisāya ca yujjhitukāmatā jātā. Tattha hi dhammo adhammaṃ āha –
atk-s0512a:1155_1: “samma, tvaṃ adhammo, ahaṃ dhammo, maggo mayhaṃ anucchaviko, tava rathaṃ okkamāpetvā
atk-s0512a:1155_2: mayhaṃ maggaṃ dehī”ti. Itaro “ahaṃ daḷhayāno balavā asantāsī, tasmā maggaṃ na demi,
atk-s0512a:1155_3: yuddhaṃ pana karissāmi, yo yuddhe jinissati, tassa maggo hotū”ti āha. Tenevāha –
atk-s0512a:1157: Maggāraho devamanussapūjito, dhammo ahaṃ dehi adhamma maggaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1159: Sa kissa hetumhi tavajja dajjaṃ, maggaṃ ahaṃ dhamma adinnapubbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1160: “Dhammo have pāturahosi pubbe, pacchā adhammo udapādi loke;
atk-s0512a:1161: Jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca sanantano ca, uyyāhi jeṭṭhassa kaniṭṭha maggā.
atk-s0512a:1162: “Na yācanāya napi pātirūpā, na arahatā tehaṃ dadeyya maggaṃ;
atk-s0512a:1163: Yuddhañca no hotu ubhinnamajja, yuddhamhi yo jessati tassa maggo.
atk-s0512a:1165: Guṇehi sabbehi upetarūpo, dhammo adhamma tvaṃ kathaṃ vijessasi.
atk-s0512a:1166: “Lohena ve haññati jātarūpaṃ, na jātarūpena hananti lohaṃ;
atk-s0512a:1167: Sace adhammo hañchati dhammamajja, ayo suvaṇṇaṃ viya dassaneyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1168: “Sace tuvaṃ yuddhabalo adhamma, na tuyhaṃ vuḍḍhā ca garū ca atthi;
atk-s0512a:1169: Maggañca te dammi piyāppiyena, vācā duruttānipi te khamāmī”ti. ;
atk-s0512a:1171_0: Tattha yasokaroti dhamme niyojanavasena devamanussānaṃ yasadāyako. Dutiyapadepi eseva
atk-s0512a:1171_1: nayo. Sadātthutoti sadā thuto niccappasattho. Sa kissa hetumhi tavajja dajjanti somhi
atk-s0512a:1171_2: ahaṃ adhammo adhammayānarathaṃ abhiruḷho abhīto balavā, kiṃkāraṇā ajja, bho dhamma,
atk-s0512a:1171_3: kassaci adinnapubbaṃ maggaṃ tuyhaṃ dammi. Pāturahosīti paṭhamakappikakāle imasmiṃ
atk-s0512a:1171_4: loke dasakusalakammapathadhammo pubbe pāturahosi, pacchā adhammo. Jeṭṭho cāti pure
atk-s0512a:1171_5: nibbattabhāvena ahaṃ jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca porāṇako ca, tvaṃ pana kaniṭṭho, tasmā “maggā uyyāhī”ti vadati.
atk-s0512a:1172_0: Napi pātirūpāti ahañhi bhoto neva yācanāya na paṭirūpavacanena na maggārahatāya maggaṃ
atk-s0512a:1172_1: dadeyyaṃ. Anuvisaṭoti ahaṃ catasso disā catasso anudisāti sabbā disā attano guṇena
atk-s0512a:1172_2: patthaṭo paññāto. Lohenāti ayomuṭṭhikena. Hañchatīti hanissati. Yuddhabalo adhammāti
atk-s0512a:1172_3: sace tuvaṃ yuddhabalo asi adhamma. Vuḍḍhā ca garū cāti yadi tuyhaṃ ime vuḍḍhā ime
atk-s0512a:1172_4: garū paṇḍitāti etaṃ natthi. Piyāppiyenāti piyena viya appiyena, appiyenapi dadanto
atk-s0512a:1172_5: piyena viya te maggaṃ dadāmīti attho.
atk-s0512a:1173_0: 71. Mahāsatto hi tadā cintesi – “sacāhaṃ imaṃ pāpapuggalaṃ sabbalokassa ahitāya paṭipannaṃ
atk-s0512a:1173_1: evaṃ mayā vilomaggāhaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ accharaṃ paharitvā ‘anācāra mā idha tiṭṭha,
atk-s0512a:1173_2: sīghaṃ paṭikkama vinassā’ti vadeyyaṃ, so taṅkhaṇaññeva mama dhammatejena bhusamuṭṭhi
atk-s0512a:1173_3: viya vikireyya, na kho pana metaṃ patirūpaṃ, svāhaṃ sabbalokaṃ anukampanto ‘lokatthacariyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1173_4: matthakaṃ pāpessāmī’ti paṭipajjāmi, ayaṃ kho pana pāpo āyatiṃ mahādukkhabhāgī, svāyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1173_5: mayā visesato anukampitabbo, tasmāssa maggaṃ dassāmi, evaṃ me sīlaṃ suvisuddhaṃ akhaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0512a:1173_6: bhavissatī”ti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā bodhisatte “sace tuvaṃ yuddhabalo”ti gāthaṃ vatvā
atk-s0512a:1173_7: thokaṃ maggato okkantamatte eva adhammo rathe ṭhātuṃ asakkonto avaṃsiro pathaviyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1173_8: patitvā pathaviyā vivare dinne gantvā avīcimhi eva nibbatti. Tena vuttaṃ “yadihaṃ
atk-s0512a:1174_0: Tattha yadihaṃ tassa kuppeyyanti tassa adhammassa yadi ahaṃ kujjheyyaṃ. Yadi bhinde
atk-s0512a:1174_1: tapoguṇanti tenevassa kujjhanena mayhaṃ tapoguṇaṃ sīlasaṃvaraṃ yadi vināseyyaṃ. Sahaparijanaṃ
atk-s0512a:1174_2: tassāti saparijanaṃ taṃ adhammaṃ. Rajabhūtanti rajamiva bhūtaṃ, rajabhāvaṃ pattaṃ ahaṃ kareyyaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1175_0: 72. Apicāhanti ettha ahanti nipātamattaṃ. Sīlarakkhāyāti sīlarakkhaṇatthaṃ. Nibbāpetvānāti
atk-s0512a:1175_1: paṭikacceva khantimettānuddayassa upaṭṭhāpitattā tasmiṃ adhamme uppajjanakakodhassa
atk-s0512a:1175_2: anuppādaneneva dosapariḷāhavūpasamanena mānasaṃ vūpasametvā. Saha janenokkamitvāti
atk-s0512a:1175_3: mayhaṃ parijanena saddhiṃ maggā okkamitvā tassa pāpassa adhammassa ahaṃ maggaṃ adāsiṃ.
atk-s0512a:1176_0: 73. Saha pathato okkanteti vuttanayena cittassa vūpasamaṃ katvā “maggaṃ te dammī”ti
atk-s0512a:1176_1: ca vatvā thokaṃ maggato saha okkamanena. Pāpayakkhassāti adhammadevaputtassa. Tāvadeti
atk-s0512a:1176_2: taṅkhaṇaṃ eva mahāpathavī vivaramadāsi. Jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “maggañca te dammī”ti
atk-s0512a:1177_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ bhūmiyaṃ patite catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā sakalaṃ varāvaraṃ
atk-s0512a:1177_1: dhārentīpi mahāpathavī “nāhamimaṃ pāpapurisaṃ dhāremī”ti kathentī viya tena ṭhitaṭṭhāne
atk-s0512a:1177_2: dvidhā bhijji. Mahāsatto pana tasmiṃ nipatitvā avīcimhi nibbatte rathadhure yathāṭhitova
atk-s0512a:1177_3: saparijano mahatā devānubhāvena gamanamaggeneva gantvā attano bhavanaṃ pāvisi. Tenāha bhagavā –
atk-s0512a:1178: “Khantībalo yuddhabalaṃ vijetvā, hantvā adhammaṃ nihanitva bhūmyā;
atk-s0512a:1179: Pāyāsi vitto abhiruyha sandanaṃ, maggeneva atibalo saccanikkamo”ti. ;
atk-s0512a:1180: Tadā adhammo devadatto ahosi, tassa parisā devadattaparisā, dhammo lokanātho, tassa parisā buddhaparisā.
atk-s0512a:1181_0: Idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva sesapāramiyo yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbā. Tathā idhāpi dibbehi
atk-s0512a:1181_1: āyuvaṇṇayasasukhaādhipateyyehi dibbeheva uḷārehi kāmaguṇehi samappitassa samaṅgībhūtassa
atk-s0512a:1181_2: anekasahassasaṅkhāhi accharāhi sabbakālaṃ paricāriyamānassa mahati pamādaṭṭhāne ṭhitassa
atk-s0512a:1181_3: sato īsakampi pamādaṃ anāpajjitvā “lokatthacariyaṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāmī”ti māse māse
atk-s0512a:1181_4: puṇṇamiyaṃ dhammaṃ dīpento saparijano manussapathe vicaritvā mahākaruṇāya sabbasatte
atk-s0512a:1181_5: adhammato vivecetvā dhamme niyojanaṃ, adhammena samāgatopi tena kataṃ anācāraṃ agaṇetvā
atk-s0512a:1181_6: tattha cittaṃ akopetvā khantimettānuddayameva paccupaṭṭhapetvā akhaṇḍaṃ suvisuddhañca
atk-s0512a:1181_7: katvā attano sīlassa rakkhaṇanti evamādayo mahāsattassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a:1184_0: 74. Navame pañcālaraṭṭheti evaṃnāmake janapade. Nagaravare, kapilāyanti “kapilā”ti
atk-s0512a:1184_1: evaṃladdhanāme uttamanagare. “Nagaravare”ti vatvā puna “puruttame”ti vacanaṃ tasmiṃ
atk-s0512a:1184_2: kāle jambudīpe sabbanagarānaṃ tassa nagarassa agganagarabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Jayaddiso
atk-s0512a:1184_3: nāmāti raññā attano paccatthike jite jāto, attano vā paccāmittabhūtaṃ yakkhinīsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0512a:1184_4: jayaddisaṃ jitoti evaṃladdhanāmo. Sīlaguṇamupāgatoti ācārasīlañceva ussāhasampattiyādirājaguṇañca
atk-s0512a:1185_0: 75. Tassa raññoti jayaddisarājassa, ahaṃ putto ahosinti vacanaseso. Sutadhammoti
atk-s0512a:1185_1: yāvatā rājaputtena sotabbadhammo nāma, tassa sabbassa sutattā sutadhammo, bahussutoti
atk-s0512a:1185_2: attho. Atha vā sutadhammoti vissutadhammo, dhammacariyāya samacariyāya pakāso paññāto,
atk-s0512a:1185_3: loke patthaṭakittidhammoti attho. Alīnasattoti evaṃnāmo. Guṇavāti uḷārehi mahāpurisaguṇehi
atk-s0512a:1185_4: samannāgato. Anurakkhaparijano sadāti saddhādiguṇavisesayogato catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi
atk-s0512a:1186: 76. Pitā me migavaṃ gantvā, porisādaṃ upāgamīti mayhaṃ pitā jayaddisarājā migavaṃ caranto araññamajjhaṃ gantvā porisādaṃ manussakhādakaṃ yakkhiniputtaṃ upagañchi, tena samāgami.
atk-s0512a:1187_0: Jayaddisarājā kira ekadivasaṃ “migavaṃ gamissāmī”ti tadanurūpena mahatā parivārena
atk-s0512a:1187_1: kapilanagarato nikkhami. Taṃ nikkhantamattameva takkasilāvāsī nando nāma brāhmaṇo
atk-s0512a:1187_2: catasso satārahā gāthā nāma kathetuṃ ādāya upasaṅkamitvā attano āgamanakāraṇaṃ rañño
atk-s0512a:1187_3: ārocesi. Rājā “nivattitvā suṇissāmī”ti tassa vasanagehaṃ paribbayañca dāpetvā araññaṃ
atk-s0512a:1187_4: paviṭṭho “yassa passena migo palāyati, tasseva so gīvā”ti vatvā mige pariyesanto
atk-s0512a:1187_5: vicarati. Atheko pasadamigo mahājanassa padasaddena āsayato nikkhamitvā rañño abhimukho
atk-s0512a:1187_6: gantvā palāyi. Amaccā parihāsaṃ kariṃsu. Rājā taṃ anubandhitvā tiyojanamatthake taṃ
atk-s0512a:1187_7: parikkhīṇajavaṃ ṭhitaṃ vijjhitvā pātesi. Patitaṃ khaggena dvidhā katvā anatthikopi
atk-s0512a:1187_8: “maṃsena migaṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhī”ti vacanamocanatthaṃ kāje katvā āgacchanto ekassa
atk-s0512a:1187_9: nigrodhassa mūle dabbatiṇesu nisīditvā thokaṃ vissamitvā gantuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0512a:1188_0: Tena ca samayena tasseva rañño jeṭṭhabhātā jātadivase eva ekāya yakkhiniyā khādituṃ
atk-s0512a:1188_1: gahito ārakkhamanussehi anubaddhāya tāya niddhamanamaggena gacchantiyā ure ṭhapito
atk-s0512a:1188_2: mātusaññāya mukhena thanaggahaṇena puttasinehaṃ uppādetvā saṃvaḍḍhiyamāno tadāhāropayogitāya
atk-s0512a:1188_3: manussamaṃsaṃ khādanto anukkamena vuddhippatto attānaṃ antaradhāpanatthaṃ yakkhiniyā
atk-s0512a:1188_4: dinnaosadhamūlānubhāvena antarahito hutvā manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā jīvanto tāya yakkhiniyā
atk-s0512a:1188_5: matāya taṃ osadhamūlaṃ attano pamādena nāsetvā dissamānarūpova manussamaṃsaṃ khādanto
atk-s0512a:1188_6: naggo ubbiggavirūpadassano rājapurisehi passitvā anubaddho palāyitvā araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0512a:1188_7: tassa nigrodhassa mūle vāsaṃ kappento rājānaṃ disvā “bhakkhosi me”ti hatthe aggahesi.
atk-s0512a:1188_8: Tena vuttaṃ “so me pitumaggahesi, bhakkhosi mama mā calī”tiādi.
atk-s0512a:1189_0: Tattha so me pitumaggahesīti so porisādo mama pitaraṃ jayaddisarājānaṃ attano nisinnarukkhasamīpamāgataṃ
atk-s0512a:1189_1: “mama bhakkho tvaṃ āgatosi, hatthaparipphandanādivasena mā cali, calantampi ahaṃ
atk-s0512a:1190: 77. Tassāti tassa yakkhiniputtassa. Tasitavedhitoti cittutrāsena tasito sarīraparikampena vedhito. Ūrukkhambhoti ubhinnaṃ ūrūnaṃ thaddhabhāvo, yena so tato palāyituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0512a:1191_0: Migavaṃ gahetvā muñcassūti ettha migavanti migavavasena laddhattā taṃ migamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0512a:1191_1: “migava”nti āha, imaṃ migamaṃsaṃ gahetvā maṃ muñcassūti attho. So hi rājā naṃ yakkhiniputtaṃ
atk-s0512a:1191_2: disvā bhīto ūrukkhambhaṃ patvā khāṇuko viya aṭṭhāsi. So vegena gantvā taṃ hatthe
atk-s0512a:1191_3: gahetvā “bhakkhosi me āgatosī”ti āha. Atha naṃ rājā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā “sace
atk-s0512a:1191_4: āhāratthiko, imaṃ te maṃsaṃ dadāmi, taṃ gahetvā khāda, maṃ muñcāhī”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā
atk-s0512a:1191_5: porisādo “kimidaṃ mayhameva santakaṃ datvā mayā vohāraṃ karosi, nanu imaṃ maṃsañca
atk-s0512a:1191_6: tvañca mama hatthagatakālato paṭṭhāya mayhameva santakaṃ, tasmā taṃ paṭhamaṃ khāditvā
atk-s0512a:1192_0: Atha rājā “maṃsanikkayenāyaṃ na maṃ muñcati, mayā ca migavaṃ āgacchantena tassa brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0512a:1192_1: ‘āgantvā te dhanaṃ dassāmī’ti paṭiññā katā. Sacāyaṃ yakkho anujānissati, saccaṃ anurakkhanto
atk-s0512a:1192_2: gehaṃ gantvā taṃ paṭiññaṃ mocetvā puna imassa yakkhassa bhattatthaṃ āgaccheyya”nti
atk-s0512a:1192_3: cintetvā tassa tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Taṃ sutvā porisādo “sace tvaṃ saccaṃ anurakkhanto
atk-s0512a:1192_4: gantukāmosi, gantvā tassa brāhmaṇassa dātabbaṃ dhanaṃ datvā saccaṃ anurakkhanto sīghaṃ
atk-s0512a:1192_5: puna āgaccheyyāsī”ti vatvā rājānaṃ vissajjesi. So tena vissaṭṭho “tvaṃ mā cintayi,
atk-s0512a:1192_6: ahaṃ pātova āgamissāmī”ti vatvā magganimittāni sallakkhento attano balakāyaṃ upagantvā
atk-s0512a:1192_7: tena parivuto nagaraṃ pavisitvā nandabrāhmaṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā mahārahe āsane nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0512a:1192_8: tā gāthā sutvā cattāri sahassāni datvā yānaṃ āropetvā “imaṃ takkasilameva nethā”ti
atk-s0512a:1192_9: manusse datvā brāhmaṇaṃ uyyojetvā dutiyadivase porisādassa santikaṃ gantukāmo puttaṃ
atk-s0512a:1192_10: rajje patiṭṭhapetuṃ anusāsaniñca dento tamatthaṃ ārocesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1195: Brāhmaṇassa dhanaṃ datvā, pitā āmantayī mamaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1197: “Rajjaṃ putta paṭipajja, mā pamajji puraṃ idaṃ;
atk-s0512a:1198: Kataṃ me porisādena, mama āgamanaṃ punā”ti.
atk-s0512a:1199_0: Tattha āgamanaṃ punāti puna āgamanaṃ paṭiññātassa porisādassa saṅgaraṃ katvā. Brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0512a:1199_1: dhanaṃ datvāti takkasilato āgatassa nandanāmassa brāhmaṇassa tā gāthā sutvā catusahassaparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:1199_2: dhanaṃ datvā. Pitā āmantayī mamanti mama pitā jayaddisarājā maṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0512a:1200_0: Kathaṃ āmantesīti ce? Āha “rajja”ntiādi. Tassattho – putta, tvaṃ imaṃ kulasantakaṃ
atk-s0512a:1200_1: rajjaṃ paṭipajja, yathāhaṃ dhammena samena rajjaṃ kāremi, evaṃ tvampi chattaṃ ussāpetvā
atk-s0512a:1200_2: rajjaṃ kārehi. Tvaṃ idaṃ puraṃ rakkhanto rajjañca kārento mā pamādamāpajji, asukasmiṃ
atk-s0512a:1200_3: ṭhāne nigrodharukkhamūle porisādena yakkhena katametaṃ mayā saṅgaraṃ mama puna tassa
atk-s0512a:1200_4: santikaṃ āgamanaṃ uddissa, kevalaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa dhanadānatthaṃ idhāgato saccaṃ
atk-s0512a:1201_0: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “mā kho tvaṃ, mahārāja, tattha agamāsi, ahaṃ tattha gamissāmi.
atk-s0512a:1201_1: Sace pana tvaṃ, tāta, gamissasiyeva, ahampi tayā saddhiṃ gamissāmiyevā”ti. “Evaṃ
atk-s0512a:1201_2: sante mayaṃ ubhopi na bhavissāma, tasmā ahameva tattha gamissāmī”ti nānappakārena
atk-s0512a:1201_3: vārentaṃ rājānaṃ saññāpetvā mātāpitaro vanditvā pitu atthāya attānaṃ pariccajitvā
atk-s0512a:1201_4: sotthibhāvāya pitari sāsitavādaṃ payuñjamāne mātubhaginibhariyāsu ca saccakiriyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1201_5: karontīsu āvudhaṃ gahetvā nagarato nikkhamitvā assupuṇṇamukhaṃ mahājanaṃ anubandhantaṃ
atk-s0512a:1201_6: āpucchitvā pitarā akkhātanayena yakkhavāsamaggaṃ paṭipajji. Yakkhiniputtopi “khattiyā
atk-s0512a:1201_7: nāma bahumāyā, ko jānāti kiṃ bhavissatī”ti rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā rañño āgamanaṃ olokento
atk-s0512a:1201_8: nisinno kumāraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “pitaraṃ nivattetvā putto āgato bhavissati, natthi
atk-s0512a:1201_9: me bhaya”nti otaritvā tassa piṭṭhiṃ dassetvāva nisīdi. Mahāsatto āgantvā tassa purato
atk-s0512a:1205_0: 81. Sasatthahatthūpagatanti sasatthahatthaṃ upagataṃ āvudhapāṇiṃ maṃ attano santikaṃ
atk-s0512a:1205_1: upagataṃ disvā. Kadāci so tasissatīti so yakkho api taseyya. Tena bhijjissati sīlanti
atk-s0512a:1205_2: tena tassa tāsuppādanena mayhaṃ sīlaṃ vinassati saṃkilissati. Paritāsaṃ kate mayīti
atk-s0512a:1206_0: 82. Sīlakhaṇḍabhayā mayhaṃ, tassa dessaṃ na byāharinti yathā ca sīlabhedabhayena
atk-s0512a:1206_1: nihitasattho tassa santikaṃ agamāsi, evaṃ mayhaṃ sīlakhaṇḍabhayā eva tassa porisādassa
atk-s0512a:1206_2: dessaṃ aniṭṭhampi na byāhariṃ, kevalaṃ pana mettacittena hitavādī idaṃ idāni vakkhamānaṃ vacanaṃ abhāsiṃ.
atk-s0512a:1207_0: Mahāsatto ca gantvā purato ṭhito. Yakkhiniputto taṃ vīmaṃsitukāmo “kosi tvaṃ, kuto
atk-s0512a:1207_1: āgato, kiṃ maṃ na jānāsi ‘luddo manussamaṃsakhādako’ti, kasmā ca idhāgatosī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0512a:1207_2: Kumāro “ahaṃ jayaddisarañño putto, tvaṃ porisādakoti jānāmi, pitu jīvitaṃ rakkhituṃ
atk-s0512a:1207_3: idhāgato, tasmā taṃ muñca, maṃ khādā”ti āha. Puna yakkhiniputto mukhākāreneva “taṃ
atk-s0512a:1207_4: tassa puttoti ahaṃ jānāmi, dukkaraṃ pana tayā kataṃ evaṃ āgacchantenā”ti āha. Kumāro
atk-s0512a:1207_5: “na idaṃ dukkaraṃ, yaṃ pitu atthe jīvitapariccajanaṃ, mātāpituhetu hi evarūpaṃ puññaṃ
atk-s0512a:1207_6: katvā ekanteneva sagge pamodati, ahañca ‘amaraṇadhammo nāma koci satto natthī’ti
atk-s0512a:1207_7: jānāmi, attanā ca kiñci kataṃ pāpaṃ nāma na sarāmi, tasmā maraṇatopi me bhayaṃ natthi,
atk-s0512a:1207_8: idaṃ sarīraṃ mayā te nissaṭṭhaṃ, aggiṃ jāletvā khādā”ti āha. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1211_0: Taṃ sutvā yakkhiniputto “na sakkā imassa maṃsaṃ khādituṃ, upāyena imaṃ palāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0512a:1211_1: cintetvā “tena hi araññaṃ pavisitvā sāradārūni āharitvā niddhūme aṅgāre karohi, tattha
atk-s0512a:1211_2: te maṃsaṃ pacitvā khādissāmī”ti āha. Mahāsatto tathā katvā tassa ārocesi. So taṃ
atk-s0512a:1211_3: olokento “ayaṃ purisasīho maraṇatopi bhayaṃ natthi, evaṃ nibbhayo nāma na mayā diṭṭhapubbo”ti
atk-s0512a:1211_4: lomahaṃsajāto kumāraṃ olokesi. Kumāro kissa maṃ olokesi, na yathāvuttaṃ karosīti.
atk-s0512a:1211_5: Yakkhiniputto mahāsattaṃ “sattadhā tassa muddhā phaleyya, yo taṃ khādeyyā”ti āha.
atk-s0512a:1211_6: “Sace maṃ na khāditukāmosi, atha kasmā aggiṃ kāresī”ti? “Tava pariggaṇhanattha”nti.
atk-s0512a:1211_7: “Tvaṃ idāni maṃ kathaṃ pariggaṇhissasi, svāhaṃ tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattopi sakkassa
atk-s0512a:1211_8: devarañño attānaṃ pariggaṇhituṃ na adāsi”nti imamatthaṃ dassento –
atk-s0512a:1212: “Idañhi so brāhmaṇaṃ maññamāno, saso avāsesi sake sarīre;
atk-s0512a:1213: Teneva so candimā devaputto, sasatthuto kāmaduhajja yakkhā”ti. –
atk-s0512a:1215_0: Tattha saso avāsesi sake sarīreti attano sarīrahetu imaṃ sarīraṃ khāditvā idha vasāti
atk-s0512a:1215_1: evaṃ sake sarīre attano sarīraṃ dento taṃ brāhmaṇarūpaṃ sakkaṃ tattha vāsesi. Sasatthutoti
atk-s0512a:1215_2: “sasī”ti evaṃ sasasaddena thuto. Kāmaduhoti kāmavaḍḍhano. Yakkhāti deva.
atk-s0512a:1216: Evaṃ mahāsatto cande sasalakkhaṇaṃ kappaṭṭhiyaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ sakkhiṃ katvā attano sakkenapi pariggaṇhituṃ asakkuṇeyyataṃ abhāsi. Taṃ sutvā porisādo acchariyabbhutacittajāto –
atk-s0512a:1217: “Cando yathā rāhumukhā pamutto, virocate pannaraseva bhāṇumā;
atk-s0512a:1218: Evaṃ tuvaṃ porisādā pamutto, viroca kapile mahānubhāva;
atk-s0512a:1219: Āmodayaṃ pitaraṃ mātarañca, sabbo ca te nandatu ñātipakkho”ti. –
atk-s0512a:1220_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā “gaccha mahāvīrā”ti kumāraṃ vissajjesi. Sopi taṃ nibbisevanaṃ katvā
atk-s0512a:1220_1: pañca sīlāni datvā “yakkho nu kho esa, no”ti vīmaṃsanto “yakkhānaṃ akkhīni rattāni
atk-s0512a:1220_2: honti animisāni ca, chāyā ca na paññāyati, asambhīto hoti, na imassa tathā. Tasmā
atk-s0512a:1220_3: nāyaṃ yakkho manusso eso, mayhaṃ kira pitu tayo bhātaro yakkhiniyā gahitā, tesu tāya
atk-s0512a:1220_4: dve khāditā bhavissanti, eko puttasinehena paṭijaggito bhavissati. Iminā tena bhavitabba”nti
atk-s0512a:1220_5: nayaggāhena anumānena sabbaññutaññāṇena viya aviparītato niṭṭhaṃ gantvā “mayhaṃ pitu
atk-s0512a:1220_6: ācikkhitvā rajje patiṭṭhāpessāmī”ti cintetvā “na tvaṃ yakkho, pitu me jeṭṭhabhātikosi,
atk-s0512a:1220_7: ehi mayā saddhiṃ gantvā kulasantakaṃ rajjaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti āha. Tena vuttaṃ “tvaṃ
atk-s0512a:1220_8: pitāmahā”ti, tvaṃ mama mahāpitāti attho. Itarena “nāhaṃ manusso”ti vutte tena saddhātabbassa
atk-s0512a:1220_9: dibbacakkhukatāpasassa santikaṃ nesi. Tāpasena “kiṃ karontā pitā puttā araññe vicarathā”ti
atk-s0512a:1220_10: pitubhāve kathite porisādo saddahitvā “gaccha, tāta, tvaṃ, na me rajjena attho, pabbajissāmaha”nti
atk-s0512a:1220_11: tāpasassa santike isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1224: Tattha sīlavataṃ hetūti sīlavantānaṃ mama pitūnaṃ hetu. Atha vā sīlavataṃ hetūti sīlavatahetu, mayhaṃ sīlavatasamādānanimittaṃ tassa abhijjanatthaṃ. Tassāti taṃ porisādaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1225_0: Atha mahāsatto attano mahāpitaraṃ pabbajitaṃ vanditvā nagarassa samīpaṃ gantvā “kumāro
atk-s0512a:1225_1: kira āgato”ti sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhena raññā nāgarehi negamajānapadehi ca paccuggato
atk-s0512a:1225_2: rājānaṃ vanditvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Taṃ sutvā rājā taṅkhaṇaññeva bheriṃ carāpetvā
atk-s0512a:1225_3: mahantena parivārena tassa santikaṃ gantvā “ehi, bhātika, rajjaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a:1225_4: “Alaṃ, mahārājā”ti. “Tena hi mayhaṃ uyyāne vasā”ti. “Na āgacchāmī”ti. Rājā tassa
atk-s0512a:1225_5: assamassa avidūre gāmaṃ nivesetvā bhikkhaṃ paṭṭhapesi. So cūḷakammāsadammanigamo nāma jāto.
atk-s0512a:1226: Tadā mātāpitaro mahārājakulāni ahesuṃ, tāpaso sāriputto, porisādo aṅgulimālo, kaniṭṭhā uppalavaṇṇā, aggamahesī rāhulamātā, alīnasattukumāro lokanātho.
atk-s0512a:1227_0: Tassa idhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva yathārahaṃ sesapāramiyo niddhāretabbā. Tathā pitarā
atk-s0512a:1227_1: nivāriyamāno attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pitu jīvitarakkhaṇatthaṃ “porisādassa santikaṃ
atk-s0512a:1227_2: gamissāmī”ti nicchayo, tassa ca santāsapariharaṇatthaṃ nihitasatthassa gamanaṃ, “attano
atk-s0512a:1227_3: sīlakhaṇḍanaṃ mā hotū”ti tena piyavācāya samudācāro, tena ca nānānayehi pariggaṇhiyamānassa
atk-s0512a:1227_4: maraṇasantāsābhāvo, pitu atthe mayhaṃ sarīraṃ saphalaṃ karissāmīti haṭṭhatuṭṭhabhāvo,
atk-s0512a:1227_5: sakkenāpi pariggaṇhituṃ asakkuṇeyyassa sasajātiyampi pariccāgatthaṃ attano jīvitanirapekkhabhāvassa
atk-s0512a:1227_6: jānanaṃ, tena samāgamepi ossaṭṭhepi cittassa vikārābhāvo, tassa ca manussabhāvamahāpitubhāvānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1227_7: aviparītato jānanaṃ, ñātamatte ca taṃ kulasantake rajje patiṭṭhāpetukāmatā, dhammadesanāya
atk-s0512a:1227_8: saṃvejetvā sīlesu patiṭṭhāpananti. Evamādayo idha bodhisattassa guṇānubhāvā vibhāvetabbāti.
atk-s0512a:1230_0: 85. Dasame saṅkhapālotiādīsu ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – devabhogasampattisadisāya mahatiyā
atk-s0512a:1230_1: nāgiddhiyā samannāgatattā mahiddhiko. Heṭṭhā dve, upari dveti catasso dāṭhā āvudhā
atk-s0512a:1230_2: etassāti dāṭhāvudho. Uggatejavisatāya ghoraviso. Nāgayonisiddhāhi dvīhi jivhāhi samannāgatoti
atk-s0512a:1230_3: dvijivho. Mahānubhāvānampi urena gamanato “uragā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ nāgānaṃ adhipatibhāvato uragādhibhū.
atk-s0512a:1231_0: 86. Dvinnaṃ maggānaṃ vinivijjhitvā sandhibhāvena gataṭṭhānasaṅkhāte catuppathe. Aparāparaṃ
atk-s0512a:1231_1: mahājanasañcaraṇaṭṭhānabhūte mahāmagge. Tato eva mahājanasamākiṇṇabhāvena nānājanasamākule.
atk-s0512a:1231_2: Idāni vakkhamānānaṃ catunnaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena caturo aṅge. Adhiṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhahitvā,
atk-s0512a:1231_3: citte ṭhapetvā. Yadāhaṃ saṅkhapālo nāma yathāvuttarūpo nāgarājā homi, tadā heṭṭhā
atk-s0512a:1231_4: vuttappakāre ṭhāne vāsaṃ uposathavāsavasena nivāsaṃ akappayiṃ kappesiṃ.
atk-s0512a:1232_0: Mahāsatto hi dānasīlādipuññapasuto hutvā bodhipariyesanavasena aparāparaṃ devamanussagatīsu
atk-s0512a:1232_1: saṃsaranto kadāci devabhogasadisasampattike nāgabhavane nibbattitvā saṅkhapālo nāma
atk-s0512a:1232_2: nāgarājā ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo. So gacchante kāle tāya sampattiyā vippaṭisārī
atk-s0512a:1232_3: hutvā manussayoniṃ patthento uposathavāsaṃ vasi. Athassa nāgabhavane vasantassa uposathavāso
atk-s0512a:1232_4: na sampajjati, sīlaṃ saṃkilissati, tena so nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā kaṇhavaṇṇāya nadiyā
atk-s0512a:1232_5: avidūre mahāmaggassa ca ekapadikamaggassa ca antare ekaṃ vammikaṃ parikkhipitvā uposathaṃ
atk-s0512a:1232_6: adhiṭṭhāya cātuddasapannarasesu samādinnasīlo “mama cammādīni atthikā gaṇhantū”ti
atk-s0512a:1232_7: attānaṃ dānamukhe vissajjetvā nipajjati, pāṭipade nāgabhavanaṃ gacchati. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0512a:1232_8: “punāparaṃ yadā homi, saṅkhapālo”tiādi. Tassattho vutto eva.
atk-s0512a:1233_0: 87. Yaṃ panettha chaviyā cammenātiādikaṃ “caturo aṅge adhiṭṭhāyā”ti vuttaṃ caturaṅgādhiṭṭhānadassanaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1233_1: Chavicammāni hi idha ekamaṅgaṃ. Evaṃ uposathavāsaṃ vasantassa mahāsattassa dīgho addhā vītivatto.
atk-s0512a:1234_0: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ tathā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā nipanne soḷasa bhojaputtā “maṃsaṃ āharissāmā”ti
atk-s0512a:1234_1: āvudhahatthā araññe carantā kiñci alabhitvā nikkhamantā taṃ vammikamatthake nipannaṃ
atk-s0512a:1234_2: disvā “mayaṃ ajja godhāpotakampi na labhimhā, imaṃ nāgarājānaṃ vadhitvā khādissāmā”ti
atk-s0512a:1234_3: cintetvā “mahā kho panesa gayhamāno palāyeyyāti yathānipannakaṃyeva naṃ bhogesu sūlehi
atk-s0512a:1234_4: vijjhitvā dubbalaṃ katvā gaṇhissāmā”ti sūlāni ādāya upasaṅkamiṃsu. Bodhisattassāpi
atk-s0512a:1234_5: sarīraṃ mahantaṃ ekadoṇikanāvappamāṇaṃ vaṭṭetvā ṭhapitasumanapupphadāmaṃ viya jiñjukaphalasadisehi
atk-s0512a:1234_6: akkhīhi jayasumanapupphasadisena ca sīsena samannāgataṃ ativiya sobhati. So tesaṃ
atk-s0512a:1234_7: soḷasannaṃ janānaṃ padasaddena bhogantarato sīsaṃ nīharitvā rattakkhīni ummīletvā
atk-s0512a:1234_8: te sūlahatthe āgacchante disvā “ajja mayhaṃ manoratho matthakaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti attānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1234_9: dānamukhe niyyātetvā “ime mama sarīraṃ sattīhi koṭṭetvā chiddāvachiddaṃ karonte na
atk-s0512a:1234_10: olokessāmī”ti attano sīlakhaṇḍabhayena daḷhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā sīsaṃ bhogantare
atk-s0512a:1235_0: Atha naṃ te upagantvā naṅguṭṭhe gahetvā ākaḍḍhantā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā tikhiṇasūlehi
atk-s0512a:1235_1: aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vijjhitvā sakaṇṭakā kāḷavettayaṭṭhiyo pahāramukhehi pavesetvā aṭṭhasu
atk-s0512a:1235_2: ṭhānesu kājehi ādāya mahāmaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu. Mahāsatto sūlehi vijjhanato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0512a:1235_3: ekaṭṭhānepi akkhīni ummīletvā te na olokesi. Tassa aṭṭhahi kājehi ādāya nīyamānassa
atk-s0512a:1235_4: sīsaṃ olambitvā bhūmiṃ paharati. Atha naṃ “sīsamassa olambatī”ti mahāmagge nipajjāpetvā
atk-s0512a:1235_5: sukhumena sūlena nāsāpuṭe vijjhitvā rajjukaṃ pavesetvā sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā kājakoṭiyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1235_6: laggetvā punapi ukkhipitvā maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1242_0: Tattha bhojaputtāti luddaputtā. Kharāti kakkhaḷā, pharusakāyavacīkammantā. Luddāti
atk-s0512a:1242_1: dāruṇā, ghoramānasā. Akāruṇāti nikkaruṇā. Daṇḍamuggarapāṇinoti caturassadaṇḍahatthā.
atk-s0512a:1242_2: Nāsāya vinivijjhitvāti rajjukaṃ pavesetuṃ sukhumena sūlena nāsāpuṭe vijjhitvā. Naṅguṭṭhe
atk-s0512a:1242_3: piṭṭhikaṇṭaketi naṅguṭṭhappadese tattha tattha piṭṭhikaṇṭakasamīpe ca vinivijjhitvāti
atk-s0512a:1242_4: sambandho. Kāje āropayitvānāti aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vinivijjhitvā baddhesu aṭṭhasu vettalatāmaṇḍalesu
atk-s0512a:1242_5: ekekasmiṃ ovijjhitaṃ ekekaṃ kājaṃ dve dve bhojaputtā attano attano khandhaṃ āropetvā.
atk-s0512a:1243_0: 90. Sasāgarantaṃ pathavinti samuddapariyantaṃ mahāpathaviṃ. Sakānanaṃ sapabbatanti
atk-s0512a:1243_1: saddhiṃ kānanehi pabbatehi cāti sakānanaṃ sapabbatañca. Nāsāvātena jhāpayeti sacāhaṃ
atk-s0512a:1243_2: icchamāno icchanto kujjhitvā nāsāvātaṃ vissajjeyyaṃ, samuddapariyantaṃ sakānanaṃ
atk-s0512a:1243_3: sapabbataṃ imaṃ mahāpathaviṃ jhāpeyyaṃ, saha nāsāvātavissajjanena chārikaṃ kareyyaṃ,
atk-s0512a:1244_0: 91. Evaṃ santepi sūlehi vinivijjhante, koṭṭayantepi sattibhi. Bhojaputte na kuppāmīti
atk-s0512a:1244_1: dubbalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ vettalatāpavesanatthañca sāradārūhi tacchetvā katehi tikhiṇasūlehi
atk-s0512a:1244_2: aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu vijjhantepi dubbalabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ tikhiṇāhi sattīhi tahiṃ tahiṃ
atk-s0512a:1244_3: koṭṭayantepi bhojaputtānaṃ luddānaṃ na kuppāmi. Esā me sīlapāramīti evaṃ mahānubhāvassa
atk-s0512a:1244_4: tathā adhiṭṭhahantassa yā me mayhaṃ sīlakhaṇḍabhayena tesaṃ akujjhanā, esā ekanteneva
atk-s0512a:1244_5: jīvitanirapekkhabhāvena pavattā mayhaṃ sīlapāramī, sīlavasena paramatthapāramīti attho.
atk-s0512a:1245_0: Tathā pana bodhisatte tehi nīyamāne mithilanagaravāsī āḷāro nāma kuṭumbiko pañcasakaṭasatāni
atk-s0512a:1245_1: ādāya sukhayānake nisīditvā gacchanto te bhojaputte mahāsattaṃ harante disvā kāruññaṃ
atk-s0512a:1245_2: uppādetvā te ludde pucchi – “kissāyaṃ nāgo nīyati, netvā cimaṃ kiṃ karissathā”ti?
atk-s0512a:1245_3: Te “imassa nāgassa maṃsaṃ sāduñca muduñca thūlañca pacitvā khādissāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0512a:1245_4: Atha so tesaṃ soḷasavāhagoṇe pasataṃ pasataṃ suvaṇṇamāsake sabbesaṃ nivāsanapārupanāni
atk-s0512a:1245_5: bhariyānampi tesaṃ vatthābharaṇāni datvā “sammā, ayaṃ mahānubhāvo nāgarājā, attano
atk-s0512a:1245_6: sīlaguṇena tumhākaṃ na dubbhi, imaṃ kilamantehi bahuṃ tumhehi apuññaṃ pasutaṃ, vissajjethā”ti
atk-s0512a:1245_7: āha. Te “ayaṃ amhākaṃ manāpo bhakkho, bahū ca no uragā bhuttapubbā, tathāpi tava
atk-s0512a:1245_8: vacanaṃ amhehi pūjetabbaṃ, tasmā imaṃ nāgaṃ vissajjessāmā”ti vissajjetvā mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0512a:1245_9: bhūmiyaṃ nipajjāpetvā attano kakkhaḷatāya tā kaṇṭakācitā āvutā kāḷavettalatā koṭiyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1246_0: Atha so nāgarājānaṃ kilamantaṃ disvā akilamentova asinā latā chinditvā dārakānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1246_1: kaṇṇavedhato paṭiharaṇaniyāmena adukkhāpento saṇikaṃ nīhari. Tasmiṃ kāle te bhojaputtā
atk-s0512a:1246_2: yaṃ bandhanaṃ tassa natthuto pavesetvā paṭimukkaṃ, taṃ bandhanaṃ saṇikaṃ mocayiṃsu.
atk-s0512a:1246_3: Mahāsatto muhuttaṃ pācīnābhimukho gantvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi āḷāraṃ olokesi. Luddā
atk-s0512a:1246_4: thokaṃ gantvā “urago dubbalo, matakāle gahetvāva naṃ gamissāmā”ti nilīyiṃsu. Āḷāro
atk-s0512a:1246_5: mahāsattassa añjaliṃ paggayha “gaccheva kho tvaṃ, mahānāga, mā taṃ luddā puna gahesu”nti
atk-s0512a:1246_6: vadanto thokaṃ taṃ nāgaṃ anugantvā nivatti.
atk-s0512a:1247_0: Bodhisatto nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā tattha papañcaṃ akatvā mahantena parivārena nikkhamitvā
atk-s0512a:1247_1: āḷāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nāgabhavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā taṃ tattha netvā tīhi kaññāsatehi
atk-s0512a:1247_2: saddhiṃ mahantamassa yasaṃ datvā dibbehi kāmehi santappesi. Āḷāro nāgabhavane ekavassaṃ
atk-s0512a:1247_3: vasitvā dibbe kāme paribhuñjitvā “icchāmahaṃ, samma, pabbajitu”nti nāgarājassa kathetvā
atk-s0512a:1247_4: pabbajitaparikkhāre gahetvā tato nikkhamitvā himavantappadesaṃ gantvā pabbajitvā
atk-s0512a:1247_5: tattha ciraṃ vasitvā aparabhāge cārikaṃ caranto bārāṇasiṃ patvā bārāṇasiraññā samāgato
atk-s0512a:1247_6: tena ācārasampattiṃ nissāya pasannena “tvaṃ uḷārabhogā maññe kulā pabbajito, kena
atk-s0512a:1247_7: nu kho kāraṇena pabbajitosī”ti puṭṭho attano pabbajjākāraṇaṃ kathento luddānaṃ hatthato
atk-s0512a:1247_8: bodhisattassa vissajjāpanaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ rañño ācikkhitvā –
atk-s0512a:1249: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, saddhāyahaṃ pabbajitomhi, rāja.
atk-s0512a:1250: “Dumapphalānīva patanti māṇavā, daharā ca vuddhā ca sarīrabhedā;
atk-s0512a:1251: Etampi disvā pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo”ti. –
atk-s0512a:1254: “Addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0512a:1255: Nāgañca sutvāna tavañcaḷāra, kāhāmi puññāni anappakānī”ti. –
atk-s0512a:1258: “Addhā have sevitabbā sapaññā, bahussutā ye bahuṭhānacintino;
atk-s0512a:1259: Nāgañca sutvāna mamañca rāja, karohi puññāni anappakānī”ti. –
atk-s0512a:1260_0: Evaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā tattheva cattāro vassānamāse vasitvā puna himavantaṃ gantvā
atk-s0512a:1260_1: yāvajīvaṃ cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmalokūpago ahosi. Bodhisattopi yāvajīvaṃ
atk-s0512a:1260_2: uposathavāsaṃ vasitvā saggapuraṃ pūresi. Sopi rājā dānādīni puññāni katvā yathākammaṃ gato.
atk-s0512a:1261: Tadā āḷāro sāriputtatthero ahosi, bārāṇasirājā ānandatthero, saṅkhapālanāgarājā lokanātho.
atk-s0512a:1262_0: Tassa sarīrapariccāgo dānapāramī, tathārūpenapi visatejena samannāgatassa tathārūpāyapi
atk-s0512a:1262_1: pīḷāya sati sīlassa abhinnatā sīlapāramī, devabhogasampattisadisaṃ bhogaṃ pahāya
atk-s0512a:1262_3: kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti saṃvidahanaṃ paññāpāramī, kāmavitakkavinodanaṃ adhivāsanavīriyañca
atk-s0512a:1262_4: vīriyapāramī, adhivāsanakhanti khantipāramī, saccasamādānaṃ saccapāramī, acalasamādānādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1262_5: adhiṭṭhānapāramī, bhojaputte upādāya sabbasattesu mettānuddayabhāvo mettāpāramī,
atk-s0512a:1262_6: vedanāya sattasaṅkhārakatavippakāresu ca majjhattabhāvo upekkhāpāramīti evaṃ dasa
atk-s0512a:1262_7: pāramiyo labbhanti. Sīlapāramī pana atisayavatīti katvā sā eva desanaṃ āruḷhā. Tathā
atk-s0512a:1264_0: Eteti ye hatthināgacariyādayo imasmiṃ vagge niddiṭṭhā anantaragāthāya ca “hatthināgo
atk-s0512a:1264_1: bhūridatto”tiādinā uddānavasena saṅgahetvā dassitā nava cariyā, te sabbe visesato
atk-s0512a:1264_2: sīlapāramipūraṇavasena pavattiyā sīlaṃ balaṃ etesanti sīlabalā. Sīlassa paramatthapāramibhūtassa
atk-s0512a:1264_3: parikkharaṇato santānassa ca paribhāvanāvasena abhisaṅkharaṇato parikkhārā. Ukkaṃsagatāya
atk-s0512a:1264_4: sīlaparamatthapāramiyā asampuṇṇattā padeso etesaṃ atthi, na nippadesoti padesikā
atk-s0512a:1264_5: sappadesā. Kasmāti ce? Āha “jīvitaṃ parirakkhitvā, sīlāni anurakkhisa”nti, yasmā
atk-s0512a:1264_6: etesu hatthināgacariyādīsu ahaṃ attano jīvitaṃ ekadesena parirakkhitvāva sīlāni anurakkhiṃ,
atk-s0512a:1264_7: jīvitaṃ na sabbathā pariccajiṃ, ekanteneva pana saṅkhapālassa me sato sabbakālampi
atk-s0512a:1264_8: jīvitaṃ yassa kassaci niyyattaṃ, saṅkhapālanāgarājassa pana me mahānubhāvassa uggavisatejassa
atk-s0512a:1264_9: sato samānassa sabbakālampi tehi luddehi samāgame tato pubbepi pacchāpi sato evaṃ
atk-s0512a:1264_10: puggalavibhāgaṃ akatvā yassa kassaci sīlānurakkhaṇatthameva jīvitaṃ ekaṃseneva niyyattaṃ
atk-s0512a:1264_11: nīyātitaṃ dānamukhe nissaṭṭhaṃ, tasmā sā sīlapāramīti yasmā cetadevaṃ, tasmā tena
atk-s0512a:1264_12: kāraṇena sā paramatthapāramibhāvaṃ pattā mayhaṃ sīlapāramīti dassetīti.
atk-s0512a:1271: 1. Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame amitayasoti aparimitaparivāravibhavo. Rājaputto yudhañjayoti rammanagare sabbadattassa nāma rañño putto nāmena yudhañjayo nāma.
atk-s0512a:1272_0: Ayañhi bārāṇasī udayajātake surundhananagaraṃ nāma jātā. Cūḷasutasomajātake sudassanaṃ
atk-s0512a:1272_1: nāma, soṇanandajātake brahmavaḍḍhanaṃ nāma, khaṇḍahālajātake pupphavatī nāma, imasmiṃ
atk-s0512a:1272_2: pana yudhañjayajātake rammanagaraṃ nāma ahosi, evamassa kadāci nāmaṃ parivattati.
atk-s0512a:1272_3: Tena vuttaṃ – “rājaputtoti rammanagare sabbadattassa nāma rañño putto”ti. Tassa pana
atk-s0512a:1272_4: rañño puttasahassaṃ ahosi. Bodhisatto jeṭṭhaputto, tassa rājā uparajjaṃ adāsi. So
atk-s0512a:1272_5: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva divase divase mahādānaṃ pavattesi. Evaṃ gacchante kāle bodhisatto
atk-s0512a:1272_6: ekadivasaṃ pātova rathavaraṃ abhiruhitvā mahantena sirivibhavena uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchanto
