atk-s0512a:1865_3: parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa khantivādikāle –
atk-s0512a:1867: Kāsirāje na kuppāmi, esā me khantipāramī”ti. –
atk-s0512a:1868: Evaṃ acetanabhāvena viya mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantassa khantipāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0512a:1869_0: Katvā daḷhamadhiṭṭhānanti kusalasamādānādhiṭṭhānaṃ tassa tassa pāramisamādānassa
atk-s0512a:1869_1: tadupakārakasamādānassa ca adhiṭṭhānaṃ daḷhataraṃ asithilaṃ katvā, taṃ taṃ vatasamādānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1869_2: anivattibhāvena adhiṭṭhahitvāti attho. Tattha jotipālakāle sarabhaṅgakāle nemikāleti
atk-s0512a:1869_3: evamādīsu adhiṭṭhānapāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa temiyakumārakāle –
atk-s0512a:1870: “Mātāpitā na me dessā, attā me na ca dessiyo;
atk-s0512a:1872: Evaṃ jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa adhiṭṭhānapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0512a:1873_0: Saccavācānurakkhiyāti saccavācaṃ anurakkhitvā jīvitantarāyepi anariyavohāraṃ gūthaṃ
atk-s0512a:1873_1: viya jigucchanto pariharitvā sabbaso avisaṃvādibhāvaṃ rakkhitvā. Tattha kapirājakāle
atk-s0512a:1873_2: saccatāpasakāle maccharājakāleti evamādīsu saccapāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:1875: Mocesiṃ ekasataṃ khattiye, esā me saccapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0512a:1876: Evaṃ jīvitaṃ cajitvā saccaṃ anurakkhantassa saccapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0512a:1877_0: Mettāya pāramiṃ gantvāti sabbasattesu anodhiso hitūpasaṃhāralakkhaṇāya mettāya pāramiṃ
atk-s0512a:1877_1: paramukkaṃsataṃ patvā. Tattha cūḷadhammapālakāle mahāsīlavarājakāle sāmapaṇḍitakāleti
atk-s0512a:1877_2: evamādīsu mettāpāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa suvaṇṇasāmakāle –
atk-s0512a:1878: “Na maṃ koci uttasati, napihaṃ bhāyāmi kassaci;
atk-s0512a:1880: Evaṃ jīvitampi anoloketvā mettāyantassa mettāpāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0512a:1881_0: Sammānanāvamānaneti sakkaccaṃ pūjāsakkārādinā sammānane oṭṭhubhanādinā avamānane
atk-s0512a:1881_1: ca sabbattha lokadhamme samako samacitto nibbikāro hutvā uttamaṃ anuttaraṃ labbaññutaṃ
atk-s0512a:1881_2: adhigatosmīti attho. Tattha mahāvānarindakāle kāsirājakāle khemabrāhmaṇakāle aṭṭhisenaparibbājakakāleti
atk-s0512a:1881_3: evamādīsu upekkhāpāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa mahālomahaṃsakāle –
atk-s0512a:1884: Evaṃ gāmadārakesu oṭṭhubhanādīhi ceva mālāgandhūpahārādīhi ca sukhadukkhaṃ uppādentesupi upekkhaṃ anativattantassa upekkhāpāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā. Iti bhagavā –
atk-s0512a:1887: Sammāsambodhiṃ adhigantuṃ imasmiṃ bhaddakappe attanā kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ saṅkhepeneva vatvā puna –
atk-s0512a:1896: Attanā sammadeva paripūritā dasa pāramiyo dasseti.
atk-s0512a:1898: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā mahābodhiyānapaṭipattiyaṃ ussāhajātānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ bodhisambhāresu nānappakārakosallatthaṃ sabbapāramīsu pakiṇṇakakathā kathetabbā.
atk-s0512a:1899_0: Tatridaṃ pañhakammaṃ – kā panetā pāramiyo? Kenaṭṭhena pāramiyo? Katividhā cetā? Ko
atk-s0512a:1899_1: tāsaṃ kamo? Kāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni? Ko paccayo? Ko saṃkileso?
atk-s0512a:1899_2: Kiṃ vodānaṃ? Ko paṭipakkho? Kā paṭipatti? Ko vibhāgo? Ko saṅgaho? Ko sampādanūpāyo?
atk-s0512a:1899_3: Kittakena kālena sampādanaṃ? Ko ānisaṃso? Kiṃ cetāsaṃ phalanti?
atk-s0512a:1900: Tatridaṃ vissajjanaṃ – kā panetā pāramiyoti? Taṇhāmānadiṭṭhīhi anupahatā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā dānādayo guṇā pāramiyo.
atk-s0512a:1901_0: Kenaṭṭhena pāramiyoti? Dānasīlādiguṇavisesayogena sattuttamatāya paramā mahāsattā
atk-s0512a:1901_1: bodhisattā, tesaṃ bhāvo kammaṃ vā pāramī, dānādikiriyā. Atha vā paratīti paramo,
atk-s0512a:1901_2: dānādiguṇānaṃ pūrako pālako cāti bodhisatto, paramassa ayaṃ, paramassa vā bhāvo,
atk-s0512a:1901_3: kammaṃ vā pāramī, dānādikiriyāva. Atha vā paraṃ sattaṃ attani mavati bandhati guṇavisesayogena,
atk-s0512a:1901_4: paraṃ vā adhikataraṃ majjati sujjhati saṃkilesamalato, paraṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1901_5: visesena mayati gacchati, paraṃ vā lokaṃ pamāṇabhūtena ñāṇavisesena idhalokaṃ viya
atk-s0512a:1901_6: munāti paricchindati, paraṃ vā ativiya sīlādiguṇagaṇaṃ attano santāne minoti pakkhipati,
atk-s0512a:1901_7: paraṃ vā attabhūtato dhammakāyato aññaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ vā tadanatthakaraṃ kilesacoragaṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:1901_8: mināti hiṃsatīti paramo, mahāsatto. Paramassa ayantiādi vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ. Pāre
atk-s0512a:1901_9: vā nibbāne majjati sujjhati satte ca sodheti, tattha vā satte mavati bandhati yojeti,
atk-s0512a:1901_10: taṃ vā mayati gacchati gameti ca, munāti vā taṃ yāthāvato, tattha vā satte minoti
atk-s0512a:1901_11: pakkhipati, kilesārayo vā sattānaṃ tattha mināti hiṃsatīti pāramī, mahāpuriso. Tassa
atk-s0512a:1901_12: bhāvo kammaṃ vā pāramitā, dānādikiriyāva. Iminā nayena pāramīsaddattho veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:1902: Katividhāti? Saṅkhepato dasavidhā. Tā pana pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato āgatāyeva. Yathāha –
atk-s0512a:1905_0: Ādi. Yathā cāha – “kati nu kho, bhante, buddhakārakā dhammā? Dasa kho, sāriputta,
atk-s0512a:1905_1: buddhakārakā dhammā. Katame dasa? Dānaṃ kho, sāriputta, buddhakārako dhammo, sīlaṃ,
atk-s0512a:1905_2: nekkhammaṃ, paññā, vīriyaṃ, khanti, saccaṃ, adhiṭṭhānaṃ, mettā, upekkhā buddhakārako
atk-s0512a:1905_3: dhammo. Ime kho, sāriputta, dasa buddhakārakā dhammā”ti. Idamavoca bhagavā, idaṃ
atk-s0512a:1908: Keci pana “chabbidhā”ti vadanti. Taṃ etāsaṃ saṅgahavasena vuttaṃ. So pana saṅgaho parato āvi bhavissati.
atk-s0512a:1909_0: Ko tāsaṃ kamoti? Ettha kamoti desanākkamo, so ca paṭhamasamādānahetuko, samādānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1909_1: pavicayahetukaṃ, iti yathā ādimhi pavicitā samādinnā ca, tathā desitā. Tattha dānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1909_2: sīlassa bahūpakāraṃ sukarañcāti taṃ ādimhi vuttaṃ. Dānaṃ sīlapariggahitaṃ mahapphalaṃ
atk-s0512a:1909_3: hoti mahānisaṃsanti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlaṃ nekkhammapariggahitaṃ, nekkhammaṃ
atk-s0512a:1909_4: paññāpariggahitaṃ, paññā vīriyapariggahitā, vīriyaṃ khantipariggahitaṃ, khanti saccapariggahitā,
atk-s0512a:1909_5: saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānapariggahitaṃ, adhiṭṭhānaṃ mettāpariggahitaṃ, mettā upekkhāpariggahitā
atk-s0512a:1909_6: mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṃsāti mettānantaramupekkhā vuttā. Upekkhā pana karuṇāpariggahitā
atk-s0512a:1909_7: karuṇā ca upekkhāpariggahitāti veditabbā. “Kathaṃ pana mahākāruṇikā bodhisattā sattesu
atk-s0512a:1909_8: upekkhakā hontī”ti? “Upekkhitabbayuttesu kañci kālaṃ upekkhakā honti, na pana sabbattha
atk-s0512a:1909_9: sabbadā cā”ti keci. Apare pana – “na sattesu upekkhakā, sattakatesu pana vippakāresu upekkhakā hontī”ti.
atk-s0512a:1910_0: Aparo nayo – pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā appaphalattā sukarattā
atk-s0512a:1910_1: ca ādimhi dānaṃ vuttaṃ. Sīlena dāyakapaṭiggāhakasuddhito parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato
atk-s0512a:1910_2: kiriyadhammaṃ vatvā akiriyadhammavacanato bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato
atk-s0512a:1910_3: ca dānassa anantaraṃ sīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Nekkhammena sīlasampattisiddhito kāyavacīsucaritaṃ
atk-s0512a:1910_4: vatvā manosucaritavacanato visuddhasīlassa sukheneva jhānasamijjhanato kammāparādhappahānena
atk-s0512a:1910_6: cittassa pariyuṭṭhānappahānavacanato ca sīlassa anantaraṃ nekkhammaṃ vuttaṃ. Paññāya
atk-s0512a:1910_8: hi paññā, paññāpaccupaṭṭhāno ca samādhi”. Samathanimittaṃ vatvā upekkhānimittavacanato
atk-s0512a:1910_9: parahitajjhānena parahitakaraṇūpāyakosallavacanato ca nekkhammassa anantaraṃ paññā
atk-s0512a:1910_11: sattahitāya ārambhassa acchariyatāvacanato upekkhānimittaṃ vatvā paggahanimittavacanato
atk-s0512a:1910_12: nisammakāritaṃ vatvā uṭṭhānavacanato ca “nisammakārino hi uṭṭhānaṃ phalavisesamāvahatī”ti
atk-s0512a:1911_0: Vīriyena titikkhāsiddhito “vīriyavā hi āraddhavīriyattā sattasaṅkhārehi upanītaṃ
atk-s0512a:1911_1: dukkhaṃ abhibhuyya viharati”. Vīriyassa titikkhālaṅkārabhāvato “vīriyavato hi titikkhā
atk-s0512a:1911_2: sobhati”. Paggahanimittaṃ vatvā samathanimittavacanato accārambhena uddhaccadosappahānavacanato
atk-s0512a:1911_4: “khantibahulo hi anuddhato sātaccakārī hoti”. Appamādavato parahitakiriyārambhe paccupakārataṇhābhāvavacanato
atk-s0512a:1911_5: “yāthāvato dhammanijjhāne hi sati taṇhā na hoti”. Parahitārambhe paramepi parakatadukkhasahanatāvacanato
atk-s0512a:1911_6: ca vīriyassa anantaraṃ khanti vuttā. Saccena khantiyā cirādhiṭṭhānato apakārino apakārakhantiṃ
atk-s0512a:1911_7: vatvā tadupakārakaraṇe avisaṃvādavacanato khantiyā apavādavācāvikampanena bhūtavāditāya
atk-s0512a:1912_0: Adhiṭṭhānena saccasiddhito “acalādhiṭṭhānassa hi virati sijjhati”. Avisaṃvāditaṃ
atk-s0512a:1912_1: vatvā tattha acalabhāvavacanato “saccasandho hi dānādīsu paṭiññānurūpaṃ niccalova
atk-s0512a:1912_3: hi bodhisambhāre adhiṭṭhāti, te ca niṭṭhāpeti paṭipakkhehi akampiyabhāvato”ti saccassa
atk-s0512a:1912_4: anantaraṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Mettāya parahitakaraṇasamādānādhiṭṭhānasiddhito adhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1912_5: vatvā hitūpasaṃhāravacanato “bodhisambhāre hi adhitiṭṭhamāno mettāvihārī hoti”. Acalādhiṭṭhānassa
atk-s0512a:1912_6: samādānāvikopanena samādānasambhavato ca adhiṭṭhānassa anantaraṃ mettā vuttā. Upekkhāya
atk-s0512a:1912_7: mettāvisuddhito sattesu hitūpasaṃhāraṃ vatvā tadaparādhesu udāsīnatāvacanato mettābhāvanaṃ
atk-s0512a:1912_9: ca mettāya anantaraṃ upekkhā vuttāti evametāsaṃ kamo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:1913_0: Kāni lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānīti ettha avisesena tāva sabbāpi pāramiyo
atk-s0512a:1913_1: parānuggahalakkhaṇā, paresaṃ upakārakaraṇarasā, avikampanarasā vā, hitesitāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0512a:1914_0: Visesena pana yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā attūpakaraṇapariccāgacetanā dānapāramitā,
atk-s0512a:1915_0: Tasmā pariccāgalakkhaṇā dānapāramī, deyyadhamme lobhaviddhaṃsanarasā, anāsattipaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0512a:1915_2: sīlapāramī, samādhānalakkhaṇā patiṭṭhānalakkhaṇā cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasā,
atk-s0512a:1915_3: anavajjarasā vā, soceyyapaccupaṭṭhānā, hirottappapadaṭṭhānā. Kāmato ca bhavato ca
atk-s0512a:1915_4: nikkhamanalakkhaṇā nekkhammapāramī, tadādīnavavibhāvanarasā, tato eva vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0512a:1915_6: vā kusalissāsakhittausupaṭivedho viya, visayobhāsanarasā padīpo viya, asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā
atk-s0512a:1915_7: araññagatasudesiko viya, samādhipadaṭṭhānā, catusaccapadaṭṭhānā vā. Ussāhalakkhaṇā
atk-s0512a:1915_9: saṃvegapadaṭṭhānā vā. Khamanalakkhaṇā khantipāramī, iṭṭhāniṭṭhasahanarasā, adhivāsanapaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0512a:1915_12: adhiṭṭhānalakkhaṇā adhiṭṭhānapāramī, tesaṃ paṭipakkhābhibhavanarasā, tattha acalatāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
atk-s0512a:1916_0: Ettha ca karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitatā dānādīnaṃ pariccāgādilakkhaṇassa visesanabhāvena
atk-s0512a:1916_1: vattabbā. Karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitāni hi dānādīni bodhisattasantāne pavattāni
atk-s0512a:1917: Ko paccayoti? Abhinīhāro tāva pāramīnaṃ paccayo. Yo hi ayaṃ –
atk-s0512a:1921_0: Evaṃ vutto aṭṭhadhammasamodhānasampādito “tiṇṇo tāreyyaṃ mutto moceyyaṃ danto dameyyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1921_1: santo sameyyaṃ assattho assāseyyaṃ parinibbuto parinibbāpeyyaṃ suddho sodheyyaṃ buddho
atk-s0512a:1921_2: bodheyya”ntiādinayappavatto abhinīhāro. So avisesena sabbapāramīnaṃ paccayo. Tappavattiyā
atk-s0512a:1922_0: Tattha manussattanti manussattabhāvo. Manussattabhāveyeva hi ṭhatvā buddhattaṃ patthentassa
atk-s0512a:1922_1: patthanā samijjhati, na nāgasupaṇṇādijātīsu ṭhitassa. Kasmāti ce? Buddhabhāvassa
atk-s0512a:1923_0: Liṅgasampattīti manussattabhāve ṭhitassāpi purisasseva patthanā samijjhati, na itthiyā
atk-s0512a:1923_1: na paṇḍakanapuṃsakaubhatobyañjanakānaṃ vā samijjhati. Kasmāti ce? Yathāvuttakāraṇato
atk-s0512a:1923_2: lakkhaṇapāripūriyā abhāvato ca. Vuttañcetaṃ – “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso,
atk-s0512a:1923_3: yaṃ itthī arahaṃ assa sammāsambuddho”ti vitthāro. Tasmā manussajātikassāpi itthiliṅge
atk-s0512a:1923_4: ṭhitassa paṇḍakādīnaṃ vā patthanā na samijjhati.
atk-s0512a:1924: Hetūti upanissayasampatti. Manussapurisassāpi hi upanissayasampannasseva hetusampattiyā patthanā samijjhati, na itarassa.
atk-s0512a:1925_0: Satthāradassananti satthusammukhībhāvo. Dharamānakabuddhasseva hi santike patthentassa
atk-s0512a:1925_1: patthanā samijjhati, parinibbute pana bhagavati cetiyassa santike vā bodhimūle vā
atk-s0512a:1925_2: paṭimāya vā paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ vā santike patthanā na samijjhati. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a:1925_3: Adhikārassa balavabhāvābhāvato. Buddhānaṃ eva pana santike patthanā samijjhati, ajjhāsayassa
atk-s0512a:1926_0: Pabbajjāti buddhassa bhagavato santike patthentassāpi kammakiriyavādīsu tāpasesu
atk-s0512a:1926_1: vā bhikkhūsu vā pabbajitasseva patthanā samijjhati, no gihiliṅge ṭhitassa. Kasmā?
atk-s0512a:1926_2: Buddhabhāvassa ananucchavikabhāvato. Pabbajitā eva hi mahābodhisattā sammāsambodhiṃ
atk-s0512a:1926_3: adhigacchanti, na gahaṭṭhabhūtā, tasmā paṇidhānakāle ca pabbajjāliṅgaṃ eva hi yuttarūpaṃ
atk-s0512a:1927_0: Guṇasampattīti abhiññādiguṇasampadā. Pabbajitassāpi hi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino pañcābhiññasseva
atk-s0512a:1927_1: patthanā samijjhati, na yathāvuttaguṇasampattiyā virahitassa. Kasmā? Pāramipavicayassa
atk-s0512a:1927_2: asamatthabhāvato, upanissayasampattiyā abhiññāsampattiyā ca samannāgatattā mahāpurisā
atk-s0512a:1927_3: katābhinīhārā sayameva pāramī pavicetuṃ samatthā honti.
atk-s0512a:1928: Adhikāroti adhiko upakāro. Yathāvuttaguṇasampannopi hi yo attano jīvitampi buddhānaṃ pariccajitvā tasmiṃ kāle adhikaṃ upakāraṃ karoti, tasseva abhinīhāro samijjhati, na itarassa.
atk-s0512a:1929_0: Chandatāti kattukāmatākusalacchando. Yassa hi yathāvuttadhammasamannāgatassa buddhakārakadhammānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1929_1: atthāya mahanto chando mahatī patthanā mahatī kattukāmatā atthi, tasseva samijjhati, na itarassa.
atk-s0512a:1930_0: Tatridaṃ chandamahantatāya opammaṃ – yo sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ ekodakībhūtaṃ attano
atk-s0512a:1930_1: bāhubaleneva uttaritvā pāraṃ gantuṃ samattho, so buddhattaṃ pāpuṇātīti sutvā taṃ
atk-s0512a:1930_2: dukkarato adahanto “ahaṃ taṃ uttaritvā pāraṃ gamissāmī”ti chandajāto hoti, na tattha
atk-s0512a:1930_3: saṅkocaṃ āpajjati. Tathā yo sakalacakkavāḷaṃ vītaccikānaṃ vigatadhūmānaṃ aṅgārānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1930_4: pūraṃ pādehi akkamanto atikkamitvā parabhāgaṃ pāpuṇituṃ samattho…pe… na tattha saṅkocaṃ
atk-s0512a:1930_5: āpajjati. Tathā yo sakalacakkavāḷaṃ sattisūlehi sunisitaphalehi nirantaraṃ ākiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:1930_6: pādehi akkamanto atikkamitvā…pe… na tattha saṅkocaṃ āpajjati. Tathā yo sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
atk-s0512a:1930_8: gantuṃ samattho…pe… na tattha saṅkocaṃ āpajjati. Tathā yo “cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0512a:1930_9: satasahassañca kappe niraye paccitvā buddhattaṃ pattabba”nti sutvā taṃ dukkarato
atk-s0512a:1930_10: adahanto “ahaṃ tattha paccitvā buddhattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti chandajāto hoti, na tattha
atk-s0512a:1930_11: saṅkocaṃ āpajjatīti evamādinā nayena ettha chandassa mahantabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:1931_0: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato panāyaṃ abhinīhāro atthato tesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ samodhānena
atk-s0512a:1931_1: tathāpavatto cittuppādoti veditabbo. So sammadeva sammāsambodhiyā paṇidhānalakkhaṇo.
atk-s0512a:1931_2: “Aho vatāhaṃ anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjheyyaṃ, sabbasattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ
atk-s0512a:1931_4: upanissayasampattipadaṭṭhāno vā. Acinteyyaṃ buddhabhūmiṃ aparimāṇaṃ sattalokahitañca
atk-s0512a:1931_5: ārabbha pavattiyā sabbabuddhakārakadhammamūlabhūto paramabhaddako paramakalyāṇo aparimeyyappabhāvo
atk-s0512a:1932_0: Yassa ca uppattiyā saheva mahāpuriso mahābodhiyānapaṭipattiṃ otiṇṇo nāma hoti niyatabhāvasamadhigamanato
atk-s0512a:1932_1: tato anivattanasabhāvattā bodhisattoti samaññaṃ paṭilabhati, sabbabhāvena sammāsambodhiyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1932_3: hi mahāpurisā sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamanapubbaliṅgena sayambhuñāṇena sammadeva sabbapāramiyo
atk-s0512a:1932_4: pavicinitvā samādāya anukkamena paripūrenti. Tathā katamahābhinīhāro hi sumedhapaṇḍito
atk-s0512a:1934: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā;
atk-s0512a:1936: Vitthāro. Tassa ca abhinīhārassa cattāro paccayā cattāro hetū cattāri ca balāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0512a:1937_0: Tattha katame cattāro paccayā? Idha mahāpuriso passati tathāgataṃ mahatā buddhānubhāvena
atk-s0512a:1937_1: acchariyabbhutaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ karontaṃ. Tassa taṃ nissāya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā mahābodhiyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1937_2: cittaṃ santiṭṭhati – “mahānubhāvā vatāyaṃ dhammadhātu, yassā suppaṭividdhattā bhagavā
atk-s0512a:1937_3: evaṃ acchariyabbhutadhammo acinteyyānubhāvo cā”ti. So tameva mahānubhāvadassanaṃ
atk-s0512a:1937_4: nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti. Ayaṃ paṭhamo
atk-s0512a:1938_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ, api ca kho suṇāti “ediso
atk-s0512a:1938_1: ca ediso ca bhagavā”ti. So taṃ nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto
atk-s0512a:1938_2: tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti. Ayaṃ dutiyo paccayo mahābhinīhārāya.
atk-s0512a:1939_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ, napi taṃ parato suṇāti,
atk-s0512a:1939_1: api ca kho tathāgatassa dhammaṃ desentassa “dasabalasamannāgato, bhikkhave, tathāgato”tiādinā
atk-s0512a:1939_2: buddhānubhāvapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāti. So taṃ nissāya taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1939_3: adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti. Ayaṃ tatiyo paccayo mahābhinīhārāya.
atk-s0512a:1940_0: Na heva kho passati tathāgatassa yathāvuttaṃ mahānubhāvataṃ, napi taṃ parato suṇāti,
atk-s0512a:1940_1: napi tathāgatassa dhammaṃ suṇāti, api ca kho uḷārajjhāsayo kalyāṇādhimuttiko “ahametaṃ
atk-s0512a:1940_2: buddhavaṃsaṃ buddhatantiṃ buddhapaveṇiṃ buddhadhammataṃ paripālessāmī”ti yāvadeva
atk-s0512a:1940_3: dhammaṃ eva sakkaronto garukaronto mānento pūjento dhammaṃ apacāyamāno taṃ nissāya
atk-s0512a:1940_4: taṃ paccayaṃ katvā sambodhiyaṃ adhimuccanto tattha cittaṃ ṭhapeti. Ayaṃ catuttho
atk-s0512a:1941_0: Tattha katame cattāro hetū mahābhinīhārāya? Idha mahāpuriso pakatiyā upanissayasampannova
atk-s0512a:1941_1: hoti purimakesu buddhesu katādhikāro. Ayaṃ paṭhamo hetu mahābhinīhārāya. Puna caparaṃ
atk-s0512a:1941_2: mahāpuriso pakatiyā karuṇājjhāsayo hoti karuṇādhimutto sattānaṃ dukkhaṃ apanetukāmo
atk-s0512a:1941_3: api ca attano kāyajīvitaṃ pariccajitvā. Ayaṃ dutiyo hetu mahābhinīhārāya. Puna caparaṃ
atk-s0512a:1941_4: mahāpuriso sakalatopi vaṭṭadukkhato sattahitāya ca dukkaracariyato sucirampi kālaṃ
atk-s0512a:1941_5: ghaṭento vāyamanto anibbinno hoti anutrāsī yāva icchitatthanipphatti. Ayaṃ tatiyo
atk-s0512a:1941_6: hetu mahābhinīhārāya. Puna caparaṃ mahāpuriso kalyāṇamittasannissito hoti, yo ahitato
atk-s0512a:1941_7: nivāreti, hite patiṭṭhapeti. Ayaṃ catuttho hetu mahābhinīhārāya.
atk-s0512a:1942_0: Tatrāyaṃ mahāpurisassa upanissayasampadā – ekantenevassa yathā ajjhāsayo sambodhininno
atk-s0512a:1942_1: hoti sambodhipoṇo sambodhipabbhāro, tathā sattānaṃ hitacariyā. Yato cānena purimabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1942_2: santike sambodhiyā paṇidhānaṃ kataṃ hoti manasā vācāya ca “ahampi ediso sammāsambuddho
atk-s0512a:1942_3: hutvā sammadeva sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ nipphādeyya”nti. Evaṃ sampannūpanissayassa panassa
atk-s0512a:1942_4: imāni upanissayasampattiyā liṅgāni bhavanti yehi samannāgatassa sāvakabodhisattehi
atk-s0512a:1942_5: ca paccekabodhisattehi ca mahāviseso mahantaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati indriyato paṭipattito
atk-s0512a:1942_6: kosallato ca. Idha upanissayasampanno mahāpuriso yathā visadindriyo hoti visadañāṇo,
atk-s0512a:1942_7: na tathā itare. Parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, na attahitāya. Tathā hi so yathā bahujanahitāya
atk-s0512a:1942_8: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0512a:1942_9: na tathā itare. Tattha ca kosallaṃ āvahati ṭhānuppattikapaṭibhānena ṭhānāṭhānakusalatāya ca.
atk-s0512a:1943_0: Tathā mahāpuriso pakatiyā dānajjhāsayo hoti dānābhirato, sati deyyadhamme deti eva,
atk-s0512a:1943_1: na dānato saṅkocaṃ āpajjati, satataṃ samitaṃ saṃvibhāgasīlo hoti, pamuditova deti
atk-s0512a:1943_2: ādarajāto, na udāsīnacitto, mahantampi dānaṃ datvā na ca dānena santuṭṭho hoti, pageva
atk-s0512a:1943_3: appaṃ, paresañca ussāhaṃ janento dāne vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, dānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0512a:1943_4: karoti, aññe ca paresaṃ dente disvā attamano hoti, bhayaṭṭhānesu ca paresaṃ abhayaṃ
atk-s0512a:1943_5: detīti evamādīni dānajjhāsayassa mahāpurisassa dānapāramiyā liṅgāni.
atk-s0512a:1944_0: Tathā pāṇātipātādīhi pāpadhammehi hirīyati ottappati, sattānaṃ aviheṭhanajātiko hoti
atk-s0512a:1944_1: sorato sukhasīlo asaṭho amāyāvī ujujātiko suvaco sovacassakaraṇīyehi dhammehi samannāgato
atk-s0512a:1944_2: mudujātiko atthaddho anatimānī, parasantakaṃ nādiyati antamaso tiṇasalākaṃ upādāya,
atk-s0512a:1944_3: attano hatthe nikkhittaṃ iṇaṃ vā gahetvā paraṃ na visaṃvādeti, parasmiṃ vā attano
atk-s0512a:1944_4: santake byāmūḷhe vissarite vā taṃ saññāpetvā paṭipādeti yathā taṃ na parahatthagataṃ
atk-s0512a:1944_5: hoti, aloluppo hoti, parapariggahesu pāpakaṃ cittampi na uppādeti, itthibyasanādīni
atk-s0512a:1944_6: dūrato parivajjeti, saccavādī saccasandho bhinnānaṃ sandhātā sahitānaṃ anuppadātā,
atk-s0512a:1944_7: piyavādī mihitapubbaṅgamo pubbabhāsī atthavādī dhammavādī anabhijjhālu abyāpannacitto
atk-s0512a:1944_8: aviparītadassano, kammassakatañāṇena saccānulomikañāṇena kataññū katavedī vuddhāpacāyī
atk-s0512a:1944_9: suvisuddhājīvo dhammakāmo parepi dhamme samādapetā sabbena sabbaṃ akiccato satte
atk-s0512a:1944_10: nivāretā kiccesu patiṭṭhapetā attanā ca tattha kicce yogaṃ āpajjitā, katvā vā pana
atk-s0512a:1944_11: sayaṃ akattabbaṃ sīghaññeva tato paṭivirato hotīti evamādīni sīlajjhāsayassa mahāpurisassa
atk-s0512a:1945_0: Tathā mandakileso hoti mandanīvaraṇo, pavivekajjhāsayo avikkhepabahulo, na tassa
atk-s0512a:1945_1: pāpakā vitakkā cittaṃ anvāssavanti, vivekagatassa cassa appakasireneva cittaṃ samādhiyati,
atk-s0512a:1945_2: amittapakkhepi tuvaṭaṃ mettacittatā santiṭṭhati, pageva itarasmiṃ, satimā ca hoti
atk-s0512a:1945_3: cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā, medhāvī ca hoti dhammojapaññāya samannāgato,
atk-s0512a:1945_4: nipako ca hoti tāsu tāsu itikattabbatāsu, āraddhavīriyo ca hoti sattānaṃ hitakiriyāsu,
atk-s0512a:1945_5: khantibalasamannāgato ca hoti sabbasaho, acalādhiṭṭhāno ca hoti daḷhasamādāno, ajjhupekkhako
atk-s0512a:1945_6: ca hoti upekkhāṭhānīyesu dhammesūti evamādīni mahāpurisassa nekkhammajjhāsayādīnaṃ
atk-s0512a:1946_0: Evametehi bodhisambhāraliṅgehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa yaṃ vuttaṃ “mahābhinīhārāya
atk-s0512a:1946_1: kalyāṇamittasannissayo hetū”ti. Tatridaṃ saṅkhepato kalyāṇamittalakkhaṇaṃ – idha
atk-s0512a:1946_2: kalyāṇamitto saddhāsampanno hoti sīlasampanno sutasampanno cāgasampanno vīriyasampanno
atk-s0512a:1946_3: satisampanno samādhisampanno paññāsampanno. Tattha saddhāsampattiyā saddahati tathāgatassa
atk-s0512a:1946_4: bodhiṃ kammaphalañca, tena sammāsambodhiyā hetubhūtaṃ sattesu hitesitaṃ na pariccajati,
atk-s0512a:1946_5: sīlasampattiyā sattānaṃ piyo hoti manāpo garu bhāvanīyo codako pāpagarahī vattā vacanakkhamo,
atk-s0512a:1946_6: sutasampattiyā sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ gambhīraṃ dhammakathaṃ kattā hoti, cāgasampattiyā
atk-s0512a:1946_7: appiccho hoti santuṭṭho pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho, vīriyasampattiyā āraddhavīriyo hoti
atk-s0512a:1946_8: sattānaṃ hitapaṭipattiyaṃ, satisampattiyā upaṭṭhitasati hoti anavajjadhammesu, samādhisampattiyā
atk-s0512a:1946_9: avikkhitto hoti samāhitacitto, paññāsampattiyā aviparītaṃ pajānāti, so satiyā kusalākusalānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1946_10: dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamāno paññāya sattānaṃ hitāhitaṃ yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā samādhinā
atk-s0512a:1946_11: tattha ekaggacitto hutvā vīriyena ahitā satte nisedhetvā hite niyojeti. Tenāha –
atk-s0512a:1948: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. –
atk-s0512a:1949_0: Evaṃ guṇasamannāgatañca kalyāṇamittaṃ upanissāya mahāpuriso attano upanissayasampattiṃ
atk-s0512a:1949_1: sammadeva pariyodapeti. Suvisuddhāsayapayogo ca hutvā catūhi balehi samannāgato na
atk-s0512a:1949_2: cireneva aṭṭhaṅge samodhānetvā mahābhinīhāraṃ karonto bodhisattabhāve patiṭṭhahati
atk-s0512a:1950_0: Tassimāni cattāri balāni. Ajjhattikabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ attasannissayā dhammagāravena
atk-s0512a:1950_1: abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā, yāya mahāpuriso attādhipati lajjāpassayo abhinīhārasampanno
atk-s0512a:1950_2: ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti. Bāhirabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ
atk-s0512a:1950_3: parasannissayā abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā, yāya mahāpuriso lokādhipati mānāpassayo
atk-s0512a:1950_4: abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti. Upanissayabalaṃ
atk-s0512a:1950_5: yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ upanissayasampattiyā abhiruci ekantaninnajjhāsayatā, yāya mahāpuriso
atk-s0512a:1950_6: tikkhindriyo visadadhātuko satisannissayo abhinīhārasampanno ca hutvā pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0512a:1950_7: sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇāti. Payogabalaṃ yā sammāsambodhiyaṃ tajjā payogasampadā sakkaccakāritā
atk-s0512a:1950_8: sātaccakāritā, yāya mahāpuriso visuddhapayogo nirantarakārī abhinīhārasampanno ca
atk-s0512a:1951_0: Evamayaṃ catūhi paccayehi catūhi hetūhi catūhi ca balehi sampannasamudāgamo aṭṭhaṅgasamodhānasampādito
atk-s0512a:1951_1: abhinīhāro pāramīnaṃ paccayo mūlakāraṇabhāvato. Yassa ca pavattiyā mahāpurise cattāro
atk-s0512a:1951_2: acchariyā abbhutā dhammā patiṭṭhahanti, sabbasattanikāyaṃ attano orasaputtaṃ viya
atk-s0512a:1951_3: piyacittena pariggaṇhāti. Na cassa cittaṃ puttasaṃkilesavasena saṃkilissati. Sattānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1951_4: hitasukhāvaho cassa ajjhāsayo payogo ca hoti. Attano ca buddhakārakadhammā uparūpari
atk-s0512a:1951_5: vaḍḍhanti paripaccanti ca. Yato ca mahāpuriso uḷāratamena puññābhisandena kusalābhisandena
atk-s0512a:1951_6: pavattiyā paccayena sukhassāhārena samannāgato sattānaṃ dakkhiṇeyyo uttamagāravaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1951_7: asadisaṃ puññakkhettañca hoti. Evamanekaguṇo anekānisaṃso mahābhinīhāro pāramīnaṃ
atk-s0512a:1952_0: Yathā ca abhinīhāro, evaṃ mahākaruṇā upāyakosallañca. Tattha upāyakosallaṃ nāma dānādīnaṃ
atk-s0512a:1952_1: bodhisambhārabhāvassa nimittabhūtā paññā, yāhi mahākaruṇūpāyakosallatāhi mahāpurisānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1952_4: ca sampajjati. Tathā hissa paññāya buddhabhāvasiddhi, karuṇāya buddhakammasiddhi,
atk-s0512a:1952_5: paññāya sayaṃ tarati, karuṇāya pare tāreti, paññāya paradukkhaṃ parijānāti, karuṇāya
atk-s0512a:1952_6: paradukkhapatikāraṃ ārabhati, paññāya ca dukkhe nibbindati, karuṇāya dukkhaṃ sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0512a:1952_7: tathā paññāya nibbānābhimukho hoti, karuṇāya vaṭṭaṃ pāpuṇāti, tathā karuṇāya saṃsārābhimukho
atk-s0512a:1952_8: hoti, paññāya tatra nābhiramati, paññāya ca sabbattha virajjati, karuṇānugatattā
atk-s0512a:1952_9: na ca na sabbesaṃ anuggahāya pavatto, karuṇāya sabbepi anukampati, paññānugatattā
atk-s0512a:1952_10: na ca na sabbattha virattacitto, paññāya ca ahaṃkāramamaṃkārābhāvo, karuṇāya ālasiyadīnatābhāvo,
atk-s0512a:1952_11: tathā paññākaruṇāhi yathākkamaṃ attaparanāthatā dhīravīrabhāvo, anattantapaaparantapatā,
atk-s0512a:1952_14: visesena upāyabhāvato paññākaruṇā pāramīnaṃ paccayo. Idañca dvayaṃ pāramīnaṃ viya
atk-s0512a:1953_0: Tathā ussāhaummaṅgaavatthānahitacariyā ca pāramīnaṃ paccayāti veditabbā, yā buddhabhāvassa
atk-s0512a:1953_1: uppattiṭṭhānatāya buddhabhūmiyoti vuccanti. Tattha ussāho nāma bodhisambhārānaṃ abbhussahanavīriyaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1953_2: Ummaṅgo nāma bodhisambhāresu upāyakosallabhūtā paññā. Avatthānaṃ nāma adhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1953_3: acalādhiṭṭhānatā. Hitacariyā nāma mettābhāvanā karuṇābhāvanā ca.
atk-s0512a:1954_1: hi bodhisattā honti kāmesu gharāvāse ca dosadassāvino, tathā pavivekajjhāsayā saṅgaṇikāya
atk-s0512a:1954_2: dosadassāvino, alobhajjhāsayā lobhe dosadassāvino, adosajjhāsayā dose dosadassāvino,
atk-s0512a:1954_3: amohajjhāsayā mohe dosadassāvino, nissaraṇajjhāsayā sabbabhavesu dosadassāvinoti.
atk-s0512a:1954_4: Tasmā ete bodhisattānaṃ cha ajjhāsayā dānādīnaṃ pāramīnaṃ paccayāti veditabbā. Na
atk-s0512a:1954_5: hi lobhādīsu ādīnavadassanena alobhādīnaṃ adhikabhāvena ca vinā dānādipāramiyo sambhavanti,
atk-s0512a:1955_0: Yathā cete evaṃ dānajjhāsayatādayopi bodhiyā carantānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ dānādipāramīnaṃ
atk-s0512a:1955_1: paccayo. Dānajjhāsayatāya hi bodhisattā tappaṭipakkhe macchere dosadassāvino hutvā
atk-s0512a:1955_2: sammadeva dānapāramiṃ paripūrenti. Sīlajjhāsayatāya dussīlye dosadassāvino hutvā
atk-s0512a:1955_3: sammadeva sīlapāramiṃ paripūrenti. Nekkhammajjhāsayatāya kāmesu gharāvāse ca, yathābhūtañāṇajjhāsayatāya
atk-s0512a:1955_4: aññāṇe vicikicchāya ca, vīriyajjhāsayatāya kosajje, khantiyajjhāsayatāya akkhantiyaṃ,
atk-s0512a:1955_6: byāpāde, upekkhājjhāsayatāya lokadhammesu ādīnavadassāvino hutvā sammadeva nekkhammādipāramiyo
atk-s0512a:1956_6: Tesaṃ pariccāgoyeva eko sotthibhāvoti pariccāge appamādo karaṇīyo.
atk-s0512a:1957_0: Api ca yācako yācamāno attano guyhassa ācikkhanato “mayhaṃ vissāsiko”ti ca, “pahāya
atk-s0512a:1957_1: gamanīyamattano santakaṃ gahetvā paralokaṃ yāhīti mayhaṃ upadesako”ti ca, “āditte

atk-s0512a:1975_4: iṭṭhāniṭṭhavisayasamāyogo. Tattha aniṭṭhavisayasamāyogo mayhaṃ na siyāti taṃ kutettha
atk-s0512a:1975_5: labbhā”ti ca “kodhavasiko satto kodhena ummatto vikkhittacitto, tattha kiṃ paccapakārenā”ti
atk-s0512a:1975_6: ca “sabbepime sattā sammāsambuddhena orasaputtā viya paripālitā, tasmā na tattha
atk-s0512a:1975_7: mayā cittakopo kātabbo”ti ca, “aparādhake ca sati guṇe guṇavati mayā kopo na kātabbo”ti
atk-s0512a:1975_8: ca, “asati guṇe visesena karuṇāyitabbo”ti ca “kopena ca mayhaṃ guṇayasā nihīyantī”ti
atk-s0512a:1975_9: ca, “kujjhanena mayhaṃ dubbaṇṇadukkhaseyyādayo sapattakantā āgacchantī”ti ca, “kodho
atk-s0512a:1975_10: ca nāmāyaṃ sabbāhitakārako sabbahitavināsako balavā paccatthiko”ti ca, “sati ca khantiyā
atk-s0512a:1975_11: na koci paccatthiko”ti ca, “aparādhakena aparādhanimittaṃ yaṃ āyatiṃ laddhabbaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0512a:1975_12: sati ca khantiyā mayhaṃ tadabhāvo”ti ca, “cintanena kujjhantena ca mayā paccatthikoyeva
atk-s0512a:1975_13: anuvattito hotī”ti ca, “kodhe ca mayā khantiyā abhibhūte tassa dāsabhūto paccatthiko
atk-s0512a:1975_14: sammadeva abhibhūto hotī”ti ca, “kodhanimittaṃ khantiguṇapariccāgo mayhaṃ na yutto”ti
atk-s0512a:1975_15: ca, “sati ca kodhe guṇavirodhapaccanīkadhamme kathaṃ me sīlādidhammā pāripūriṃ gaccheyyuṃ,
atk-s0512a:1975_16: asati ca tesu kathāhaṃ sattānaṃ upakārabahulo paṭiññānurūpaṃ uttamaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti
atk-s0512a:1975_17: ca, “khantiyā ca sati bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato samāhitassa sabbe saṅkhārā aniccato
atk-s0512a:1975_18: dukkhato sabbe dhammā anattato nibbānañca asaṅkhatāmatasantapaṇītatādibhāvato nijjhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1976_0: Tato ca anulomiyaṃ khantiyaṃ ṭhito kevalā ime attattaniyabhāvarahitā dhammamattā
atk-s0512a:1976_1: yathāsakaṃ paccayehi uppajjanti vayanti, na kutoci āgacchanti, na kuhiñci gacchanti,
atk-s0512a:1976_2: na ca katthaci patiṭṭhitā, na cettha koci kassaci byāpāroti ahaṃkāramamaṃkārānadhiṭṭhānatā
atk-s0512a:1976_3: nijjhānaṃ khamati, yena bodhisatto bodhiyā niyato anāvattidhammo hotīti evamādinā
atk-s0512a:1977_0: Tathā saccena vinā sīlādīnaṃ asambhavato paṭiññānurūpaṃ paṭipattiyā abhāvato ca,
atk-s0512a:1977_1: saccadhammātikkame ca sabbapāpadhammānaṃ samosaraṇato asaccasandhassa apaccayikabhāvato
atk-s0512a:1978_0: Tathā dānādīsu daḷhasamādānaṃ taṃpaṭipakkhasannipāte ca nesaṃ acalādhiṭṭhānaṃ tattha
atk-s0512a:1978_1: ca dhīravīrabhāvaṃ vinā na dānādisambhārā sambodhinimittā sambhavantītiādinā adhiṭṭhāne
atk-s0512a:1979_0: Tathā “attahitamatte avatiṭṭhantenāpi sattesu hitacittataṃ vinā na sakkā idhalokaparalokasampattiyo
atk-s0512a:1979_1: pāpuṇituṃ, pageva sabbasatte nibbānasampattiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetukāmenā”ti ca, “pacchā
atk-s0512a:1979_2: sabbasattānaṃ lokuttarasampattiṃ ākaṅkhantena idāni lokiyasampattiākaṅkhā yuttarūpā”ti
atk-s0512a:1979_3: ca, “idāni āsayamattena paresaṃ hitasukhūpasaṃhāraṃ kātuṃ asakkonto kadā payogena
atk-s0512a:1979_4: taṃ sādhessāmī”ti ca, “idāni mayā hitasukhūpasaṃhārena saṃvaḍḍhitā pacchā dhammasaṃvibhāgasahāyā
atk-s0512a:1979_5: mayhaṃ bhavissantī”ti ca, “etehi vinā na mayhaṃ bodhisambhārā sambhavanti, tasmā
atk-s0512a:1979_6: sabbabuddhaguṇavibhūtinipphattikāraṇattā mayhaṃ ete paramaṃ puññakkhettaṃ anuttaraṃ
atk-s0512a:1979_7: kusalāyatanaṃ uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhāna”nti ca, savisesaṃ sattesu sabbesu hitajjhāsayatā
atk-s0512a:1979_8: paccupaṭṭhapetabbā, kiñca karuṇādhiṭṭhānatopi sabbasattesu mettā anubrūhetabbā. Vimariyādīkatena
atk-s0512a:1979_9: hi cetasā sattesu hitasukhūpasaṃhāraniratassa tesaṃ ahitadukkhāpanayanakāmatā balavatī
atk-s0512a:1979_10: uppajjati daḷhamūlā. Karuṇā ca sabbesaṃ buddhakārakadhammānaṃ ādi caraṇaṃ patiṭṭhā
atk-s0512a:1979_11: mūlaṃ mukhaṃ pamukhanti evamādinā mettāya guṇā paccavekkhitabbā.
atk-s0512a:1980_0: Tathā “upekkhāya abhāve sattehi katā vippakārā cittassa vikāraṃ uppādeyyuṃ, sati
atk-s0512a:1980_1: ca cittavikāre dānādīnaṃ sambhārānaṃ sambhavo eva natthī”ti ca, “mettāsinehena sinehite
atk-s0512a:1980_2: citte upekkhāya vinā sambhārānaṃ pārisuddhi na hotī”ti ca, “anupekkhako sambhāresu
atk-s0512a:1980_3: puññasambhāraṃ tabbipākañca sattahitatthaṃ pariṇāmetuṃ na sakkotī”ti ca, “upekkhāya
atk-s0512a:1980_4: abhāve deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā pariccajituṃ na sakkotī”ti ca, “upekkhārahitena
atk-s0512a:1980_5: jīvitaparikkhārānaṃ jīvitassa ca antarāyaṃ amanasikaritvā sīlavisodhanaṃ kātuṃ na
atk-s0512a:1980_6: sakkotī”ti ca, tathā upekkhāvasena aratiratisahasseva nekkhammabalasiddhito upapattito
atk-s0512a:1980_7: ikkhaṇavasena sabbasambhārakiccanipphattito accāraddhassa vīriyassa anupekkhaṇe padhānakiccākaraṇato
atk-s0512a:1980_8: upekkhato eva titikkhānijjhānasambhavato upekkhāvasena sattasaṅkhārānaṃ avisaṃvādanato
atk-s0512a:1980_11: upekkhānubhāvena sampajjantīti evamādinā nayena upekkhāpāramī paccavekkhitabbā. Evaṃ
atk-s0512a:1980_12: apariccāgapariccāgādīsu yathākkamaṃ ādīnavānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇā dānādipāramīnaṃ paccayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1981_0: Tathā saparikkhārā pañcadasa caraṇadhammā pañca ca abhiññāyo. Tattha caraṇadhammā
atk-s0512a:1981_1: nāma sīlasaṃvaro, indriyesu guttadvāratā, bhojane mattaññutā, jāgariyānuyogo, satta
atk-s0512a:1981_2: saddhammā, cattāri jhānāni ca. Tesu sīlādīnaṃ catunnaṃ terasāpi dhutadhammā appicchatādayo
atk-s0512a:1981_11: Catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ sīlādicatukkaṃ aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu pubbabhāgabhāvanā āvajjanādivasībhāvakaraṇañca
atk-s0512a:1981_12: parikkhāro. Tattha sīlādīhi payogasuddhiyā sattānaṃ abhayadāne āsayasuddhiyā āmisadāne
atk-s0512a:1981_13: ubhayasuddhiyā dhammadāne samattho hotītiādinā caraṇādīnaṃ dānādisambhārānaṃ paccayabhāvo
atk-s0512a:1981_14: yathārahaṃ niddhāretabbo. Ativitthārabhayena na niddhārayimhāti. Evaṃ sampatticakkādayopi
atk-s0512a:1982_0: Ko saṃkilesoti? Avisesena taṇhādīhi parāmaṭṭhabhāvo pāramīnaṃ saṃkileso, visesena
atk-s0512a:1982_1: pana deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakavikappā dānapāramiyā saṃkileso. Sattakālavikappā sīlapāramiyā,
atk-s0512a:1982_2: kāmabhavatadupasamesu abhiratianabhirativikappā nekkhammapāramiyā, ahaṃ mamāti vikappā
atk-s0512a:1983_0: Kiṃ vodānanti? Taṇhādīhi anupaghāto yathāvuttavikappaviraho ca etāsaṃ vodānanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1983_2: kilesehi deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakavikappādirahitā ca dānādipāramiyo parisuddhā pabhassarā bhavantīti.
atk-s0512a:1984_0: Ko paṭipakkhoti? Avisesena sabbepi saṃkilesā sabbepi akusalā dhammā etāsaṃ paṭipakkho,
atk-s0512a:1984_1: visesena pana pubbe vuttā maccherādayoti veditabbā. Api ca deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakadānaphalesu
atk-s0512a:1984_4: nekkhammaṃ, lobhādīnaṃ andhīkaraṇato ñāṇassa ca anandhīkaraṇato lobhādipaṭipakkhā
atk-s0512a:1984_6: khamanato lobhādipaṭipakkhā khanti, satipi paresaṃ upakāre apakāre ca yathābhūtappavattiyā
atk-s0512a:1984_7: lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ saccaṃ, lokadhamme abhibhuyya yathāsamādinnesu sambhāresu acalanato
atk-s0512a:1984_8: lobhādipaṭipakkhaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, nīvaraṇavivekato lobhādipaṭipakkhā mettā, iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu
atk-s0512a:1984_9: anunayapaṭighaviddhaṃsanato samappavattito ca lobhādipaṭipakkhā upekkhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1985_0: Kā paṭipattīti? Dānapāramiyā tāva sukhūpakaraṇasarīrajīvitapariccāgena bhayāpanudanena
atk-s0512a:1985_1: dhammopadesena ca bahudhā sattānaṃ anuggahakaraṇaṃ paṭipatti. Tattha āmisadānaṃ abhayadānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1985_2: dhammadānanti dātabbavatthuvasena tividhaṃ dānaṃ. Tesu bodhisattassa dātabbavatthu
atk-s0512a:1985_3: ajjhattikaṃ bāhiranti duvidhaṃ. Tattha bāhiraṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ
atk-s0512a:1985_5: Tathā rūpārammaṇaṃ yāva dhammārammaṇanti ārammaṇato chabbidhaṃ. Rūpārammaṇādīnañca
atk-s0512a:1986_0: Tattha mahāpuriso bāhiraṃ vatthuṃ dento “yo yena atthiko, taṃ tassa deti, dento ca
atk-s0512a:1986_1: tassa atthiko”ti sayameva jānanto ayācitopi deti pageva yācito. Muttacāgo deti, no
atk-s0512a:1986_2: amuttacāgo, pariyattaṃ deti, no apariyattaṃ sati deyyadhamme. Na paccupakārasannissito
atk-s0512a:1986_3: deti. Asati deyyadhamme hi pariyatte saṃvibhāgārahaṃ saṃvibhajati. Na ca deti parūpaghātāvahaṃ
atk-s0512a:1986_4: satthavisamajjādikaṃ, nāpi kīḷanakaṃ yaṃ anatthūpasaṃhitaṃ pamādāvahañca. Na ca gilānassa
atk-s0512a:1986_5: yācakassa pānabhojanādiasappāyaṃ pamāṇarahitaṃ vā deti, pamāṇayuttaṃ pana sappāyameva deti.
atk-s0512a:1987_0: Tathā yācito gahaṭṭhānaṃ gahaṭṭhānucchavikaṃ deti, pabbajitānaṃ pabbajitānucchavikaṃ
atk-s0512a:1987_1: deti, mātāpitaro ñātisālohitā mittāmaccā puttadāradāsakammakarāti etesu kassaci pīḷaṃ
atk-s0512a:1987_2: ajanento deti, na ca uḷāraṃ deyyadhammaṃ paṭijānitvā lūkhaṃ deti, na ca lābhasakkārasilokasannissito
atk-s0512a:1987_3: deti, na ca paccupakārasannissito deti, na ca phalapāṭikaṅkhī deti aññatra sammāsambodhiyā,
atk-s0512a:1987_4: na ca yācake deyyadhammaṃ vā jigucchanto deti, na ca asaññatānaṃ yācakānaṃ akkosakarosakānampi
atk-s0512a:1987_5: apaviddhaṃ dānaṃ deti, aññadatthu pasannacitto anukampanto sakkaccameva deti, na
atk-s0512a:1987_6: ca kotūhalamaṅgaliko hutvā deti, kammaphalameva pana saddahanto deti, napi yācake
atk-s0512a:1987_7: payirupāsanādīhi parikilesetvā deti, aparikilesanto eva pana deti, na ca paresaṃ
atk-s0512a:1987_8: vañcanādhippāyo bhedanādhippāyo vā dānaṃ deti, asaṃkiliṭṭhacitto eva deti, napi pharusavāco
atk-s0512a:1987_9: bhākuṭimukho dānaṃ deti, piyavādī pana pubbabhāsī mitavacano hutvā deti, yasmiñca
atk-s0512a:1987_10: deyyadhamme uḷāramanuññatāya vā ciraparicayena vā gedhasabhāvatāya vā lobhadhammo
atk-s0512a:1987_11: adhimatto hoti, jānanto bodhisatto taṃ khippameva paṭivinodetvā yācake pariyesitvāpi
atk-s0512a:1987_12: deti, yañca deyyavatthu parittaṃ yācakopi paccupaṭṭhito, taṃ acintetvāpi attānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1987_13: bādhetvā dento yācakaṃ sammāneti yathā taṃ akittipaṇḍito. Na ca mahāpuriso attano
atk-s0512a:1987_14: puttadāradāsakammakaraporise yācito te asaññāpite domanassappatte yācakānaṃ deti,
atk-s0512a:1987_15: sammadeva pana saññāpite somanassappatte deti. Dento ca yakkharakkhasapisācādīnaṃ
atk-s0512a:1987_16: vā manussānaṃ kurūrakammantānaṃ vā jānanto na deti, tathā rajjampi tādisānaṃ na deti.
atk-s0512a:1987_17: Ye lokassa ahitāya dukkhāya anatthāya paṭipajjanti, ye pana dhammikā dhammena lokaṃ
atk-s0512a:1987_18: pālenti, tesaṃ deti. Evaṃ tāva bāhiradāne paṭipatti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a:1988_0: Ajjhattikadānaṃ pana dvīhi ākārehi veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Yathā nāma koci puriso ghāsacchādanahetu
atk-s0512a:1988_1: attānaṃ parassa nissajjati, vidheyyabhāvaṃ upagacchati dāsabyaṃ, evameva mahāpuriso
atk-s0512a:1988_2: sambodhihetu nirāmisacitto sattānaṃ anuttaraṃ hitasukhaṃ icchanto attano dānapāramiṃ
atk-s0512a:1988_3: paripūretukāmo attānaṃ parassa nissajjati, vidheyyabhāvaṃ upagacchati yathākāmakaraṇīyataṃ.
atk-s0512a:1988_4: Karacaraṇanayanādiaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ tena tena atthikānaṃ akampito anolīno anuppadeti,
atk-s0512a:1988_5: na tattha sajjati na saṅkocaṃ āpajjati yathā taṃ bāhiravatthusmiṃ, tathā hi mahāpuriso
atk-s0512a:1988_6: dvīhi ākārehi bāhiravatthuṃ pariccajati yathāsukhaṃ paribhogāya vā yācakānaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0512a:1988_7: manorathaṃ paripūrento, attano vasībhāvāya vā, tattha sabbena sabbaṃ muttacāgo, evamahaṃ
atk-s0512a:1988_8: nissaṅgabhāvanāya sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissāmīti. Evaṃ ajjhattikavatthusminti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1989_0: Tattha yaṃ ajjhattikavatthu dīyamānaṃ yācakassa ekanteneva hitāya saṃvattati, taṃ
atk-s0512a:1989_1: deti, na itaraṃ. Na ca mahāpuriso mārassa mārakāyikānaṃ devatānaṃ vā vihiṃsādhippāyānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1989_2: attano attabhāvaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgāni vā jānamāno deti “mā tesaṃ anattho ahosī”ti. Yathā
atk-s0512a:1989_3: ca mārakāyikānaṃ, evaṃ tehi anvāviṭṭhānampi na deti, napi ummattakānaṃ. Itaresaṃ
atk-s0512a:1989_4: pana yāciyamāno samanantarameva deti, tādisāya yācanāya dullabhabhāvato tādisassa
atk-s0512a:1990: Abhayadānaṃ pana rājato corato aggito udakato veripuggalato sīhabyagghādivāḷamigato nāgayakkharakkhasapisācādito sattānaṃ bhaye paccupaṭṭhite tato parittāṇabhāvena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:1991_0: Dhammadānaṃ pana asaṃkiliṭṭhacittassa aviparītā dhammadesanā, opāyiko hitassa upadeso
atk-s0512a:1991_1: diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthavasena yena sāsane anotiṇṇānaṃ avatāraṇaṃ otiṇṇānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1991_2: paripācanaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ nayo – saṅkhepato tāva dānakathā sīlakathā saggakathā kāmānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1991_3: ādīnavo saṃkileso ca nekkhamme ānisaṃso. Vitthārato pana sāvakabodhiyaṃ adhimuttacittānaṃ
atk-s0512a:1991_4: saraṇagamanaṃ sīlasaṃvaro indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo
atk-s0512a:1991_5: satta saddhammā aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu kammakaraṇavasena samathānuyogo rūpakāyādīsu
atk-s0512a:1991_6: vipassanābhinivesesu yathārahaṃ abhinivesamukhena vipassanānuyogo, tathā visuddhipaṭipadā
atk-s0512a:1991_7: sammattagahaṇaṃ tisso vijjā cha abhiññā catasso paṭisambhidā sāvakabodhīti etesaṃ
atk-s0512a:1991_8: guṇasaṃkittanavasena yathārahaṃ tattha tattha patiṭṭhāpanā pariyodapanā ca. Tathā
atk-s0512a:1991_9: paccekabodhiyaṃ sammāsambodhiyañca adhimuttānaṃ sattānaṃ yathārahaṃ dānādipāramīnaṃ
atk-s0512a:1991_10: sabhāvarasalakkhaṇādisaṃkittanamukhena tīsupi avatthāsu tesaṃ buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvatāvibhāvanena
atk-s0512a:1991_11: yānadvaye patiṭṭhāpanā pariyodapanā ca. Evaṃ mahāpuriso sattānaṃ dhammadānaṃ deti.
atk-s0512a:1992_0: Tathā mahāpuriso sattānaṃ āmisadānaṃ dento “imināhaṃ dānena sattānaṃ āyuvaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādisampattiñca
atk-s0512a:1992_1: ramaṇīyaṃ aggaphalasampattiñca nipphādeyya”nti annadānaṃ deti, tathā sattānaṃ kāmakilesapipāsāvūpasamāya
atk-s0512a:1992_2: pānaṃ deti, tathā suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya hirottappālaṅkārassa ca nipphattiyā vatthāni deti,
atk-s0512a:1992_3: tathā iddhividhassa ceva nibbānasukhassa ca nipphattiyā yānaṃ deti, tathā sīlagandhanipphattiyā
atk-s0512a:1992_4: gandhaṃ deti, tathā buddhaguṇasobhānipphattiyā mālāvilepanaṃ deti, bodhimaṇḍāsananipphattiyā
atk-s0512a:1992_5: āsanaṃ deti, tathāgataseyyānipphattiyā seyyaṃ deti, saraṇabhāvanipphattiyā āvasathaṃ
atk-s0512a:1992_6: deti, pañcacakkhupaṭilābhāya padīpeyyaṃ deti, byāmappabhānipphattiyā rūpadānaṃ deti,
atk-s0512a:1992_7: brahmassaranipphattiyā saddadānaṃ deti, sabbalokassa piyabhāvāya rasadānaṃ deti,
atk-s0512a:1992_8: buddhasukhumālabhāvāya phoṭṭhabbadānaṃ deti, ajarāmarabhāvāya bhesajjadānaṃ deti,
