atk-s0512a:2018_1: appiye vā pasaṃsati. Na avissaṭṭhavissāsī hoti. Na dhammikaṃ upanimantanaṃ paṭikkhipati.
atk-s0512a:2018_2: Na saññattiṃ upagacchati, nādhikaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti. Saddhāsampanne saddhānisaṃsakathāya
atk-s0512a:2018_3: sampahaṃsati. Sīlasutacāgapaññāsampanne paññāsampannakathāya sampahaṃsati. Sace pana
atk-s0512a:2018_4: bodhisatto abhiññābalappatto hoti, pamādāpanne satte abhiññābalena yathārahaṃ nirayādike
atk-s0512a:2018_5: dassento saṃvejetvā assaddhādike saddhādīsu patiṭṭhāpeti. Sāsane otāreti. Saddhādiguṇasampanne
atk-s0512a:2018_6: paripāceti. Evamayaṃ mahāpurisassa cārittabhūto aparimāṇo puññābhisando kusalābhisando
atk-s0512a:2019_0: Api ca yā sā “kiṃ sīlaṃ kenaṭṭhena sīla”ntiādinā pucchaṃ katvā “pāṇātipātādīhi viramantassa
atk-s0512a:2019_1: vattapaṭipattiṃ vā pūrentassa cetanādayo dhammā sīla”ntiādinā nayena nānappakārato
atk-s0512a:2019_2: sīlassa vitthārakathā visuddhimagge vuttā, sā sabbāpi idha āharitvā vattabbā. Kevalañhi
atk-s0512a:2019_3: tattha sāvakabodhisattavasena sīlakathā āgatā, idha mahābodhisattavasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ
atk-s0512a:2019_4: katvā vattabbāti ayameva viseso. Yato idaṃ sīlaṃ mahāpuriso yathā na attano duggatiyaṃ
atk-s0512a:2019_5: parikkilesavimuttiyā sugatiyampi, na rajjasampattiyā, na cakkavatti, na deva, na
atk-s0512a:2019_6: sakka, na māra, na brahmasampattiyā pariṇāmeti, tathā na attano tevijjatāya, na chaḷabhiññatāya,
atk-s0512a:2019_7: na catuppaṭisambhidādhigamāya, na sāvakabodhiyā, na paccekabodhiyā, pariṇāmeti, atha
atk-s0512a:2020_0: Tathā yasmā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamā kāmehi ca bhavehi
atk-s0512a:2020_1: ca nikkhamanavasena pavattā kusalacittuppatti nekkhammapāramī, tasmā sakalasaṃkilesanivāsanaṭṭhānatāya
atk-s0512a:2020_3: ca gharāvāsassa nekkhammasukhādīnaṃ anokāsataṃ, kāmānañca satthadhārālaggamadhubindu
atk-s0512a:2020_4: viya ca avaliyhamānā parittassādā vipulānatthānubandhāti ca, vijjulatobhāsena gahetabbanaccaṃ
atk-s0512a:2020_5: viya parittakālūpalabbhā, ummattakālaṅkāro viya viparītasaññāya anubhavitabbā, karīsāvacchādanā
atk-s0512a:2020_6: viya patikārabhūtā, udakatemitaṅguliyā tanūdakapānaṃ viya atittikarā, chātajjhattabhojanaṃ
atk-s0512a:2020_7: viya sābādhā, baḷisāmisaṃ viya byasanasannipātakāraṇaṃ, aggisantāpo viya kālattayepi
atk-s0512a:2020_8: dukkhuppattihetubhūtā, makkaṭalepo viya bandhanimittaṃ, ghātakāvacchādanā viya anatthacchādanā,
atk-s0512a:2020_9: sapattagāmavāso viya bhayaṭṭhānabhūtā, paccatthikaposako viya kilesamārādīnaṃ āmisabhūtā,
atk-s0512a:2020_10: chaṇasampattiyo viya vipariṇāmadukkhā, koṭaraggi viya antodāhakā, purāṇakūpāvalambībīraṇamadhupiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0512a:2020_11: viya anekādīnavā, loṇūdakapānaṃ viya pipāsāhetubhūtā, surāmerayaṃ viya nīcajanasevitā,
atk-s0512a:2020_12: appassādatāya aṭṭhikaṅkalūpamātiādinā ca nayena ādīnavaṃ sallakkhetvā tabbipariyāyena
atk-s0512a:2020_14: nekkhammapāramiyaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Yasmā pana nekkhammaṃ pabbajjāmūlakaṃ, tasmā
atk-s0512a:2020_15: pabbajjā tāva anuṭṭhātabbā. Pabbajjamanutiṭṭhantena ca mahāsattena asati buddhuppāde
atk-s0512a:2021_0: Uppannesu pana sammāsambuddhesu tesaṃ sāsane eva pabbajitabbaṃ. Pabbajitvā ca yathāvutte
atk-s0512a:2021_1: sīle patiṭṭhitena tassā eva hi sīlapāramiyā vodāpanatthaṃ dhutaguṇā samādātabbā.
atk-s0512a:2021_2: Samādinnadhutadhammā hi mahāpurisā sammadeva te pariharantā appicchāsantuṭṭhāsallekhapavivekaasaṃsaggavīriyārambhasubharatādi-
atk-s0512a:2021_4: ariyavaṃsattaye patiṭṭhitā catutthaṃ bhāvanārāmatāsaṅkhātaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ adhigantuṃ
atk-s0512a:2021_5: cattārīsāya ārammaṇesu yathārahaṃ upacārappanābhedaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharanti.
atk-s0512a:2021_6: Evaṃ hissa sammadeva nekkhammapāramī paripūritā hoti.
atk-s0512a:2022_0: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne terasahi dhutadhammehi saddhiṃ dasa kasiṇāni, dasa asubhāni, dasānussatiyo,
atk-s0512a:2022_1: cattāro brahmavihārā, cattāro āruppā, ekā saññā, ekaṃ vavatthānanti cattārīsāya samādhibhāvanāya
atk-s0512a:2022_2: kammaṭṭhānāni bhāvanāvidhānañca vitthārato vattabbāni. Taṃ panetaṃ sabbaṃ yasmā visuddhimagge
atk-s0512a:2022_3: sabbākārato vitthāretvā vuttaṃ, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Kevalañhi
atk-s0512a:2022_4: tattha sāvakabodhisattassa vasena vuttaṃ, idha mahābodhisattassa vasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ
atk-s0512a:2022_5: katvā vattabbanti ayameva visesoti. Evamettha nekkhammapāramiyā paṭipattikkamo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:2023_0: Tathā paññāpāramiṃ sampādetukāmena yasmā paññā āloko viya andhakārena mohena saha
atk-s0512a:2023_1: na vattati, tasmā mohakāraṇāni tāva bodhisattena parivajjetabbāni. Tatthimāni mohakāraṇāni
atk-s0512a:2023_2: – arati tandi vijambhitā ālasiyaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikārāmatā niddāsīlatā anicchayasīlatā
atk-s0512a:2023_3: ñāṇasmiṃ akutūhalatā micchādhimāno aparipucchakatā kāyassa na sammāparihāro asamāhitacittatā
atk-s0512a:2023_4: duppaññānaṃ puggalānaṃ sevanā paññavantānaṃ apayirupāsanā attaparibhavo micchāvikappo
atk-s0512a:2023_5: viparītābhiniveso kāyadaḷhibahulatā asaṃvegasīlatā pañca nīvaraṇāni. Saṅkhepato ye
atk-s0512a:2023_6: vā pana dhamme āsevato anuppannā paññā nuppajjati, uppannā parihāyati. Iti imāni
atk-s0512a:2023_7: sammohakāraṇāni parivajjentena bāhusacce jhānādīsu ca yogo karaṇīyo.
atk-s0512a:2024_0: Tatthāyaṃ bāhusaccassa visayavibhāgo – pañcakkhandhā dvādasāyatanāni aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo
atk-s0512a:2024_1: cattāri saccāni bāvīsatindriyāni dvādasapadiko paṭiccasamuppādo tathā satipaṭṭhānādayo
atk-s0512a:2024_2: kusalādidhammappakārabhedā ca, yāni ca loke anavajjāni vijjāṭṭhānāni, ye ca sattānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2024_3: hitasukhavidhānayoggā byākaraṇavisesā, iti evaṃ pakāraṃ sakalameva sutavisayaṃ upāyakosallapubbaṅgamāya
atk-s0512a:2024_4: paññāya satiyā vīriyena ca sādhukaṃ uggahaṇasavanadhāraṇaparicayaparipucchāhi ogāhetvā
atk-s0512a:2024_5: tattha ca paresaṃ patiṭṭhāpanena sutamayā paññā nibbattetabbā.
atk-s0512a:2025_1: ca paññā hitesitaṃ nissāya tattha tattha yathārahaṃ pavattetabbā. Tathā khandhādīnaṃ
atk-s0512a:2025_2: sabhāvadhammānaṃ ākāraparivitakkanamukhena te nijjhānaṃ khamāpentena cintāmayā paññā
atk-s0512a:2025_4: nibbattentena pubbabhāgabhāvanāpaññā sampādetabbā. Evañhi nāmarūpamattamidaṃ yathārahaṃ
atk-s0512a:2025_5: paccayehi uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca, na ettha koci kattā vā kāretā vā, hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena
atk-s0512a:2025_6: aniccaṃ, udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhaṃ, avasavattanaṭṭhena anattāti ajjhattikadhamme
atk-s0512a:2025_7: bāhirakadhamme ca nibbisesaṃ parijānanto tattha āsaṅgaṃ pajahanto pare ca tattha
atk-s0512a:2025_8: taṃ jahāpento kevalaṃ karuṇāvaseneva yāva na buddhaguṇā hatthatalaṃ āgacchanti, tāva
atk-s0512a:2025_10: abhiññāyo ca lokiyā vasībhāvaṃ pāpento paññāya matthakaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0512a:2026_0: Tattha yā imā iddhividhañāṇaṃ dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:2026_3: dhammesu uggahaparipucchāvasena ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā sīlavisuddhicittavisuddhīti mūlabhūtāsu
atk-s0512a:2026_6: sampādentena bhāvetabbā lokiyalokuttarabhedā bhāvanāpaññā, tāsaṃ sampādanavidhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2026_7: yasmā “tattha ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādikaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ kātukāmena ādikammikena
atk-s0512a:2026_9: viññāṇakkhandho”tiādinā ca visayavibhāgena saddhiṃ visuddhimagge sabbākārato vitthāretvā
atk-s0512a:2026_10: vuttaṃ, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Kevalañhi tattha sāvakabodhisattassa
atk-s0512a:2026_11: vasena paññā āgatā, idha mahābodhisattassa vasena karuṇūpāyakosallapubbaṅgamaṃ katvā
atk-s0512a:2026_13: ṭhapetabbāti ayameva viseso. Evamettha paññāpāramiyā paṭipattikkamo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:2027_0: Tathā yasmā sammāsambodhiyā katābhinīhārena mahāsattena pāramiparipūraṇatthaṃ sabbakālaṃ
atk-s0512a:2027_1: yuttappayuttena bhavitabbaṃ ābaddhaparikaraṇena, tasmā kālena kālaṃ “ko nu kho ajja
atk-s0512a:2027_2: mayā puññasambhāro ñāṇasambhāro vā upacito, kiṃ vā mayā parahitaṃ kata”nti divase
atk-s0512a:2027_3: divase paccavekkhantena sattahitatthaṃ ussāho karaṇīyo. Sabbesampi sattānaṃ upakārāya
atk-s0512a:2027_4: attano pariggahabhūtaṃ vatthu kāye jīvite ca nirapekkhacittena ossajitabbaṃ. Yaṃ
atk-s0512a:2027_5: kiñci kammaṃ karoti kāyena vācāya vā, taṃ sabbaṃ sambodhiyaṃ ninnacitteneva kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0512a:2027_6: bodhiyā pariṇāmetabbaṃ. Uḷārehi ittarehi ca kāmehi vinivattacitteneva bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2028_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattahite āraddhavīriyena bhavitabbaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhādisabbasahena avisaṃvādinā.
atk-s0512a:2028_1: Sabbepi sattā anodhiso mettāya karuṇāya ca pharitabbā. Yā kāci sattānaṃ dukkhuppatti,
atk-s0512a:2028_2: sabbā sā attani pāṭikaṅkhitabbā. Sabbesañca sattānaṃ puññaṃ abbhanumoditabbaṃ. Buddhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2028_3: mahantatā mahānubhāvatā abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabbā. Yañca kiñci kammaṃ karoti kāyena
atk-s0512a:2028_4: vācāya vā, taṃ sabbaṃ bodhininnacittapubbaṅgamaṃ kātabbaṃ. Iminā hi upāyena dānādīsu
atk-s0512a:2028_5: yuttappayuttassa thāmavato daḷhaparakkamassa mahāsattassa bodhisattassa aparimeyyo
atk-s0512a:2028_6: puññasambhāro ñāṇasambhāro ca divase divase upacīyati.
atk-s0512a:2029_0: Api ca sattānaṃ paribhogatthaṃ paripālanatthañca attano sarīraṃ jīvitañca pariccajitvā
atk-s0512a:2029_1: khuppipāsāsītuṇhavātātapādidukkhapatikāro pariyesitabbo upanetabbo ca. Yañca yathāvuttadukkhapatikārajaṃ
atk-s0512a:2029_2: sukhaṃ attanā paṭilabhati, tathā ramaṇīyesu ārāmuyyānapāsādataḷākādīsu araññāyatanesu
atk-s0512a:2029_3: ca kāyacittasantāpābhāvena abhinibbutattā attanā sukhaṃ paṭilabhati, yañca suṇāti
atk-s0512a:2029_4: buddhānubuddhapaccekabuddhā mahābodhisattā ca nekkhammapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārabhūtaṃ
atk-s0512a:2029_5: īdisaṃ nāma jhānasamāpattisukhaṃ anubhavantīti, taṃ sabbaṃ sabbasattesu anodhiso
atk-s0512a:2029_6: upasaṃharatīti. Ayaṃ tāva nayo asamāhitabhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhitassa.
atk-s0512a:2030_0: Samāhitabhūmiyaṃ pana patiṭṭhito attanā yathānubhūtaṃ visesādhigamanibbattaṃ pītiṃ
atk-s0512a:2030_1: passaddhiṃ sukhaṃ samādhiṃ yathābhūtañāṇañca sattesu adhimuccanto upasaṃharati pariṇāmeti.
atk-s0512a:2030_2: Tathā mahati saṃsāradukkhe tassa ca nimittabhūte kilesābhisaṅkhāradukkhe nimuggaṃ
atk-s0512a:2030_4: tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā nirantaraṃ cirakālaṃ vediyante nārake, aññamaññaṃ kujjhanasantāpanaviheṭhanahiṃsanaparādhīnatādīhi
atk-s0512a:2030_6: ḍayhamāne ca visussamāne ca vantakheḷādiāhāre uddhabāhuṃ viravante nijjhāmataṇhikādike
atk-s0512a:2030_7: mahādukkhaṃ vediyamāne pete ca, pariyeṭṭhimūlakaṃ mahantaṃ anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇante
atk-s0512a:2030_9: balavantehi abhibhavanīyato paresaṃ vahanato parādhīnato ca, nārake pete tiracchānagate
atk-s0512a:2030_10: ca, atisayante apāyadukkhanibbisesaṃ dukkhamanubhavante manusse ca, tathā visayavisaparibhogavikkhittacittatāya
atk-s0512a:2030_12: viya anupasantapariḷāhavuttike anupasantanihataparādhīne kāmāvacaradeve ca, mahatā
atk-s0512a:2030_13: vāyāmena vidūramākāsaṃ vigāhitasakuntā viya balavatā dūre pāṇinā khittasarā viya
atk-s0512a:2030_14: ca, satipi cirappavattiyaṃ aniccantikatāya pātapariyosānā anatikkantajātijarāmaraṇā
atk-s0512a:2030_15: evāti rūpārūpāvacaradeve ca passantena mahantaṃ saṃvegaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā mettāya
atk-s0512a:2030_16: karuṇāya ca anodhiso sattā pharitabbā. Evaṃ kāyena vācāya manasā ca bodhisambhāre
atk-s0512a:2030_17: nirantaraṃ upacinantena yathā pāramiyo pāripūriṃ gacchanti, evaṃ sakkaccakārinā sātaccakārinā
atk-s0512a:2031_1: buddhabhāvassa ussakkitvā sampahaṃsanayoggaṃ vīriyaṃ nāma acinteyyānubhāvameva, yaṃ
atk-s0512a:2031_2: na pacurajanā sotumpi sakkuṇanti, pageva paṭipajjituṃ. Tathā hi tividhā abhinīhāracittuppatti,
atk-s0512a:2031_3: catasso buddhabhūmiyo, cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, karuṇekarasatā, buddhadhammesu sacchikaraṇena
atk-s0512a:2031_4: visesappaccayo nijjhānakhanti, sabbadhammesu nirupalepo, sabbasattesu piyaputtasaññā,
atk-s0512a:2031_5: saṃsāradukkhehi aparikhedo, sabbadeyyadhammapariccāgo, tena ca niratimānatā, adhisīlādiadhiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0512a:2031_6: tattha ca acañcalatā, kusalakiriyāsu pītipāmojjaṃ, vivekaninnacittatā, jhānānuyogo,
atk-s0512a:2031_7: anavajjadhammena atitti, yathāsutassa dhammassa paresaṃ hitajjhāsayena desanā, sattānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2031_8: ñāye nivesanā, ārambhadaḷhatā, dhīravīrabhāvo, parāpavādaparāpakāresu vikārābhāvo,
atk-s0512a:2031_9: saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ, samāpattīsu vasībhāvo, abhiññāsu balappatti, lakkhaṇattayāvabodho,
atk-s0512a:2031_11: evamādikā sabbāpi bodhisambhārapaṭipatti vīriyānubhāveneva samijjhatīti abhinīhārato
atk-s0512a:2031_12: yāva mahābodhi anossajjantena sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ vīriyaṃ yathā uparūpari visesāvahaṃ
atk-s0512a:2031_13: hoti, evaṃ sampādetabbaṃ. Sampajjamāne ca yathāvutte vīriye khantisaccādhiṭṭhānādayo
atk-s0512a:2031_14: ca dānasīlādayo ca sabbepi bodhisambhārā tadadhīnavuttitāya sampannā eva hontīti
atk-s0512a:2032_0: Iti sattānaṃ sukhūpakaraṇapariccāgena bahudhā anuggahakaraṇaṃ dānena paṭipatti, sīlena
atk-s0512a:2032_2: tesaṃ āmisapaṭiggahaṇadhammadānādinā anekavidhā hitacariyā, paññāya tesaṃ hitakaraṇūpāyakosallaṃ,
atk-s0512a:2032_3: vīriyena tattha ussāhārambhaasaṃhīrāni, khantiyā tadaparādhasahanaṃ, saccena nesaṃ
atk-s0512a:2032_5: acalanaṃ, mettāya nesaṃ hitasukhānucintanaṃ, upekkhāya nesaṃ upakārāpakāresu vikārānāpattīti
atk-s0512a:2032_6: evaṃ aparimāṇe satte ārabbha anukampitasabbasattassa mahābodhisattassa puthujjanehi
atk-s0512a:2032_7: asādhāraṇo aparimeyyo puññañāṇasambhārūpacayo ettha paṭipattīti veditabbaṃ. Yo cetāsaṃ
atk-s0512a:2032_8: paccayo vutto, tassa ca sakkaccaṃ sampādanaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2033_0: Ko vibhāgoti? Dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsapāramiyo.
atk-s0512a:2033_2: sukkadhammā pāramiyo eva, tehi avokiṇṇā sukkadhammā upapāramiyo, akaṇhaasukkā paramatthapāramiyoti
atk-s0512a:2033_3: keci. Samudāgamanakālesu vā pūriyamānā pāramiyo, bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ puṇṇā upapāramiyo,
atk-s0512a:2033_4: buddhabhūmiyaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇā paramatthapāramiyo. Bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ vā parahitakaraṇato
atk-s0512a:2034_0: Evaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānesu paṇidhānārambhapariniṭṭhānesu tesaṃ vibhāgoti apare. Dosūpasamakaruṇāpakatikānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2034_4: yathāvuttavibhāgoti keci. Cittapaṇidhito yāva vacīpaṇidhi, tāva pavattā sambhārā
atk-s0512a:2034_5: pāramiyo, vacīpaṇidhito yāva kāyapaṇidhi, tāva pavattā upapāramiyo, kāyapaṇidhito
atk-s0512a:2034_6: pabhuti paramatthapāramiyoti apare. Aññe pana “parapuññānumodanavasena pavattā sambhārā
atk-s0512a:2034_7: pāramiyo, paresaṃ kārāpanavasena pavattā upapāramiyo, sayaṃkaraṇavasena pavattā paramatthapāramiyo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0512a:2035_0: Tathā bhavasukhāvaho puññañāṇasambhāro pāramī, attano nibbānasukhāvaho upapāramī,
atk-s0512a:2035_2: pana dānapāramī, aṅgapariccāgo dānaupapāramī, attano jīvitapariccāgo dānaparamatthapāramīti.
atk-s0512a:2035_3: Tathā puttadārādikassa tividhassāpi hetu avītikkamanavasena tisso sīlapāramiyo, tesu
atk-s0512a:2035_4: eva tividhesu vatthūsu ālayaṃ upacchinditvā nikkhamanavasena tisso nekkhammapāramiyo,
atk-s0512a:2035_6: paññāpāramiyo. Yathāvuttabhedānaṃ pariccāgādīnaṃ vāyamanavasena tisso vīriyapāramiyo,
atk-s0512a:2035_10: upakaraṇādiupaghātakesupi sattesu mettāya avijahanavasena tisso mettāpāramiyo, yathāvuttavatthuttayassa
atk-s0512a:2036_0: Ko saṅgahoti? Ettha pana yathā etā vibhāgato tiṃsavidhāpi dānapāramiādibhāvato dasavidhā,
atk-s0512a:2036_1: evaṃ dānasīlakhantivīriyajhānapaññāsabhāvena chabbidhā. Etāsu hi nekkhammapāramī
atk-s0512a:2036_2: sīlapāramiyā saṅgahitā, tassā pabbajjābhāve, nīvaraṇavivekabhāve pana jhānapāramiyā
atk-s0512a:2036_3: kusaladhammabhāve chahipi saṅgahitā. Saccapāramī sīlapāramiyā ekadeso eva vacīviratisaccapakkhe,
atk-s0512a:2036_4: ñāṇasaccapakkhe pana paññāpāramiyā saṅgahitā. Mettāpārami jhānapāramiyā eva. Upekkhāpāramī
atk-s0512a:2037_0: Etesañca dānādīnaṃ channaṃ guṇānaṃ aññamaññasambandhānaṃ pañcadasayugalādīni pañcadasayugalādisādhakāni
atk-s0512a:2037_1: honti. Seyyathidaṃ – dānasīlayugalena parahitāhitānaṃ karaṇākaraṇayugalasiddhi, dānakhantiyugalena
atk-s0512a:2037_10: dānasīlapaññātikena āmisābhayadhammadānattikasiddhīti. Evaṃ itarehipi tikehi catukkādīhi
atk-s0512a:2037_11: ca yathāsambhavaṃ tikāni ca catukkādīni ca yojetabbāni.
atk-s0512a:2038_0: Evaṃ chabbidhānampi pana imāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:2038_1: Sabbapāramīnaṃ samūhasaṅgahato hi cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, seyyathidaṃ – saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0512a:2038_2: cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ, upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, paññādhiṭṭhānanti. Tattha adhitiṭṭhati etena,
atk-s0512a:2038_3: ettha vā adhitiṭṭhati, adhiṭṭhānamattameva vā tanti adhiṭṭhānaṃ, saccañca taṃ adhiṭṭhānañca,
atk-s0512a:2038_4: saccassa vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ, saccaṃ adhiṭṭhānametassāti vā saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi.
atk-s0512a:2038_5: Tattha avisesato tāva lokuttaraguṇe katābhinīhārassa anukampitasabbasattassa mahāsattassa
atk-s0512a:2038_7: cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbapāramitāguṇehi upasamato upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tehi eva parahitopāyakosallato paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2039_0: Visesato pana yācakajanaṃ avisaṃvādetvā dassāmīti paṭijānanato paṭiññaṃ avisaṃvādetvā
atk-s0512a:2039_2: lobhadosamohabhayavūpasamato yathārahaṃ yathākālaṃ yathāvidhānañca dānato paññuttarato
atk-s0512a:2039_3: ca kusaladhammānaṃ caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ dānaṃ. Tathā saṃvarasamādānassa avītikkamanato
atk-s0512a:2039_6: paññuttarato, ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānā khanti. Paṭiññānurūpaṃ parahitakaraṇato,
atk-s0512a:2039_9: paññuttarato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ jhānaṃ. Yathāpaṭiññaṃ parahitūpāyakosallato,
atk-s0512a:2039_10: anupāyakiriyāpariccāgato, mohajapariḷāhavūpasamanato, sabbaññutāpaṭilābhato ca caturadhiṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānā paññā.
atk-s0512a:2040_8: saccacāgūpasamādhiṭṭhānāni ñāṇapubbaṅgamato ñāṇānuparivattanato cāti evaṃ sabbāpi
atk-s0512a:2040_9: pāramiyo saccappabhāvitā cāgaparibyañjitā upasamopabrūhitā paññāparisuddhā. Saccañhi
atk-s0512a:2040_10: etāsaṃ janakahetu. Cāgo pariggāhakahetu, upasamo parivuddhihetu, paññā pārisuddhihetu.
atk-s0512a:2040_11: Tathā ādimhi saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ saccapaṭiññattā, majjhe cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ katapaṇidhānassa
atk-s0512a:2040_12: parahitāya attapariccāgato. Ante upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ sabbūpasamapariyosānattā. Ādimajjhapariyosānesu
atk-s0512a:2040_13: paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ tasmiṃ sati sambhavato asati abhāvato yathāpaṭiññañca bhāvato.
atk-s0512a:2041_1: gihibhūtā āmisadānena pare anuggaṇhanti. Tathā attahitaparahitakarehi garupiyabhāvakarehi
atk-s0512a:2041_2: upasamapaññādhiṭṭhānehi ca pabbajitabhūtā dhammadānena pare anuggaṇhanti.
atk-s0512a:2042_1: hi carimakabhavūpapattīti eke. Tatra hi gabbhokkantiṭhitiabhinikkhamanesu paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena
atk-s0512a:2042_2: sato sampajāno saccādhiṭṭhānapāripūriyā sampatijāto uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena
atk-s0512a:2042_3: gantvā sabbā disā oloketvā saccānuparivattinā vacasā – “aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi
atk-s0512a:2042_4: lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassā”ti tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi.
atk-s0512a:2044_0: Dutiye ṭhāne abhisambodhiyaṃ caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti keci. Tattha hi yathāpaṭiññaṃ
atk-s0512a:2044_1: saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ abhisamayo, tato hi saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2044_2: paripuṇṇaṃ. Cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena sabbakilesūpakkilesapariccāgo, tato hi cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2044_3: paripuṇṇaṃ. Upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena paramūpasamappatti, tato hi upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2044_4: paripuṇṇaṃ. Paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena anāvaraṇañāṇapaṭilābho, tato hi paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2045_0: Tatiye ṭhāne dhammacakkappavattane caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti aññe. Tattha hi
atk-s0512a:2045_3: Upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa sayaṃ upasantassa paresaṃ upasamanena upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2046_0: Catutthe ṭhāne parinibbāne caturadhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti apare. Tatra hi parinibbutattā
atk-s0512a:2046_3: paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ paripuṇṇanti. Tatra mahāpurisassa visesena mettākhette abhijātiyaṃ
atk-s0512a:2046_7: visesena upekkhākhette parinibbāne upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa upasamādhiṭṭhānaparipūraṇamabhibyattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2047_0: Tatra saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa saṃvāsena sīlaṃ veditabbaṃ. Cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa
atk-s0512a:2047_1: saṃvohārena soceyyaṃ veditabbaṃ. Upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa āpadāsu thāmo veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:2047_2: Paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgatassa sākacchāya paññā veditabbā. Evaṃ sīlājīvacittadiṭṭhivisuddhiyo
atk-s0512a:2047_3: veditabbā. Tathā saccādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena dosāgatiṃ na gacchati avisaṃvādanato.
atk-s0512a:2047_4: Cāgādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena lobhāgatiṃ na gacchati anabhisaṅgato. Upasamādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena
atk-s0512a:2047_5: bhayāgatiṃ na gacchati anaparādhato. Paññādhiṭṭhānasamudāgamena mohāgatiṃ na gacchati
atk-s0512a:2048_0: Tathā paṭhamena aduṭṭho adhivāseti, dutiyena aluddho paṭisevati, tatiyena abhīto
atk-s0512a:2048_1: parivajjeti, catutthena asammūḷho vinodeti. Paṭhamena nekkhammasukhappatti, itarehi
atk-s0512a:2048_3: upekkhāsukhappattiyo etehi catūhi yathākkamaṃ honti. Evamanekaguṇānubandhehi catūhi
atk-s0512a:2048_4: adhiṭṭhānehi sabbapāramisamūhasaṅgaho veditabbo. Yathā ca catūhi adhiṭṭhānehi sabbapāramisaṅgaho,
atk-s0512a:2048_5: evaṃ karuṇāpaññāhipīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sabbopi hi bodhisambhāro karuṇāpaññāhi saṅgahito.
atk-s0512a:2048_6: Karuṇāpaññāpariggahitā hi dānādiguṇā mahābodhisambhārā bhavanti buddhattasiddhipariyosānāti.
atk-s0512a:2049_0: Ko sampādanūpāyoti? Sakalassāpi puññādisambhārassa sammāsambodhiṃ uddissa anavasesasambharaṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:2049_1: avekallakāritāyogena, tattha ca sakkaccakāritā ādarabahumānayogena, sātaccakāritā
atk-s0512a:2049_2: nirantarayogena, cirakālādiyogo ca antarā avosānāpajjanenāti. Taṃ panassa kālaparimāṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:2049_3: parato āvi bhavissati. Iti caturaṅgayogo etāsaṃ pāramīnaṃ sampādanūpāyo. Tathā mahāsattena
atk-s0512a:2049_4: bodhāya paṭipajjantena sammāsambodhāya buddhānaṃ puretarameva attā niyyātetabbo –
atk-s0512a:2049_5: “imāhaṃ attabhāvaṃ buddhānaṃ niyyātemī”ti. Taṃtaṃpariggahavatthuñca paṭilābhato puretarameva
atk-s0512a:2049_6: dānamukhe nissajjitabbaṃ. “Yaṃ kiñci mayhaṃ uppajjanakaṃ jīvitaparikkhārajātaṃ, sabbaṃ
atk-s0512a:2049_7: taṃ sati yācake dassāmi, tesaṃ pana dinnāvasesaṃ eva mayā paribhuñjitabba”nti.
atk-s0512a:2050_0: Evaṃ hissa sammadeva pariccāgāya kate cittābhisaṅkhāre yaṃ uppajjati pariggahavatthu
atk-s0512a:2050_1: aviññāṇakaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ vā, tattha ye ime pubbe dāne akataparicayo, pariggahavatthussa
atk-s0512a:2050_2: parittabhāvo, uḷāramanuññatā, parikkhayacintāti cattāro dānavinibandhā, tesu yadā
atk-s0512a:2050_3: mahābodhisattassa saṃvijjamānesu deyyadhammesu paccupaṭṭhite ca yācakajane dāne cittaṃ
atk-s0512a:2050_4: na pakkhandati na kamati. Tena niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ “addhāhaṃ dāne pubbe akataparicayo,
atk-s0512a:2050_5: tena me etarahi dātukamyatā citte na saṇṭhātī”ti. So evaṃ me ito paraṃ dānābhirataṃ
atk-s0512a:2050_6: cittaṃ bhavissati, handāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya dānaṃ dassāmi, nanu mayā paṭikacceva pariggahavatthu
atk-s0512a:2050_7: yācakānaṃ pariccattanti dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇī vosaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato.
atk-s0512a:2050_8: Evaṃ mahāsattassa paṭhamo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
atk-s0512a:2051_0: Tathā mahāsatto deyyadhammassa parittabhāve sati vekalle ca iti paṭisañcikkhati –
atk-s0512a:2051_1: “ahaṃ kho pubbe adānasīlatāya etarahi evaṃ paccayavikalo jāto, tasmā idāni mayā parittena
atk-s0512a:2051_2: vā hīnena vā yathāladdhena deyyadhammena attānaṃ pīḷetvāpi dānameva dātabbaṃ, yenāhaṃ
atk-s0512a:2051_3: āyatimpi dānapāramiṃ matthakaṃ pāpessāmī”ti. So itarītarena taṃ dānaṃ deti muttacāgo
atk-s0512a:2051_4: payatapāṇī vosaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato. Evaṃ mahāsattassa dutiyo dānavinibandho
atk-s0512a:2052_0: Tathā mahāsatto deyyadhammassa uḷāramanuññatāya adātukamyatācitte uppajjamāne iti
atk-s0512a:2052_1: paṭisañcikkhati – “nanu tayā sappurisa uḷāratamā sabbaseṭṭhā sammāsambodhi abhipatthitā,
atk-s0512a:2052_2: tasmā tadatthaṃ tayā uḷāramanuññe eva deyyadhamme dātuṃ yuttarūpa”nti. So uḷāraṃ
atk-s0512a:2052_3: manuññañca deti muttacāgo payatapāṇī vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato. Evaṃ
atk-s0512a:2052_4: mahāpurisassa tatiyo dānavinibandho hato hoti vihato samucchinno.
atk-s0512a:2053_0: Tathā mahāsatto dānaṃ dento yadā deyyadhammassa parikkhayaṃ passati, so iti paṭisañcikkhati
atk-s0512a:2053_1: – “ayaṃ kho bhogānaṃ sabhāvo, yadidaṃ khayadhammatā vayadhammatā ca. Api ca me pubbe
atk-s0512a:2053_2: tādisassa dānassa akatattā evaṃ bhogānaṃ parikkhayo dissati, handāhaṃ yathāladdhena
atk-s0512a:2053_3: deyyadhammena parittena vā vipulena vā dānameva dadeyyaṃ, yenāhaṃ āyatiṃ dānapāramiyā
atk-s0512a:2053_4: matthakaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti. So yathāladdhena dānaṃ deti muttacāgo payatapāṇī vosaggarato
atk-s0512a:2053_5: yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato. Evaṃ mahāsattassa catuttho dānavinibandho hato hoti
atk-s0512a:2053_6: vihato samucchinno. Evaṃ ye ye dānapāramiyā vinibandhabhūtā anatthā, tesaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0512a:2053_7: yathārahaṃ paccavekkhitvā paṭivinodanaṃ upāyo. Yathā ca dānapāramiyā, evaṃ sīlapāramiādīsupi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2054_0: Api ca yaṃ mahāsattassa buddhānaṃ attasanniyyātanaṃ, taṃ sammadeva sabbapāramīnaṃ
atk-s0512a:2054_1: sampādanūpāyo. Buddhānañhi attānaṃ niyyātetvā ṭhito mahāpuriso tattha tattha bodhisambhārapāripūriyā
atk-s0512a:2054_2: ghaṭento vāyamanto sarīrassa sukhūpakaraṇānañca upacchedakesu dussahesupi kicchesu
atk-s0512a:2054_4: mayā attabhāvo buddhānaṃ pariccatto, yaṃ vā taṃ vā ettha hotū”ti taṃnimittaṃ na kampati
atk-s0512a:2054_5: na vedhati, īsakampi aññathattaṃ na gacchati, kusalārambhe aññadatthu acalādhiṭṭhānova
atk-s0512a:2055_0: Api ca samāsato katābhinīhārassa attani sinehassa parisosanaṃ paresu ca sinehassa
atk-s0512a:2055_1: parivaḍḍhanaṃ etāsaṃ sampādanūpāyo. Sammāsambodhisamadhigamāya hi katamahāpaṇidhānassa
atk-s0512a:2055_2: mahāsattassa yāthāvato parijānanena sabbesu dhammesu anupalittassa attani sineho
atk-s0512a:2055_3: parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gacchati, mahākaruṇāsamāsevanena pana piyaputte viya sabbasatte
atk-s0512a:2055_4: sampassamānassa tesu mettākaruṇāsineho parivaḍḍhati, tato ca taṃtadavatthānurūpaṃ
atk-s0512a:2055_7: caturadhiṭṭhānānugatehi accantaṃ janassa saṅgahakaraṇena upari yānattaye avatāraṇaṃ
atk-s0512a:2056_0: Mahāsattānañhi mahākaruṇā mahāpaññā ca dānena alaṅkatā, dānaṃ piyavacanena, piyavacanaṃ
atk-s0512a:2056_1: atthacariyāya, atthacariyā samānattatāya alaṅkatā saṅgahitā ca. Tesaṃ sabbepi satte
atk-s0512a:2056_2: attanā nibbisese katvā bodhisambhāresu paṭipajjantānaṃ sabbattha samānasukhadukkhatāya
atk-s0512a:2056_3: samānattatāya siddhi. Buddhabhūtānampi ca teheva catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi caturadhiṭṭhānaparipūritābhivuddhehi
atk-s0512a:2056_4: janassa accantikasaṅgahakaraṇena abhivinayanaṃ sijjhati. Dānañhi sammāsambuddhānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2056_5: cāgādhiṭṭhānena paripūritābhivuddhaṃ, piyavacanaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānena, atthacariyā paññādhiṭṭhānena,
atk-s0512a:2056_7: samānattatā parinibbāne. Tatra hi nesaṃ avisesato ekībhāvo. Tenevāha “natthi vimuttiyā
atk-s0512a:2060: Nirapekkho ca sabbattha, aho acchariyo jino.
atk-s0512a:2062: Sadā sattahite yutto, aho acchariyo jino.
atk-s0512a:2064: Uyyutto akilāsū ca, aho acchariyo jino”ti.
atk-s0512a:2065_0: Kittakena kālena sampādananti? Heṭṭhimena tāva paricchedena cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni
atk-s0512a:2065_1: mahākappānaṃ satasahassañca, majjhimena aṭṭha asaṅkhyeyyāni mahākappānaṃ satasahassañca,
atk-s0512a:2065_2: uparimena pana soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni mahākappānaṃ satasahassañca. Ete ca bhedā yathākkamaṃ
atk-s0512a:2065_3: paññādhikasaddhādhikavīriyādhikavasena ñātabbā. Paññādhikānañhi saddhā mandā hoti
atk-s0512a:2065_4: paññā tikkhā, saddhādhikānaṃ paññā majjhimā hoti, vīriyādhikānaṃ paññā mandā, paññānubhāvena
atk-s0512a:2066_0: Apare pana “vīriyassa tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena bodhisattānaṃ ayaṃ kālavibhāgo”ti
atk-s0512a:2066_1: vadanti. Avisesena pana vimuttiparipācanīyānaṃ dhammānaṃ tikkhamajjhimamudubhāvena
atk-s0512a:2066_2: yathāvuttakālabhedena bodhisambhārā tesaṃ pāripūriṃ gacchantīti tayopete kālabhedā
atk-s0512a:2066_3: yuttātipi vadanti. Evaṃ tividhā hi bodhisattā abhinīhārakkhaṇe bhavanti ugghahaṭitaññūvipañcitaññūneyyabhedena.
atk-s0512a:2066_4: Tesu yo ugghaṭitaññū, so sammāsambuddhassa sammukhā catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ suṇanto gāthāya
atk-s0512a:2066_5: tatiyapade apariyosite eva chahi abhiññāhi saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ
atk-s0512a:2066_6: samatthūpanissayo hoti, sace sāvakabodhiyaṃ adhimutto siyā.
atk-s0512a:2067_0: Dutiyo bhagavato sammukhā catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ suṇanto apariyosite eva gāthāya catutthapade
atk-s0512a:2067_1: chahi abhiññāhi arahattaṃ adhigantuṃ samatthūpanissayo hoti, yadi sāvakabodhiyaṃ adhimutto siyā.
atk-s0512a:2068: Itaro pana bhagavato sammukhā catuppadikaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā pariyositāya gāthāya chahi abhiññāhi arahattaṃ pattuṃ samatthūpanissayo hoti.
atk-s0512a:2069_0: Tayopete vinā kālabhedena katābhinīhāro buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇā ca anukkamena
atk-s0512a:2069_1: pāramiyo paripūrentā yathākkamaṃ yathāvuttabhedena kālena sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0512a:2069_2: Tesu tesu pana kālabhedesu aparipuṇṇesu te te mahāsattā divase divase vessantaradānasadisaṃ
atk-s0512a:2069_3: mahādānaṃ dentāpi tadanurūpe sīlādisabbapāramidhamme ācinantāpi pañca mahāpariccāge
atk-s0512a:2069_4: pariccajantāpi ñātatthacariyā lokatthacariyā buddhatthacariyā paramakoṭiṃ pāpentāpi
atk-s0512a:2069_5: antarā ca sammāsambuddhā bhavissantīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Kasmā? Ñāṇassa aparipaccanato
atk-s0512a:2069_6: buddhakārakadhammānaṃ apariniṭṭhānato. Paricchinnakālanipphāditaṃ viya hi sassaṃ
atk-s0512a:2069_8: vāyamantenāpi na sakkā adhigantunti pāramipāripūri yathāvuttakālavisesena sampajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2070: Ko ānisaṃsoti? Ye te katābhinīhārānaṃ bodhisattānaṃ –
atk-s0512a:2076: Jāyamānā manussesu, jaccandhā na bhavanti te.
atk-s0512a:2086_0: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇitā ānisaṃsā. Ye ca “sato sampajāno, ānanda, bodhisatto tusitā kāyā cavitvā
atk-s0512a:2086_1: mātukucchiṃ okkamatī”tiādinā soḷasa acchariyabbhutadhammappakārā, ye ca “sītaṃ byapagataṃ
atk-s0512a:2086_2: hoti, uṇhañca upasammatī”tiādinā “jāyamāne kho, sāriputta, bodhisatte ayaṃ dasasahassī
atk-s0512a:2086_3: lokadhātu saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhatī”tiādinā ca dvattiṃsa pubbanimittappakārā,
atk-s0512a:2086_4: ye vā panaññepi bodhisattānaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanaṃ kammādīsu vasībhāvoti evamādayo
atk-s0512a:2086_5: tattha tattha jātakabuddhavaṃsādīsu dassitākārā ānisaṃsā, te sabbepi etāsaṃ ānisaṃsā.
atk-s0512a:2087_0: Api ca yasmā bodhisatto abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya sabbasattānaṃ pitusamo hoti hitesitāya,
atk-s0512a:2087_1: dakkhiṇeyyako garu bhāvanīyo paramañca puññakkhettaṃ hoti guṇavisesayogena. Yebhuyyena
atk-s0512a:2087_2: ca manussānaṃ piyo hoti, amanussānaṃ piyo hoti, devatāhi anupālīyati, mettākaruṇāparibhāvitasantānatāya
atk-s0512a:2087_3: vāḷamigādīhi ca anabhibhavanīyo hoti, yasmiṃ yasmiñca sattanikāye paccājāyati, tasmiṃ
atk-s0512a:2087_4: tasmiṃ uḷārena vaṇṇena uḷārena yasena uḷārena sukhena uḷārena balena uḷārena ādhipateyyena
atk-s0512a:2088_0: Appābādho hoti appātaṅko, suvisuddhā cassa saddhā hoti suvisadā, suvisuddhaṃ vīriyaṃ,
atk-s0512a:2088_1: satisamādhipaññā suvisadā, mandakileso hoti mandadaratho mandapariḷāho, kilesānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2088_2: mandabhāveneva suvaco hoti padakkhiṇaggāhī, khamo hoti sorato, sakhilo hoti paṭisanthārakusalo,
atk-s0512a:2088_3: akkodhano hoti anupanāhī, amakkhī hoti apaḷāsī, anissukī hoti amaccharī, asaṭho hoti
atk-s0512a:2088_4: amāyāvī, athaddho hoti anatimānī, asāraddho hoti appamatto, parato upatāpasaho hoti
atk-s0512a:2088_5: paresaṃ anupatāpī, yasmiñca gāmakhette paṭivasati, tattha sattānaṃ bhayādayo upaddavā
atk-s0512a:2088_6: yebhuyyena anuppannā nuppajjanti, uppannā ca vūpasammanti, yesu ca apāyesu uppajjati,
atk-s0512a:2088_7: na tattha pacurajano viya dukkhena adhimattaṃ pīḷīyati, bhiyyosomattāya saṃvegamāpajjati.
atk-s0512a:2088_8: Tasmā mahāpurisassa yathārahaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave labbhamānā ete sattānaṃ pitusamatādakkhiṇeyyatādayo
atk-s0512a:2089_0: Tathā āyusampadā rūpasampadā kulasampadā issariyasampadā ādeyyavacanatā mahānubhāvatāti
atk-s0512a:2089_1: etepi mahāpurisassa pāramīnaṃ ānisaṃsāti veditabbā. Tattha āyusampadā nāma tassaṃ
atk-s0512a:2089_2: tassaṃ upapattiyaṃ dīghāyukatā ciraṭṭhitikatā, tāya yathāraddhāni kusalasamādānāni
atk-s0512a:2089_3: pariyosāpeti, bahuñca kusalaṃ upacinoti. Rūpasampadā nāma abhirūpatā dassanīyatā
atk-s0512a:2089_4: pāsādikatā, tāya rūpappamāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ pasādāvaho hoti sambhāvanīyo. Kulasampadā
atk-s0512a:2089_5: nāma uḷāresu kulesu abhinibbatti, tāya jātimadādimadamattānampi upasaṅkamanīyo hoti
atk-s0512a:2089_6: payirupāsanīyo, tena te nibbisevane karoti. Issariyasampadā nāma mahāvibhavatā mahesakkhatā
atk-s0512a:2089_7: mahāparivāratā ca, tāhi saṅgaṇhitabbe catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgaṇhituṃ, niggahetabbe
atk-s0512a:2090_0: Ādeyyavacanatā nāma saddheyyatā paccayikatā, tāya sattānaṃ pamāṇabhūto hoti, alaṅghanīyā
atk-s0512a:2090_1: cassa āṇā hoti. Mahānubhāvatā nāma ānubhāvamahantatā, tāya parehi na abhibhūyati,
atk-s0512a:2090_2: sayameva pana pare aññadatthu abhibhavati dhammena samena yathābhūtaguṇehi ca, evamete
atk-s0512a:2090_3: āyusampadādayo mahāpurisassa pāramīnaṃ ānisaṃsā, sayañca aparimāṇassa puññasambhārassa
atk-s0512a:2090_4: parivuḍḍhihetubhūtā yānattaye sattānaṃ avatāraṇassa paripācanassa ca kāraṇabhūtāti veditabbā.
atk-s0512a:2091_0: Kiṃ phalanti? Samāsato tāva sammāsambuddhabhāvo etāsaṃ phalaṃ, vitthārato pana dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaasītianubyañjanabyāmappabhādianekaguṇagaṇasamujjalarūpakāyasampatti-
atk-s0512a:2091_2: guṇasamudayopasobhinī dhammakāyasirī. Yāvatā pana buddhaguṇā ye anekehipi kappehi
atk-s0512a:2091_3: sammāsambuddhenāpi vācāya pariyosāpetuṃ na sakkā, idametāsaṃ phalaṃ. Vuttañcetaṃ –
atk-s0512a:2092: “Buddhopi buddhassa bhaṇeyya vaṇṇaṃ, kappampi ce aññamabhāsamāno;
atk-s0512a:2093: Khīyetha kappo ciradīghamantare, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassā”ti. ;
atk-s0512a:2095_0: Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “datvā dātabbakaṃ dāna”ntiādinā sabbāpi pāramī ekajjhaṃ dassetvā
atk-s0512a:2095_1: parato “kosajjaṃ bhayato disvā”tiādinā pariyosānagāthādvayaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ yehi vīriyārambhamettābhāvanā
atk-s0512a:2095_2: appamādavihārehi yathāvuttā buddhakārakadhammā visadabhāvaṃ gatā sammāsambodhisaṅkhātā
atk-s0512a:2095_3: ca attano vimutti paripācitā, tehi veneyyānampi vimuttiparipācanāya ovādadānatthaṃ vutthaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2096_0: Tattha kosajjaṃ bhayato disvā, vīriyārambhañca khematoti iminā paṭipakkhe ādīnavadassanamukhena
atk-s0512a:2096_1: vīriyārambhe ānisaṃsaṃ dasseti. Āraddhavīriyā hothāti iminā vīriyārambhe niyojeti. Yasmā ca –
atk-s0512a:2099: Saṅkhepato. Vitthārato pana sakalena buddhavacanena pakāsitā sabbāpi sampattiyo ekanteneva sammappadhānādhīnā, tasmā bhagavā vīriyārambhe niyojetvā “esā buddhānusāsanī”ti āha.
atk-s0512a:2100_1: kosajjaṃ bhayato tappaṭipakkhato catūhi yogehi anupaddavabhāvasādhanato vīriyārambhañca
atk-s0512a:2100_2: khemato disvā adhisīlasikkhādisampādanavasena vīriyassa ārambho sammappadhānānuyogo,
atk-s0512a:2100_3: tattha yaṃ sammadeva niyojana, “āraddhavīriyā hothā”ti, esā buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2100_4: anusāsanī anusiṭṭhi ovādoti. Sesagāthāsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0512a:2101_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – vivādanti viruddhavādaṃ, chavivādavatthuvasena vivadananti attho.
atk-s0512a:2101_1: Avivādanti vivādapaṭipakkhaṃ mettāvacīkammaṃ, mettābhāvanaṃ vā. Atha vā avivādanti
atk-s0512a:2101_2: avivādahetubhūtaṃ chabbidhaṃ sāraṇīyadhammaṃ. Samaggāti avaggā, kāyena ceva cittena
atk-s0512a:2101_3: ca sahitā aviramitā aviyuttāti attho. Sakhilāti sakkīlā mudusīlā, aññamaññamhi muduhadayāti
atk-s0512a:2101_4: attho. Esā buddhānusāsanīti ettha sabbena sabbaṃ vivādamanupagamma yadidaṃ chasāraṇīyadhammaparipūraṇavasena
atk-s0512a:2101_5: samaggavāse niyojanaṃ, esā buddhānaṃ anusiṭṭhīti yojetabbaṃ. Samaggavāsañhi vasamānā
atk-s0512a:2101_6: sīladiṭṭhisāmaññagatā avivadamānā sukheneva tisso sikkhā paripūressantīti satthā
atk-s0512a:2102_0: Pamādanti pamajjanaṃ, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pamussanaṃ akusalesu ca dhammesu cittavossaggaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2102_1: Vuttañhetaṃ – “tattha katamo pamādo, kāyaduccarite vā vacīduccarite vā manoduccarite
atk-s0512a:2102_2: vā pañcasu vā kāmaguṇesu cittassa vosaggo vosaggānuppadānaṃ kusalānaṃ vā dhammānaṃ
atk-s0512a:2102_3: bhāvanāya asakkaccakiriyatā, asātaccakiriyatā, anaṭṭhitakiriyatā, olīnavuttitā, nikkhittachandatā,
atk-s0512a:2102_4: nikkhittadhuratā anāsevanā abhāvanā abahulīkammaṃ…pe… yo evarūpo pamādo pamajjanā
atk-s0512a:2103_0: Appamādanti appamajjanaṃ. Taṃ pamādassa paṭipakkhato veditabbaṃ. Atthato hi appamādo
atk-s0512a:2103_1: nāma satiyā avippavāso, “satiyā avippavāso”ti ca niccaṃ upaṭṭhitāya satiyā evetaṃ
atk-s0512a:2103_2: nāmaṃ. Apare pana “satisampajaññappadhānā tathā pavattā cattāro arūpino khandhā appamādo”ti
atk-s0512a:2103_3: vadanti. Yasmā pana appamādabhāvanā nāma visuṃ ekā bhāvanā natthi. Yā hi kāci puññakiriyā
atk-s0512a:2104_0: Visesato pana vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ kāyikavācasikasaṃvarañca upādāya sabbā
atk-s0512a:2104_1: sīlabhāvanā, sabbā samādhibhāvanā, sabbā paññābhāvanā, sabbā kusalabhāvanā, anavajjabhāvanā,
atk-s0512a:2104_2: appamādabhāvanā. “Appamādo”ti hi idaṃ padaṃ mahantaṃ atthaṃ dīpeti, mahantaṃ atthaṃ
atk-s0512a:2104_3: pariggahetvā tiṭṭhati, sakalampi tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ āharitvā appamādapadassa
atk-s0512a:2104_4: atthaṃ katvā kathento dhammakathiko “atitthena pakkhando”ti na vattabbo. Kasmā? Appamādapadassa
atk-s0512a:2104_5: mahantabhāvato. Tathā hi sammāsambuddho kusinārāyaṃ yamakasālānamantare parinibbānasamaye
atk-s0512a:2104_6: nipanno abhisambodhito paṭṭhāya pañcacattālīsāya vassesu attanā bhāsitaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0512a:2104_7: ekeneva padena saṅgahetvā dassento “appamādena sampādethā”ti bhikkhūnaṃ ovādamadāsi.
atk-s0512a:2104_8: Tathā cāha – “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici jaṅgamānaṃ pāṇānaṃ padajātāni, sabbāni
atk-s0512a:2104_9: tāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ gacchanti, hatthipadaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati yadidaṃ mahantattena,
atk-s0512a:2104_10: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci kusalā dhammā, sabbe te appamādamūlakā appamādasamosaraṇā,
atk-s0512a:2104_11: appamādo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti. Tattha appamādabhāvanaṃ sikhāppattaṃ dassento satthā
atk-s0512a:2105_0: Tassattho – yo esa sīlādikhandhattayasaṅgaho sammādiṭṭhipubbaṅgamo sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃyeva
atk-s0512a:2105_1: aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo, taṃ bhāvetha attano santāne uppādetha.
atk-s0512a:2105_2: Dassanamaggamatte aṭhatvā upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ uppādanavasena vaḍḍhetha, evaṃ vo
atk-s0512a:2105_3: appamādabhāvanā sikhāppattā bhavissatīti. Esā buddhānusāsanīti yadidaṃ kusalesu dhammesu
atk-s0512a:2105_4: appamajjanaṃ, tañca ussukkāpetvā ariyamaggassa bhāvanā esā buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ anusiṭṭhi ovādoti.
atk-s0512a:2106_0: Iti bhagavā arahattanikūṭeneva cariyāpiṭakadesanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Itthaṃ sudantiādīsu
atk-s0512a:2106_1: itthanti kappe ca satasahassetiādinā pakārena. Sudanti nipātamattaṃ. Bhagavāti bhāgyavantatādīhi
atk-s0512a:2106_2: kāraṇehi bhagavā. Attano pubbacariyanti purimāsu akittipaṇḍitādijātīsu attano paṭipattidukkarakiriyaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2106_3: Sambhāvayamānoti hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sammadeva pakāsento. Buddhāpadāniyaṃ nāmāti
atk-s0512a:2106_4: buddhānaṃ purātanakammaṃ porāṇaṃ dukkarakiriyaṃ adhikicca pavattattā desitattā buddhāpadāniyanti
atk-s0512a:2106_5: evaṃnāmakaṃ. Dhammapariyāyanti dhammadesanaṃ dhammabhūtaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ. Abhāsitthāti
atk-s0512a:2106_6: avoca. Yaṃ panettha na vuttaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā uttānatthattā ca na vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0512a:2121: Iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
atk-s0512a:2126: Tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino.
